name: Zetian

skills.name: Celestial Armament
skills.description_text:
Phoenix Crown: When Zetian hits enemy heroes with Phoenix Strike or Phoenix Descent, she gains 1% Spell Vamp for 5s, stacking up to 10 times.
Celestial Robe: The power of the Phoenix periodically protects Zetian, knocking back and stunning any enemy hero who dares approach her while dealing 90(+10*Hero Level) (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to them. She also gains a 300(+20*Hero Level) (+50% Total Magic Power) Shield that lasts 3s. This effect has a 120s cooldown.
skills.description_html:
Phoenix Crown: When Zetian hits enemy heroes with Phoenix Strike or Phoenix Descent, she gains 1% Spell Vamp for 5s, stacking up to 10 times.
Celestial Robe: The power of the Phoenix periodically protects Zetian, knocking back and stunning any enemy hero who dares approach her while dealing 90(+10*Hero Level) (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to them. She also gains a 300(+20*Hero Level) (+50% Total Magic Power) Shield that lasts 3s. This effect has a 120s cooldown.

skills.name: Phoenix Strike
skills.description_text:
Zetian unleashes a Phoenix Wave in the target direction. If it hits an enemy, she automatically casts another wave, up to 3 times. While casting, Zetian can use other skills.
The three Phoenix Waves deal 200 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage/200 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage/385 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage, respectively. The third wave hits a larger area and pulls enemies toward the skill direction (not considered a control effect).
This skill only has 65% Spell Vamp efficiency against Minions.
skills.description_html:
Zetian unleashes a Phoenix Wave in the target direction. If it hits an enemy, she automatically casts another wave, up to 3 times. While casting, Zetian can use other skills.
The three Phoenix Waves deal 200 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage/200 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage/385 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage, respectively. The third wave hits a larger area and pulls enemies toward the skill direction (not considered a control effect).
This skill only has 65% Spell Vamp efficiency against Minions.

skills.name: Phoenix Descent
skills.description_text:
Zetian summons a Phoenix Spirit at the target location, dealing 150 (+45% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and applying a brief 50% slow effect to enemies in the area. The Phoenix Spirit hovers at the location for 3s, dealing 20 (+10% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage every 0.5s and reducing enemies' Magic Defense by 10% while revealing their surrounding area.
While the Phoenix Spirit is active, Zetian can use this skill again to command it to charge toward a designated location, dealing 150 (+45% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and applying a brief 50% slow effect upon arrival.
skills.description_html:
Zetian summons a Phoenix Spirit at the target location, dealing 150 (+45% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and applying a brief 50% slow effect to enemies in the area. The Phoenix Spirit hovers at the location for 3s, dealing 20 (+10% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage every 0.5s and reducing enemies' Magic Defense by 10% while revealing their surrounding area.
While the Phoenix Spirit is active, Zetian can use this skill again to command it to charge toward a designated location, dealing 150 (+45% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and applying a brief 50% slow effect upon arrival.

skills.name: Fury of the Phoenix
skills.description_text:
Zetian calls upon her divine mandate and the hearts of her people, granting all allied heroes 40% Movement Speed that gradually decays over 3s, while bringing divine retribution upon all enemy heroes, dealing 400 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and stunning them for 0.8s. Zetian gains vision of all enemy heroes during this time.
Zetian can cast other skills while channeling this skill.
skills.description_html:
Zetian calls upon her divine mandate and the hearts of her people, granting all allied heroes 40% Movement Speed that gradually decays over 3s, while bringing divine retribution upon all enemy heroes, dealing 400 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and stunning them for 0.8s. Zetian gains vision of all enemy heroes during this time.
Zetian can cast other skills while channeling this skill.

quote: Recognized by the Heavens and cherished by her people, the Celestial Empress of the Cadia Riverlands ascends to bring peace to the mortal realm.

name: Kalea

skills.name: Surge of Life
skills.description_text:
After casting a skill, Kalea creates a Water Zone on the ground. When Kalea casts a skill within this zone, she will absorb the Water Zone to enhance her next three Basic Attacks with different effects:
First Basic Attack: Kalea dashes to the target, dealing (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
Second Basic Attack: Kalea unleashes a flurry of attacks, dealing 200 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovering 120 (+10% Total HP) (+60% Total Magic Power) HP for herself and the nearby ally with the lowest HP.
Third Basic Attack: Kalea uses her tail to strike the area around her target, dealing 100 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and creating a new Water Zone. Enhanced Basic Attacks are not affected by Attack Speed.
skills.description_html:
After casting a skill, Kalea creates a Water Zone on the ground. When Kalea casts a skill within this zone, she will absorb the Water Zone to enhance her next three Basic Attacks with different effects:
First Basic Attack: Kalea dashes to the target, dealing (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
Second Basic Attack: Kalea unleashes a flurry of attacks, dealing 200 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovering 120 (+10% Total HP) (+60% Total Magic Power) HP for herself and the nearby ally with the lowest HP.
Third Basic Attack: Kalea uses her tail to strike the area around her target, dealing 100 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and creating a new Water Zone. Enhanced Basic Attacks are not affected by Attack Speed.

skills.name: Wavebreaker
skills.description_text: Kalea slams her fist into the ground, creating a wave that deals 200 (+5% Total HP) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and slows them by 40% for 1.5s.
skills.description_html: Kalea slams her fist into the ground, creating a wave that deals 200<font color="26e407"> (+5% Total HP)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and slows them by 40% for 1.5s.

skills.name: Tidal Strike
skills.description_text:
Kalea charges forward and body slams the first enemy hero she encounters, knocking them airborne for 0.6s (unaffected by Resilience) while dealing 150 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
If she collides with an obstacle or touches the edge of a Water Zone during her charge, Kalea will leap into the air. Cast the skill again to slam down at a target location, dealing 150 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and knocking enemies airborne for 0.6s (unaffected by Resilience).
skills.description_html:
Kalea charges forward and body slams the first enemy hero she encounters, knocking them airborne for 0.6s (unaffected by Resilience) while dealing 150 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
If she collides with an obstacle or touches the edge of a Water Zone during her charge, Kalea will leap into the air. Cast the skill again to slam down at a target location, dealing 150 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and knocking enemies airborne for 0.6s (unaffected by Resilience).

skills.name: Tsunami Slam
skills.description_text: Kalea grabs an enemy hero with her tail and slams them down in the Joystick's direction (drag the Joystick to change landing spot). She gains Control Immunity during this process. Upon landing, deals 300 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target and nearby enemies.
skills.description_html: Kalea grabs an enemy hero with her tail and slams them down in the Joystick's direction (drag the Joystick to change landing spot). She gains Control Immunity during this process. Upon landing, deals 300<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the target and nearby enemies.

quote: With her serpent tail, this proud descendant of the Great Serpent swims gracefully through the Vonetis Sea, aspiring to one day carry the full power of her heritage.

name: Lukas

skills.name: Hero's Resolve
skills.description_text:
Lukas gains 0.5 Resolve per second and an additional 2 Resolve when attacking heroes.

Lukas consumes 10 Resolve per second while in [Sacred Beast] form.
skills.description_html:
Lukas gains 0.5 Resolve per second and an additional 2 Resolve when attacking heroes.

Lukas consumes 10 Resolve per second while in [Sacred Beast] form.

skills.name: Flash Combo
skills.description_text:
Passive: Basic Attacks enhance Flash Combo up to 2 times, lasting 4s.
Lukas consumes all Vigor to unleash Pulverize, dealing 220 (+120% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovering 8% of his Max HP when hitting a hero.
1 Stack: Lukas briefly stuns the target and spins his tonfa hammers to deal 100 (+45% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage 3 times, pulling the enemy toward him.
2 Stacks: Lukas briefly stuns the target and follows up with 2 attacks that deal 50 (+20% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage per hit. He will then spin his tonfa hammers to deal 100 (+45% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage 3 times, gaining Control Immunity during this period.
skills.description_html:
Passive: Basic Attacks enhance Flash Combo up to 2 times, lasting 4s.
Lukas consumes all Vigor to unleash Pulverize, dealing 220 (+120% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovering 8% of his Max HP when hitting a hero.
1 Stack: Lukas briefly stuns the target and spins his tonfa hammers to deal 100 (+45% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage 3 times, pulling the enemy toward him.
2 Stacks: Lukas briefly stuns the target and follows up with 2 attacks that deal 50 (+20% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage per hit. He will then spin his tonfa hammers to deal 100 (+45% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage 3 times, gaining Control Immunity during this period.

skills.name: Flash Step
skills.description_text:
Passive: Basic Attacks enhance Flash Combo up to 4 times, lasting 60 (+125% Total Physical Attack)s.
Lukas consumes all Vigor to unleash a tail swing, dealing 40 (+25% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovers of his Max HP when hitting a hero.
1 Stack: Lukas briefly stuns the target and pounces to deal 20% Physical Damage 3 times, knocking the enemy back.
2 Stacks: Lukas briefly stuns the target and leaps to deal 4 Physical Damage 2 times, then summons sacred lightning, dealing Physical Damage 3 times, and gaining Control Immunity during this period.
skills.description_html:
Passive: Basic Attacks enhance Flash Combo up to 4 times, lasting 60 (+125% Total Physical Attack)s.
Lukas consumes all Vigor to unleash a tail swing, dealing 40 (+25% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovers of his Max HP when hitting a hero.
1 Stack: Lukas briefly stuns the target and pounces to deal 20% Physical Damage 3 times, knocking the enemy back.
2 Stacks: Lukas briefly stuns the target and leaps to deal 4 Physical Damage 2 times, then summons sacred lightning, dealing Physical Damage 3 times, and gaining Control Immunity during this period.

skills.name: Unleash the Beast
skills.description_text:
Lukas transforms into his Sacred Beast form (briefly gaining Control Immunity). His base Movement Speed is increased by 30, all attributes are increased by 15%, and his skills gain new effects.
Use Again: Fires a Shockwave Blast in the target direction that will explode upon hitting an enemy hero or reaching its maximum range, dealing 450 (+155% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and causing 3 aftershocks that each deal 0 Physical Damage.
All attributes: HP, Physical Attack, Attack Speed, Physical & Magic Defense, and Attack Range.
skills.description_html:
Lukas transforms into his Sacred Beast form (briefly gaining Control Immunity). His base Movement Speed is increased by 30, all attributes are increased by 15%, and his skills gain new effects.
Use Again: Fires a Shockwave Blast in the target direction that will explode upon hitting an enemy hero or reaching its maximum range, dealing 450 (+155% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and causing 3 aftershocks that each deal 0 Physical Damage.
All attributes: HP, Physical Attack, Attack Speed, Physical & Magic Defense, and Attack Range.

quote: A legendary Sacred Beast that can take the form of a rambunctious young man.

name: Suyou

skills.name: Transient Immortal
skills.description_text:
Tap-casting any skill will put Suyou in his Mortal form, granting him 40 Movement Speed and decreasing the interval between Basic Attacks.
Hold-casting any skill will put Suyou in his Immortal form, increasing the damage of Basic Attacks to 125% and granting him 20% Physical Damage Reduction. In this form, for every 20 extra Physical Attack Suyou has, he gains 1% Physical Damage Reduction (up to 40%).
skills.description_html:
Tap-casting any skill will put Suyou in his Mortal form, granting him 40 Movement Speed and decreasing the interval between Basic Attacks.
Hold-casting any skill will put Suyou in his Immortal form, increasing the damage of Basic Attacks to 125% and granting him 20% Physical Damage Reduction. In this form, for every 20 extra Physical Attack Suyou has, he gains 1% Physical Damage Reduction (up to 40%).

skills.name: Blade Surge
skills.description_text:
Tap: Suyou throws his weapon in the target direction, dealing 250 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in its path. Suyou then blinks to the weapon's location, catches it, and performs a slash in the opposite direction, dealing 375 (+150% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
Hold: Suyou channels the Immortal's power and charges in the target direction, dealing 250 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the path. When hitting an enemy hero, he stops and stuns enemies in a rectangular area in front for 0.6s. The charge distance increases with the hold time.
Suyou can be controlled while charging, but the skill cannot be interrupted.
skills.description_html:
Tap: Suyou throws his weapon in the target direction, dealing 250 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in its path. Suyou then blinks to the weapon's location, catches it, and performs a slash in the opposite direction, dealing 375 (+150% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
Hold: Suyou channels the Immortal's power and charges in the target direction, dealing 250 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the path. When hitting an enemy hero, he stops and stuns enemies in a rectangular area in front for 0.6s. The charge distance increases with the hold time.
Suyou can be controlled while charging, but the skill cannot be interrupted.

skills.name: Soul Sever
skills.description_text:
Tap: Suyou performs a sweeping attack with his weapon, dealing Physical Damage equal to 300 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) plus 15% of target's Lost HP to enemies in a fan-shaped area.
Hold: Suyou channels the power of the Immortal to perform 3 cleaves in a fan-shaped area. The first two strikes deal 250 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage each, while the final strike deals 400 (+128% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovers 150 (+50% Extra Physical Attack) HP for himself.
skills.description_html:
Tap: Suyou performs a sweeping attack with his weapon, dealing Physical Damage equal to 300 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) plus 15% of target's Lost HP to enemies in a fan-shaped area.
Hold: Suyou channels the power of the Immortal to perform 3 cleaves in a fan-shaped area. The first two strikes deal 250 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage each, while the final strike deals 400 (+128% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovers 150 (+50% Extra Physical Attack) HP for himself.

skills.name: Evil Queller
skills.description_text:
Tap: Suyou glides backward and swings his weapon in the target direction, dealing 420 (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a rectangular area and on his path backward, and reducing their Movement Speed by 30% for 1.5s.
Hold: Suyou uses the Immortal's power to shoot a deadly arrow in the target direction, dealing 580 (+165% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target hit. The range increases with the hold time.
Suyou can be controlled while charging, but the skill cannot be interrupted.
skills.description_html:
Tap: Suyou glides backward and swings his weapon in the target direction, dealing 420 (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a rectangular area and on his path backward, and reducing their Movement Speed by 30% for 1.5s.
Hold: Suyou uses the Immortal's power to shoot a deadly arrow in the target direction, dealing 580 (+165% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target hit. The range increases with the hold time.
Suyou can be controlled while charging, but the skill cannot be interrupted.

quote: An exorcist from Zhu'an who has inherited the power of the Immortal Nuo.

name: Zhuxin

skills.name: Crimson Butterflies
skills.description_text:
Every time Zhuxin channels Lantern Flare, she converts the Mana spent into up to 15 Crimson Butterflies to follow her Spirit Lantern. After Zhuxin stops channeling Lantern Flare, the Crimson Butterflies will gradually disappear, each restoring 5% of her Max Mana.
Zhuxin has a naturally high base Max Mana, but it doesn't scale with her level.
skills.description_html:
Every time Zhuxin channels Lantern Flare, she converts the Mana spent into up to 15 Crimson Butterflies to follow her Spirit Lantern. After Zhuxin stops channeling Lantern Flare, the Crimson Butterflies will gradually disappear, each restoring 5% of her Max Mana.
Zhuxin has a naturally high base Max Mana, but it doesn't scale with her level.

skills.name: Fluttering Grace
skills.description_text: Zhuxin deals 150 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to all enemies in a fan-shaped area and applies 1 stack(s) of Soul Snare. Zhuxin also slows all enemy heroes hit by 20% and gains 20% of extra Movement Speed herself for 1.5s.
skills.description_html: Zhuxin deals 150<font color="62f8fe"> (+30% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to all enemies in a fan-shaped area and applies 1 stack(s) of <font color="a6aafb">Soul Snare</font>. Zhuxin also slows all enemy heroes hit by 20% and gains 20% of extra Movement Speed herself for 1.5s.

skills.name: Lantern Flare
skills.description_text:
Hold: Zhuxin can move the Spirit Lantern with the skill button, dealing 33 (+28% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to all enemies within range every 0.25s (damage to Minions increased by 28%) and applying Soul Snare to enemy heroes hit, each time consuming 120 Mana. When an enemy hero has 10 stacks of Soul Snare, the Crimson Butterflies will capture them, pulling them airborne for 1s.
Release: Throws all captured enemies to the target location, dealing 300 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to all enemies in the area. (If an enemy takes damage multiple times, subsequent damage taken will be reduced by 80%.)
skills.description_html:
Hold: Zhuxin can move the Spirit Lantern with the skill button, dealing 33 (+28% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to all enemies within range every 0.25s (damage to Minions increased by 28%) and applying Soul Snare to enemy heroes hit, each time consuming 120 Mana. When an enemy hero has 10 stacks of Soul Snare, the Crimson Butterflies will capture them, pulling them airborne for 1s.
Release: Throws all captured enemies to the target location, dealing 300 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to all enemies in the area. (If an enemy takes damage multiple times, subsequent damage taken will be reduced by 80%.)

skills.name: Crimson Beacon
skills.description_text: Zhuxin blinks to the target location while gaining a 400 (+100% Total Magic Power) shield. While flying, she creates a field around her for 6s. The field deals 60 (+20% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and applies 1 stack of Soul Snare to enemies every 1s.
skills.description_html: Zhuxin blinks to the target location while gaining a 400<font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> shield. While flying, she creates a field around her for 6s. The field deals 60<font color="62f8fe"> (+20% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and applies 1 stack of <font color="a6aafb">Soul Snare</font> to enemies every 1s.

quote: A mysterious young woman who guides the ember butterflies using her Lantern of Spirits.

name: Chip

skills.name: Snack Time!
skills.description_text: Chip starts eating potato chips once every 2s when out of combat, regenerating HP equal to 300 plus 45% of lost HP after finishing a whole bag (requires 4 bites). After eating a bag of chips, Chip will be full and cannot eat again for 5s. (The bite count will be saved if he enters combat before finishing a whole bag.)
skills.description_html: Chip starts eating potato chips once every 2s when out of combat, regenerating HP equal to 300 plus 45% of lost HP after finishing a whole bag (requires 4 bites). After eating a bag of chips, Chip will be full and cannot eat again for 5s. (The bite count will be saved if he enters combat before finishing a whole bag.)

skills.name: Crash Course
skills.description_text: Chip rams his hovercraft into the ground, dealing Magic Damage equal to 100 plus 4% of target's Max HP and applying Chip's Mark on enemy heroes hit. Chip gains a 300 (+60% Total Magic Power) Shield upon hitting an enemy hero, which increases by 40% for each additional enemy hero hit. Chip's next Basic Attack will become ranged and also hit all nearby enemies with Chip's Mark, detonating the mark to deal 150 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and stun each target for 0.6s.
skills.description_html: Chip rams his hovercraft into the ground, dealing <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> equal to 100 plus 4% of target's Max HP and applying <font color="a6aafb">Chip's Mark</font> on enemy heroes hit. Chip gains a 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> Shield upon hitting an enemy hero, which increases by 40% for each additional enemy hero hit. Chip's next Basic Attack will become ranged and also hit all nearby enemies with <font color="a6aafb">Chip's Mark</font>, detonating the mark to deal 150<font color="62f8fe"> (+30% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and stun each target for 0.6s.

skills.name: Overtime
skills.description_text:
Chip rushes for 2s, gaining up to 65% extra Movement Speed, after which he maintains the max speed for 2s.

Chip's next Basic Attack will cause him to charge at the enemy, dealing 200 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and knocking them back slightly.
skills.description_html:
Chip rushes for 2s, gaining up to 65% extra Movement Speed, after which he maintains the max speed for 2s.

Chip's next Basic Attack will cause him to charge at the enemy, dealing 200 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and knocking them back slightly.

skills.name: Shortcut
skills.description_text:
Chip drops the Main Portal on an enemy hero, dealing 200 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and briefly slowing them by 25%. The Main Portal deals 2 times the damage and immobilizes them for 1s after a delay. Meanwhile, he creates Connecting Portals near allied heroes 10 units away and behind the allied Base. The Main Portal and Connecting Portals last up to 15s.
Connecting Portal: Heroes (on both teams) can teleport from Connecting Portals to the Main Portal, and allied heroes gain Burst Movement Speed for 1.5s and a 500 shield.
Main Portal: The Main Portal inherits 70% of Chip's attributes. Heroes can stand on the Main Portal for 2s to return to the Connecting Portal they came from. Casting skills or launching Basic Attacks will reset the stand time.
skills.description_html:
Chip drops the Main Portal on an enemy hero, dealing 200 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and briefly slowing them by 25%. The Main Portal deals 2 times the damage and immobilizes them for 1s after a delay. Meanwhile, he creates Connecting Portals near allied heroes 10 units away and behind the allied Base. The Main Portal and Connecting Portals last up to 15s.
Connecting Portal: Heroes (on both teams) can teleport from Connecting Portals to the Main Portal, and allied heroes gain Burst Movement Speed for 1.5s and a 500 shield.
Main Portal: The Main Portal inherits 70% of Chip's attributes. Heroes can stand on the Main Portal for 2s to return to the Connecting Portal they came from. Casting skills or launching Basic Attacks will reset the stand time.

skills.name: Why Walk?
skills.description_text: Chip has 4 fixed Beacons on the map when the battle starts. Use this skill to teleport to any other Beacon. (This skill cannot be used in combat.)
skills.description_html: Chip has 4 fixed <font color="a6aafb">Beacons</font> on the map when the battle starts. Use this skill to teleport to any other <font color="a6aafb">Beacon</font>. (This skill cannot be used in combat.)

quote: A carefree, genetically enhanced fox that wields advanced portal technology.

name: Cici

skills.name: Performer's Delight
skills.description_text: Cici generates a stack of Delight after dealing damage, increasing her Movement Speed by 0.75% and Spell Vamp by 0.75% per stack up to 10 times, doubling the effects at full stacks.
skills.description_html: Cici generates a stack of Delight after dealing damage, increasing her Movement Speed by 0.75% and Spell Vamp by 0.75% per stack up to 10 times, doubling the effects at full stacks.

skills.name: Yo-Yo Blitz
skills.description_text:
Cici uses Yoyo to continuously attack the nearest enemy within range (prioritizing heroes) for 3.5s, hitting them up to 10 times, and dealing Physical Damage equal to 70 plus 3 (+1.2% Extra Physical Attack)% of the target's Max HP per hit. Cici can move and use other skills during this attack.

If there is no enemy within range, Yoyo will attack Turrets or the Base instead.

This skill deals 20% extra damage to Minions.
skills.description_html:
Cici uses Yoyo to continuously attack the nearest enemy within range (prioritizing heroes) for 3.5s, hitting them up to 10 times, and dealing Physical Damage equal to 70 plus 3 (+1.2% Extra Physical Attack)% of the target's Max HP per hit. Cici can move and use other skills during this attack.

If there is no enemy within range, Yoyo will attack Turrets or the Base instead.

This skill deals 20% extra damage to Minions.

skills.name: Buoyant Bounce
skills.description_text: Cici leaps to a target location. If she lands on any unit (not including Turrets and Base), she can leap again in the Joystick's direction. If she lands on an enemy with the first leap, she deals 200 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to them.
skills.description_html: Cici leaps to a target location. If she lands on any unit (not including Turrets and Base), she can leap again in the Joystick's direction. If she lands on an enemy with the first leap, she deals 200<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to them.

skills.name: Curtain Call
skills.description_text:
Cici throws Yoyo at the target enemy hero and links them with another nearby enemy hero, dealing 100 (+10% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage, slowing them by 30%, and pulling them together for 4s.

During this time, Cici can use Yo-Yo Blitz to attack both linked targets at the same time. If only one target is within the range of Yo-Yo Blitz, Cici will attack the target twice, but the damage of the second attack will be reduced to 25%.
skills.description_html:
Cici throws Yoyo at the target enemy hero and links them with another nearby enemy hero, dealing 100 (+10% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage, slowing them by 30%, and pulling them together for 4s.

During this time, Cici can use Yo-Yo Blitz to attack both linked targets at the same time. If only one target is within the range of Yo-Yo Blitz, Cici will attack the target twice, but the damage of the second attack will be reduced to 25%.

quote: A cheerful performer who spreads fun and wonderment wherever she goes.

name: Nolan

skills.name: Dimensional Rift
skills.description_text:
Nolan's skills will leave a Rift. When a rift comes into contact with another rift, they will activate and pull enemies to their center and deal 240 (+140% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage after a short delay. Each time a rift activation hits an enemy, Nolan will gain 20 Energy. If an enemy is hit by multiple rift activations, the damage after the first hit will be reduced by 40%.
Cosmic Leap: If Nolan does not deal or take damage for 5s, he enhances his next Basic Attack to dash to the target, dealing (+120% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and leaving a Rift. (Damage to and from Minions or Creeps will not prevent Nolan from getting this effect.)
skills.description_html:
Nolan's skills will leave a Rift. When a rift comes into contact with another rift, they will activate and pull enemies to their center and deal 240 (+140% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage after a short delay. Each time a rift activation hits an enemy, Nolan will gain 20 Energy. If an enemy is hit by multiple rift activations, the damage after the first hit will be reduced by 40%.
Cosmic Leap: If Nolan does not deal or take damage for 5s, he enhances his next Basic Attack to dash to the target, dealing (+120% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and leaving a Rift. (Damage to and from Minions or Creeps will not prevent Nolan from getting this effect.)

skills.name: Expansion
skills.description_text: Nolan cuts a rectangular area in front of him with his cosmic gauge, dealing 230 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and leaving a Rift at the first enemy hit.
skills.description_html: Nolan cuts a rectangular area in front of him with his cosmic gauge, dealing 230<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and leaving a <font color="a6aafb">Rift</font> at the first enemy hit.

skills.name: Gauge
skills.description_text: Nolan charges in the target direction and slashes with his cosmic gauge, dealing 70 (+13% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in his path and leaving a Rift.
skills.description_html: Nolan charges in the target direction and slashes with his cosmic gauge, dealing 70<font color="fba51f"> (+13% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in his path and leaving a <font color="a6aafb">Rift</font>.

skills.name: Fracture
skills.description_text: Nolan slashes at the target location 3 times, dealing 120 (+50% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage with each slash while leaving 3 rifts and slowing the target hit by 30% for 0.5s. The rifts will be activated automatically while Nolan dashes backward.
skills.description_html: Nolan slashes at the target location 3 times, dealing 120<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> with each slash while leaving 3 rifts and slowing the target hit by 30% for 0.5s. The rifts will be activated automatically while Nolan dashes backward.

quote: A scholar that wanders the universe with split souls to save his daughter.

name: Ixia

skills.name: Siphon Starlium
skills.description_text:
Ixia's Basic Attacks and skills apply a stack of Starlium Charge to enemies on hit. When Ixia performs a Basic Attack on an enemy with two stacks of Starlium Charge, the attack will consume the stacks and be replaced with Siphon Starlium, dealing (+150% Total Physical Attack) (+200 Lifesteal) plus (+10*Hero Level) Physical Damage to the target. Ixia recovers HP equal to the damage dealt by Siphon Starlium (only 20(+150 Lifesteal)% against non-hero units).
Siphon Starlium can trigger on all enemies in front of Ixia that are within her Basic Attack range, but it cannot Crit.
Ixia's Basic Attacks cannot trigger Lifesteal.
skills.description_html:

When Ixia performs a Basic Attack on an enemy with two stacks of Starlium Charge, the attack will consume the stacks and be replaced with Siphon Starlium, dealing (+150% Total Physical Attack) (+200 Lifesteal) plus (+10*Hero Level) Physical Damage to the target. Ixia recovers HP equal to the damage dealt by Siphon Starlium (only 20(+150 Lifesteal)% against non-hero units).
Siphon Starlium can trigger on all enemies in front of Ixia that are within her Basic Attack range, but it cannot Crit.
Ixia's Basic Attacks cannot trigger Lifesteal.

skills.name: Dual Beam
skills.description_text:
Ixia fires 2 Starlium-charged energy beams along the ground in the target direction, dealing 75 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a rectangular area and slowing enemy heroes by 50%. Upon hitting an enemy hero, Ixia also gains 2 Movement Speed for s.

Enemies hit by both beams will take double damage.
skills.description_html:

Enemies hit by both beams will take double damage.

skills.name: Star Helix
skills.description_text: Ixia unleashes a canister of Starlium energy in the target direction, knocking back nearby enemies, and pulling enemies in range to the center line after a short delay and dealing 200 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
skills.description_html: Ixia unleashes a canister of Starlium energy in the target direction, knocking back nearby enemies, and pulling enemies in range to the center line after a short delay and dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

skills.name: Full Barrage
skills.description_text: Ixia reassembles her weapon into 6 smaller weapons and enters the Barrage state for 4s. In this state, Ixia's Basic Attacks and skills can hit enemies in the large fan-shaped area in front of her but not outside it. Ixia's Basic Attacks can hit up to 6 enemy units (prioritizes heroes), and Siphon Starlium will fire simultaneously with her normal Basic Attacks.
skills.description_html: Ixia reassembles her weapon into 6 smaller weapons and enters the <font color="a6aafb">Barrage</font> state for 4s. quote: The leader of Bad Soul and self-proclaimed inventor, she wields a homemade weapon powered by a stolen Starlium reactor.

name: Arlott

skills.name: Demon Gaze
skills.description_text:
Arlott possesses a demonic eye that will Mark enemy units near Arlott that become affected by control effects for 7s.
The eye will also automatically Mark a nearby enemy hero in vision every 7s.
skills.description_html:
Arlott possesses a demonic eye that will Mark enemy units near Arlott that become affected by control effects for 7s.
The eye will also automatically Mark a nearby enemy hero in vision every 7s.

skills.name: Dauntless Strike
skills.description_text: Arlott swings his lance forward, dealing 200 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and briefly stunning targets in an area. Targets hit by the farther part of the AOE will be stunned for 1s instead.
skills.description_html: Arlott swings his lance forward, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and briefly stunning targets in an area. Targets hit by the farther part of the AOE will be stunned for 1s instead.

skills.name: Vengeance
skills.description_text:
Arlott charges at an enemy, dealing 135 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage (this skill cannot be interrupted during movement).
If Arlott's target is Marked, he gains a brief burst of Movement Speed, and this skill will deal double damage, immediately refresh its cooldown, and recover 70 (+60% Total Physical Attack) HP to Arlott (only restores 50% of that amount when used on a non-hero unit).
skills.description_html:
Arlott charges at an enemy, dealing 135 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage (this skill cannot be interrupted during movement).
If Arlott's target is Marked, he gains a brief burst of Movement Speed, and this skill will deal double damage, immediately refresh its cooldown, and recover 70 (+60% Total Physical Attack) HP to Arlott (only restores 50% of that amount when used on a non-hero unit).

skills.name: Final Slash
skills.description_text:
Passive: Each level-up reduces Demon Gaze's interval by 1s.
Active: Arlott cleaves in front of him, dealing 400 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to targets in the area while pushing them to the end of the AOE and briefly revealing their location (this skill can only be interrupted by Suppression).

quote: A demon human hybrid wielding two lances with a thirst for vengeance against both the Church and demons.

name: Novaria

skills.name: Star Trail
skills.description_text: Astral Spheres summoned by Novaria will continuously slow nearby enemies by 20% and grant vision of them.
skills.description_html: <font color="a6aafb">Astral Spheres</font> summoned by Novaria will continuously slow nearby enemies by 20% and grant vision of them.

skills.name: Astral Meteor
skills.description_text: Novaria summons an Astral Sphere at the target location, continuously dealing 75 (+25% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies. After 2s, the sphere will explode, dealing Magic Damage equal to 260 (+50% Total Magic Power) plus 4% of the enemy's Max HP to nearby enemies, and increasing Astral Sphere's slow effect to 2.5 times the original slow effect.
skills.description_html: Novaria summons an <font color="a6aafb">Astral Sphere</font> at the target location, continuously dealing 75<font color="62f8fe"> (+25% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies. After 2s, the sphere will explode, dealing <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> equal to 260<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> plus 4% of the enemy's Max HP to nearby enemies, and increasing <font color="a6aafb">Astral Sphere's</font> slow effect to 2.5 times the original slow effect.

skills.name: Astral Recall
skills.description_text:
Novaria summons an Astral Sphere at a distance and draws it towards her. At the same time, Novaria gains 20% Movement Speed and can pass through terrain. Passing through a wall will increase the Movement Speed bonus to 60%.

When the Astral Sphere reaches Novaria, she can cast Star Shatter to launch it in a target direction within 5s. The sphere will explode when hitting an enemy hero, dealing Magic Damage equal to 230 (+70% Total Magic Power) plus 4% of the target's Max HP. The damage will increase based on the Astral Sphere's travel distance (starting from when the sphere is summoned), up to 2.5 times the original damage.
skills.description_html:
Novaria summons an Astral Sphere at a distance and draws it towards her. At the same time, Novaria gains 20% Movement Speed and can pass through terrain. Passing through a wall will increase the Movement Speed bonus to 60%.

When the Astral Sphere reaches Novaria, she can cast Star Shatter to launch it in a target direction within 5s. The sphere will explode when hitting an enemy hero, dealing Magic Damage equal to 230 (+70% Total Magic Power) plus 4% of the target's Max HP. The damage will increase based on the Astral Sphere's travel distance (starting from when the sphere is summoned), up to 2.5 times the original damage.

skills.name: Astral Echo
skills.description_text: Novaria scatters Astral Echo in the target direction, briefly slowing enemy heroes hit by 50% while applying Astral Ring on them, increasing their hitbox by 2.5 times and revealing their surrounding area. This effect lasts 5s.
skills.description_html: Novaria scatters <font color="a6aafb">Astral Echo</font> in the target direction, briefly slowing enemy heroes hit by 50% while applying <font color="a6aafb">Astral Ring</font> on them, increasing their hitbox by 2.5 times and revealing their surrounding area. This effect lasts 5s.

quote: The young girl who seeks to rebuild the Star Atlas in order to solve the secrets of the Stars.

name: Joy

skills.name: Humph, Joy's Angry!
skills.description_text:
Joy becomes Angry! each time her skill hits a non-Minion enemy, dealing 100 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and increasing her Movement Speed by 60% that decays over 4s (hitting the Leonin Crystal will also grant the Movement Speed effect). This effect has a cooldown of 4s for each target.

Joy's Basic Attack will deal 65 (+65% Total Physical Attack) (+65% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.
skills.description_html:
Joy becomes Angry! each time her skill hits a non-Minion enemy, dealing 100 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and increasing her Movement Speed by 60% that decays over 4s (hitting the Leonin Crystal will also grant the Movement Speed effect). This effect has a cooldown of 4s for each target.

Joy's Basic Attack will deal 65 (+65% Total Physical Attack) (+65% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.

skills.name: Look, Leonin Crystal!
skills.description_text: Joy summons a Leonin Crystal at the target location, dealing 200 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 30% for 1s. The Leonin Crystal lasts up to 2s.
skills.description_html: Joy summons a <font color="a6aafb">Leonin Crystal</font> at the target location, dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies and slowing them by 30% for 1s. The <font color="a6aafb">Leonin Crystal</font> lasts up to 2s.

skills.name: Meow, Rhythm of Joy!
skills.description_text:
Joy dashes in the target direction, dealing 120 (+55% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in her path. Hitting an enemy or the Leonin Crystal allows Joy to cast this skill again within 0.8s and gain 1 Beat Energy. Casting this skill on the beat increases the skill damage by 100% and grants a 80 (+60% Total Magic Power) shield that lasts 3s.

This skill can be cast up to 4 times in succession.
skills.description_html:
Joy dashes in the target direction, dealing 120 (+55% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in her path. Hitting an enemy or the Leonin Crystal allows Joy to cast this skill again within 0.8s and gain 1 Beat Energy. Casting this skill on the beat increases the skill damage by 100% and grants a 80 (+60% Total Magic Power) shield that lasts 3s.

This skill can be cast up to 4 times in succession.

skills.name: Ha, Electrifying Beats!
skills.description_text:
Joy increases her Physical & Magic Defense by 15 (+10% Total Magic Power) and gains 30% Movement Speed. Over the next 3s, she pulses 8 times, dealing 120 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage each time to nearby enemies.
Each Meow, Rhythm of Joy! cast on the beat increases this skill's damage by 40%. If perfect rhythm is achieved by hitting every beat with Meow, Rhythm of Joy!, Joy also gains 40% Spell Vamp while this skill is active.
This skill unlocks when Joy acquires Beat Energy. Casting this skill with 3 Beat Energy will remove all debuffs on Joy and make her immune to slow effects while this skill is active.
skills.description_html:

quote: The "Child of Miracle" who returned to the Leonins after years of wandering.

name: Fredrinn

skills.name: Crystalline Armor
skills.description_text:
Fredrinn gains 1 Combo Point that lasts 5s each time his skill hits a non-minion enemy, up to 4 Combo Points. His Ultimates cost different numbers of Combo Points.

Fredrinn stores 100% of the damage he receives as Crystal Energy, which decays after 5s at a rate of 10% Max HP per second.
Fredrinn can convert the stored Crystal Energy into HP by 20% of his damage dealt (10% for damage dealt to minions). Gaining a Combo Point resets the decaying timer.
skills.description_html:
Fredrinn gains 1 Combo Point that lasts 5s each time his skill hits a non-minion enemy, up to 4 Combo Points. His Ultimates cost different numbers of Combo Points.

Fredrinn stores 100% of the damage he receives as Crystal Energy, which decays after 5s at a rate of 10% Max HP per second.
Fredrinn can convert the stored Crystal Energy into HP by 20% of his damage dealt (10% for damage dealt to minions). Gaining a Combo Point resets the decaying timer.

skills.name: Piercing Strike
skills.description_text:
Fredrinn thrusts his sword in the target direction, dealing 125 (+7% Total HP) (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 30% for 2s. His next Basic Attack gains extra attack range and deals 85 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
This skill deals 200% damage to non-hero enemies.
skills.description_html:
Fredrinn thrusts his sword in the target direction, dealing 125 (+7% Total HP) (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 30% for 2s. His next Basic Attack gains extra attack range and deals 85 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
This skill deals 200% damage to non-hero enemies.

skills.name: Brave Assault
skills.description_text: Fredrinn dashes in the target direction, dealing 140 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first non-minion enemy hit. His next Basic Attack knocks the target airborne for 0.3s.
skills.description_html: Fredrinn dashes in the target direction, dealing 140<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the first non-minion enemy hit. His next Basic Attack knocks the target airborne for 0.3s.

skills.name: Energy Eruption
skills.description_text:
Fredrinn deals 210 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and taunts them for 1s. Hitting a non-minion enemy grants Fredrinn 25 Physical & Magic Defense for 3s and reduces the cooldowns of Piercing Strike and Brave Assault by 75%.
This skill costs 1 Combo Point.
skills.description_html:
Fredrinn deals 210 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and taunts them for 1s. Hitting a non-minion enemy grants Fredrinn 25 Physical & Magic Defense for 3s and reduces the cooldowns of Piercing Strike and Brave Assault by 75%.
This skill costs 1 Combo Point.

skills.name: Appraiser's Wrath
skills.description_text:
Fredrinn slams his sword in the target direction (this skill can only be interrupted by Suppression), dealing 600 plus 21% of his Crystal Energy as Physical Damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area after a short delay. Enemies in the center of the area take 175% damage. This skill doubles the conversion ratio based on damage dealt to enemy heroes from stored Crystal Energy to HP.
This skill costs 3 Combo Points.
skills.description_html:

quote: A master treasure appraiser in Los Pecados accumulating wealth and searching for his lost friend.

name: Julian

skills.name: Smith's Legacy
skills.description_text:
After casting two different skills, Julian enhances his third skill. Casting the enhanced skill makes all his skills go on a 9-6s Cooldown (decreases with his level).
After casting any skill, his Basic Attacks for the next 2s will deal 100 (+100% Total Physical Attack) (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and pull the target toward him (deals 75% damage to Creeps). Casting another skill extends the duration.
Julian gains 15% extra Hybrid Lifesteal for 5s each time he hits an enemy hero with his skills (up to 3 stacks).
skills.description_html:
After casting two different skills, Julian enhances his third skill. Casting the enhanced skill makes all his skills go on a 9-6s Cooldown (decreases with his level).
After casting any skill, his Basic Attacks for the next 2s will deal 100 (+100% Total Physical Attack) (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and pull the target toward him (deals 75% damage to Creeps). Casting another skill extends the duration.
Julian gains 15% extra Hybrid Lifesteal for 5s each time he hits an enemy hero with his skills (up to 3 stacks).

skills.name: Scythe
skills.description_text:
Julian hurls a flying scythe in the target direction, dealing 420 (+140% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way and slowing them by 30% for 1s.
The scythe disappears upon hitting a non-minion enemy.
skills.description_html:
Julian hurls a flying scythe in the target direction, dealing 420 (+140% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way and slowing them by 30% for 1s.
The scythe disappears upon hitting a non-minion enemy.

skills.name: Sword
skills.description_text: Julian summons a flying sword and dashes in the target direction, dealing 400 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way.
skills.description_html: Julian summons a flying sword and dashes in the target direction, dealing 400<font color="62f8fe"> (+80% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies along the way.

skills.name: Chain
skills.description_text: Julian casts chains at the target location, dealing 300 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit after a short delay and immobilizing them for 1.2s.
skills.description_html: Julian casts chains at the target location, dealing 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit after a short delay and immobilizing them for 1.2s.

quote: A Raven assassin of the Church of Light, a young boy who's in search of his home…

name: Xavier

skills.name: Transcendence
skills.description_text:
Xavier enhances his subsequent skills each time his skill hits an enemy hero. Stage I: Increases Movement Speed by 50% when subsequent skills hit, decaying over 1.2s. Stage II: Width of subsequent skills will be greatly increased. Stage III: Skill Cooldown reduced by 4s (36s for the Ultimate). At Stage III, Xavier enters the Transcendence state.

Transcendence: All of Xavier's skills are enhanced to Stage III state for 5s (this duration is extended by 1s each time Xavier's skill hits an enemy).
skills.description_html:
Xavier enhances his subsequent skills each time his skill hits an enemy hero. Stage I: Increases Movement Speed by 50% when subsequent skills hit, decaying over 1.2s. Stage II: Width of subsequent skills will be greatly increased. Stage III: Skill Cooldown reduced by 4s (36s for the Ultimate). At Stage III, Xavier enters the Transcendence state.

Transcendence: All of Xavier's skills are enhanced to Stage III state for 5s (this duration is extended by 1s each time Xavier's skill hits an enemy).

skills.name: Infinite Extension
skills.description_text:
Xavier fires a Mystic Bullet that deals 480 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies it passes through.

The Bullet's flying distance increases each time it hits an enemy or the Mystic Barrier (up to 5 times).
skills.description_html:
Xavier fires a Mystic Bullet that deals 480 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies it passes through.

The Bullet's flying distance increases each time it hits an enemy or the Mystic Barrier (up to 5 times).

skills.name: Mystic Field
skills.description_text:
Xavier conjures a Mystic Barrier that lasts 5s. Enemies that come into contact with the Barrier will take 220 (+65% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and be slowed by 50%, while allies will gain 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 1.2s.
When hit by Xavier's other skills, the Barrier expands into a Mystic Field for 3s, dealing 220 (+65% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies within and immobilizing them for 1.2s.
skills.description_html:
Xavier conjures a Mystic Barrier that lasts 5s. Enemies that come into contact with the Barrier will take 220 (+65% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and be slowed by 50%, while allies will gain 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 1.2s.
When hit by Xavier's other skills, the Barrier expands into a Mystic Field for 3s, dealing 220 (+65% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies within and immobilizing them for 1.2s.

skills.name: Dawning Light
skills.description_text:
Xavier unleashes a beam of Mystic magic in the target direction, dealing 600 (+180% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to all enemies along its path.

Once cast, he also directly enters the Transcendence state and resets the state's duration.
skills.description_html:
Xavier unleashes a beam of Mystic magic in the target direction, dealing 600 (+180% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to all enemies along its path.

Once cast, he also directly enters the Transcendence state and resets the state's duration.

quote: Former member of the Knights of Light who's determined to forge a path of his own.

name: Melissa

skills.name: Doll Buster
skills.description_text:
"My tailor shop excels at fixing and 'fixing' dolls. Am I right, Muddles?"

(Melissa deals 125% damage to Minions, Creeps, and Summoned Units.)
skills.description_html:
"My tailor shop excels at fixing and 'fixing' dolls. Am I right, Muddles?"

(Melissa deals 125% damage to Minions, Creeps, and Summoned Units.)

skills.name: Falling!
skills.description_text:
"Watch me slide forward and increase my Attack Speed for 3 seconds— Ah, that was just boring…"

"Muddles, go that way!"
"Cuddles, come here!"

(The skill's cooldown is reduced by 0.5s each time Melissa damages the enemy by attacking Muddles.)
skills.description_html:
"Watch me slide forward and increase my Attack Speed for 3 seconds— Ah, that was just boring…"

"Muddles, go that way!"
"Cuddles, come here!"

(The skill's cooldown is reduced by 0.5s each time Melissa damages the enemy by attacking Muddles.)

skills.name: Eyes on You!
skills.description_text:
The plan's like this: Throw Muddles out to hold down the bad guys, and then… I come on stage!
"I puncture the bad guys, while Giggles hit Muddles to punish them as well! Hee, fantastic!"

(Muddles deals 250 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage on the first hit and links nearby enemies for up to 6s. Linked enemies are slowed by 60% that decays over 1.5s and can break the link by moving out of the range. Muddles will return to Melissa early when there are no enemies around and immediately if she's too far away. When Muddles is present, you can tap the Attack Minion button to directly attack Muddles, though it cannot trigger the multi-hit damage. Giggles only hits Muddles when Melissa has a target for her Basic Attack.)

skills.name: Go Away!
skills.description_text:
Cuddles, protect me! For 4 seconds, let no bad guys come close. Unless I say otherwise!

(When activated, the field knocks back enemies in the area and deals them 500 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. It'll then continuously knock back enemies who attempt to enter the field, dealing them 50 (+10% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and briefly slowing them. The field will also interrupt the enemy's movement skills unless they're immune to control effects. The field will move with Melissa once, when she's about to move out of the boundary.
Passive: Melissa's Physical & Magic Defense are increased by 3. This effect is increased to 5 times when the skill is active.)

quote: A girl with cursed needles who runs a tailor shop and solves problems for clients.

name: Yin

skills.name: Leave It to Me
skills.description_text: If there are no allied heroes within 4 units of Yin, his damage is increased to 120% and he gains 8% Spell Vamp.
skills.description_html: If there are no allied heroes within 4 units of Yin, his damage is increased to 120% and he gains 8% Spell Vamp.

skills.name: Charged Punch
skills.description_text:
Yin gains 60% extra Movement Speed (decays over 3s).
Yin can launch an enhanced Basic Attack that deals 25 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage within the duration. Upon hitting an enemy with the enhanced Basic Attack, Yin will throw another charged punch forward, dealing 360 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the path.
Successfully throwing the charged punch reduces the skill's cooldown by 35%.
skills.description_html:
Yin gains 60% extra Movement Speed (decays over 3s).
Yin can launch an enhanced Basic Attack that deals 25 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage within the duration. Upon hitting an enemy with the enhanced Basic Attack, Yin will throw another charged punch forward, dealing 360 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the path.
Successfully throwing the charged punch reduces the skill's cooldown by 35%.

skills.name: Instant Blast
skills.description_text:
Yin dashes forward, leaving a Golden Ring behind while dealing 75 (+35% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way. He gains 30% extra Damage Reduction for 4s if an enemy hero is hit.
After 1s, the Golden Ring will catch up with Yin, dealing 150 (+70% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies it passes through and stunning them for 1s.
skills.description_html:
Yin dashes forward, leaving a Golden Ring behind while dealing 75 (+35% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way. He gains 30% extra Damage Reduction for 4s if an enemy hero is hit.
After 1s, the Golden Ring will catch up with Yin, dealing 150 (+70% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies it passes through and stunning them for 1s.

skills.name: My Turn
skills.description_text:
After a short delay, Yin locks onto an enemy hero (cannot lock onto pets or clones) and pulls them into a domain for up to 8s and turns into Lieh. When in the domain, the two cannot be affected by other heroes' skills.
Lieh has stronger skills and 50 extra Physical & Magic Defense that last 8s.
The domain will end early if either of the two is killed. If Lieh successfully kills the enemy, he'll recover 20% of his Max HP, leave the domain with the cooldowns of Frenzy Strike and Instant Blast reset, and continue to fight as Lieh for 8s.
If Yin fails to pull his target into the domain, the skill will enter a 3s cooldown.
skills.description_html:
After a short delay, Yin locks onto an enemy hero (cannot lock onto pets or clones) and pulls them into a domain for up to 8s and turns into Lieh. When in the domain, the two cannot be affected by other heroes' skills.
Lieh has stronger skills and 50 extra Physical & Magic Defense that last 8s.
The domain will end early if either of the two is killed. If Lieh successfully kills the enemy, he'll recover 20% of his Max HP, leave the domain with the cooldowns of Frenzy Strike and Instant Blast reset, and continue to fight as Lieh for 8s.
If Yin fails to pull his target into the domain, the skill will enter a 3s cooldown.

quote: A young martial artist on a journey to defeat the Evil God that dwells within him.

name: Floryn

skills.name: Dew
skills.description_text:
Dew's Lantern will permanently increase Floryn's attributes by a small amount.

After leaving combat for 5s, Floryn can share the Flower of Hope with an allied hero (30s cooldown), which will grant them a 150 (+80% Total Magic Power) shield each time they are healed by Floryn.

Floryn will never sell the Lantern.
skills.description_html:
Dew's Lantern will permanently increase Floryn's attributes by a small amount.

After leaving combat for 5s, Floryn can share the Flower of Hope with an allied hero (30s cooldown), which will grant them a 150 (+80% Total Magic Power) shield each time they are healed by Floryn.

Floryn will never sell the Lantern.

skills.name: Sow
skills.description_text: Floryn tosses an Energy Seed at the target enemy, dealing 180 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. Healing Fruits will then spawn and bounce to nearby allied heroes, restoring their HP by 175 (+90% Total Magic Power).
skills.description_html: Floryn tosses an Energy Seed at the target enemy, dealing 180<font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>. Healing Fruits will then spawn and bounce to nearby allied heroes, restoring their <font color="26e407">HP</font> by 175<font color="62f8fe"> (+90% Total Magic Power)</font>.

skills.name: Sprout
skills.description_text: Floryn casts a blob of energy ahead that explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing 175 (+90% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies and stunning them for 0.7s (and revealing their positions briefly).
skills.description_html: Floryn casts a blob of energy ahead that explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing 175<font color="62f8fe"> (+90% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies and stunning them for 0.7s (and revealing their positions briefly).

skills.name: Bloom
skills.description_text: Floryn resonates with Dew's power, recovering 250 (+100% Total Magic Power) HP for all allied heroes 2 times no matter where they are. This effect also increases their Shield and HP Regen effects by 12% for 2s.
skills.description_html: Floryn resonates with Dew's power, recovering 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="26e407">HP</font> for all allied heroes 2 times no matter where they are. This effect also increases their Shield and HP Regen effects by 12% for 2s.

quote: A kind-hearted girl who is determined to spread greenery throughout the world.

name: Edith

skills.name: Overload
skills.description_text:
After each skill cast, Edith and Phylax become Overloaded for 3s, during which all Basic Attacks will trigger chain lightning, dealing extra Magic Damage equal to (+20% Total Magic Power) plus 3(+0.2*Hero Level)% of the target's Max HP to up to 4 enemies.
Chain lightning damage against Minions is increased to 150%.
skills.description_html:
After each skill cast, Edith and Phylax become Overloaded for 3s, during which all Basic Attacks will trigger chain lightning, dealing extra Magic Damage equal to (+20% Total Magic Power) plus 3(+0.2*Hero Level)% of the target's Max HP to up to 4 enemies.
Chain lightning damage against Minions is increased to 150%.

skills.name: Earth Shatter
skills.description_text:
After a 0.75s delay, Edith controls Phylax to launch an earth-shattering blow in a designated direction, dealing 225 (+10% Total HP) Physical Damage to enemies hit (deals 120% damage to minions) and knocking them airborne for 0.8s.
This skill can only be interrupted by Suppression.
skills.description_html:
After a 0.75s delay, Edith controls Phylax to launch an earth-shattering blow in a designated direction, dealing 225 (+10% Total HP) Physical Damage to enemies hit (deals 120% damage to minions) and knocking them airborne for 0.8s.
This skill can only be interrupted by Suppression.

skills.name: Onward
skills.description_text:
Edith controls Phylax to charge in the target direction, dealing 90 (+3% Total HP) Physical Damage to enemies along the way.

If Phylax hits an enemy hero during the charge, it will stop immediately and throw them over its shoulder, dealing 108 (+5% Total HP) Physical Damage.
skills.description_html:
Edith controls Phylax to charge in the target direction, dealing 90 (+3% Total HP) Physical Damage to enemies along the way.

If Phylax hits an enemy hero during the charge, it will stop immediately and throw them over its shoulder, dealing 108 (+5% Total HP) Physical Damage.

skills.name: Primal Wrath
skills.description_text:
Passive: When inside Phylax, Edith can accumulate Wrath according to the damage she receives (calculated before damage reduction).

Active: Edith ejects herself forward from Phylax, knocking back nearby enemies. After that, she takes flight and can perform ranged Basic Attacks, each dealing 35 (+75% Total Physical Attack) (+25% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. Edith also gains new skills in this state. When in flight, Edith gains 350 (+5% Total HP)-350 (+20% Total HP) extra Shield, 50%-150% extra Attack Speed and 5%-20% Hybrid Lifesteal based on the Wrath she accumulated, and converts each point of Extra Physical Defense and Extra Magic Defense into 3.5 Magic Power. The flight state lasts up to 8s.
skills.description_html:
Passive: When inside Phylax, Edith can accumulate Wrath according to the damage she receives (calculated before damage reduction).

Active: Edith ejects herself forward from Phylax, knocking back nearby enemies. After that, she takes flight and can perform ranged Basic Attacks, each dealing 35 (+75% Total Physical Attack) (+25% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. Edith also gains new skills in this state. When in flight, Edith gains 350 (+5% Total HP)-350 (+20% Total HP) extra Shield, 50%-150% extra Attack Speed and 5%-20% Hybrid Lifesteal based on the Wrath she accumulated, and converts each point of Extra Physical Defense and Extra Magic Defense into 3.5 Magic Power. The flight state lasts up to 8s.

quote: Forsaken Warden with sealed memories.

name: Valentina

skills.name: Primal Force
skills.description_text:
Valentina gains 8-50 extra EXP each time she deals damage to an enemy hero. Cooldown: 2s.
If the enemy hero's level isn't higher than Valentina's, 30% of the damage dealt is converted into her HP. The EXP scales with Valentina's level.
skills.description_html:
Valentina gains 8-50 extra EXP each time she deals damage to an enemy hero. Cooldown: 2s.
If the enemy hero's level isn't higher than Valentina's, 30% of the damage dealt is converted into her HP. The EXP scales with Valentina's level.

skills.name: Shadow Strike
skills.description_text:
Valentina casts Shadow Strike in the target direction, dealing 300 (+165% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 40% for 1s.
Enemy heroes hit by Shadow Strike are marked with a Shadow Sigil for 4s and will be terrified for 1s when hit by Shadow Strike again within the duration (a unit can only be terrified once within 4s).
skills.description_html:
Valentina casts Shadow Strike in the target direction, dealing 300 (+165% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 40% for 1s.
Enemy heroes hit by Shadow Strike are marked with a Shadow Sigil for 4s and will be terrified for 1s when hit by Shadow Strike again within the duration (a unit can only be terrified once within 4s).

skills.name: Arcane Shade
skills.description_text:
Valentina dashes in the target direction, firing 3 Shadow Bolts at nearby enemies that deal 125 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage each. Valentina can cast this skill again within 6s (costs Mana).

The cooldown of Shadow Strike is reduced by 1s each time a Shadow Bolt hits an enemy.
skills.description_html:
Valentina dashes in the target direction, firing 3 Shadow Bolts at nearby enemies that deal 125 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage each. Valentina can cast this skill again within 6s (costs Mana).

The cooldown of Shadow Strike is reduced by 1s each time a Shadow Bolt hits an enemy.

skills.name: I Am You
skills.description_text:
Valentina slows the target enemy hero by 70% for 0.5s and gains the ability to cast their Ultimate. Casting the enemy's Ultimate turns Valentina into the enemy hero's form and allows her to inherit their Basic Attack type for up to 12s. Her skills remain unchanged unless the enemy's Ultimate has a Morph effect.
The stolen Ultimate's level will be equal to Valentina's Ultimate level and the Ultimate cooldown will be 120% of the target's Ultimate cooldown (but no lower than 10s). Valentina gains (+100% Total Magic Power) Physical Attack for the duration if the enemy is a Physical Damage hero. This cannot be used on an enemy Valentina.
skills.description_html:
Valentina slows the target enemy hero by 70% for 0.5s and gains the ability to cast their Ultimate. Casting the enemy's Ultimate turns Valentina into the enemy hero's form and allows her to inherit their Basic Attack type for up to 12s. Her skills remain unchanged unless the enemy's Ultimate has a Morph effect.
The stolen Ultimate's level will be equal to Valentina's Ultimate level and the Ultimate cooldown will be 120% of the target's Ultimate cooldown (but no lower than 10s). Valentina gains (+100% Total Magic Power) Physical Attack for the duration if the enemy is a Physical Damage hero. This cannot be used on an enemy Valentina.

quote: Former head of House Paxley who'd stop at nothing to revive her lover.

name: Aamon

skills.name: Invisible Armor
skills.description_text:
Aamon enters the Camouflage state each time he hits an enemy with a skill, during which he cannot be targeted, recovers 25 (+15% Total Magic Power) plus 3% of his lost HP every 0.5s, and gains 80% extra Movement Speed that rapidly decays over 3s.
Upon leaving the Camouflage state, Aamon immediately resets his Basic Attack's cooldown and enhances his Basic Attacks within the next 3s. Each enhanced Basic Attack deals 70 (+100% Total Physical Attack) (+115% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. The first attack after actively leaving Camouflage is enhanced to deal 84 (+120% Total Physical Attack) (+138% Total Magic Power) damage and reduces all skill cooldowns by 1s.
skills.description_html:
Aamon enters the Camouflage state each time he hits an enemy with a skill, during which he cannot be targeted, recovers 25 (+15% Total Magic Power) plus 3% of his lost HP every 0.5s, and gains 80% extra Movement Speed that rapidly decays over 3s.
Upon leaving the Camouflage state, Aamon immediately resets his Basic Attack's cooldown and enhances his Basic Attacks within the next 3s. Each enhanced Basic Attack deals 70 (+100% Total Physical Attack) (+115% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. The first attack after actively leaving Camouflage is enhanced to deal 84 (+120% Total Physical Attack) (+138% Total Magic Power) damage and reduces all skill cooldowns by 1s.

skills.name: Soul Shards
skills.description_text:
Passive: Aamon charges his armor through enhanced Basic Attacks or while camouflaged. At 5 charges, Aamon throws 6 shards at the target on his next attack, each shard dealing 50 (+15% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. The shards will then scatter around the target.

Active: Aamon throws a shard at a nearby enemy, dealing 175 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.
skills.description_html:
Passive: Aamon charges his armor through enhanced Basic Attacks or while camouflaged. At 5 charges, Aamon throws 6 shards at the target on his next attack, each shard dealing 50 (+15% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. The shards will then scatter around the target.

Active: Aamon throws a shard at a nearby enemy, dealing 175 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.

skills.name: Slayer Shards
skills.description_text:
Aamon throws a shard forward, dealing 120 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way. The shard will return to Aamon after a short delay and allow him to enter the Camouflage state.
If the shard hits a non-minion enemy, it'll slow them by 50% for 2s and return to Aamon immediately.
skills.description_html:
Aamon throws a shard forward, dealing 120 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way. The shard will return to Aamon after a short delay and allow him to enter the Camouflage state.
If the shard hits a non-minion enemy, it'll slow them by 50% for 2s and return to Aamon immediately.

skills.name: Endless Shards
skills.description_text:
Aamon throws all shards at a designated enemy and slows them by 30% for 1.5s. After a short delay, the shards will fly to the enemy's location again, each dealing 90 (+24% Total Magic Power)-150 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.

The number of shards increases with Aamon's armor charges and the shards on the ground (8-25).
The damage dealt increases with the target's lost HP, to the max when the target's HP is below 30%. The same target takes less damage from subsequent attacks.

quote: The aloof Duke of Castle Aberleen.

name: Aulus

skills.name: Fighting Spirit
skills.description_text:
Aulus adds a stack of Fighting Spirit to his axe per second for s after dealing damage to any enemy (up to stacks). Each stack grants 15%-3 extra Attack Speed and 3-42-210 Physical Penetration (scales with Undying Fury level).
Aulus also gains extra Movement Speed and deals Physical Damage with his Basic Attacks at max Fighting Spirit stacks (scales with level). The damage counts as Attack Effect.
skills.description_html:
Aulus adds a stack of Fighting Spirit to his axe per second for s after dealing damage to any enemy (up to stacks). Each stack grants 15%-3 extra Attack Speed and 3-42-210 Physical Penetration (scales with Undying Fury level).
Aulus also gains extra Movement Speed and deals Physical Damage with his Basic Attacks at max Fighting Spirit stacks (scales with level). The damage counts as Attack Effect.

skills.name: Aulus, Charge!
skills.description_text: Aulus removes all Slowing Effects and gains 30% extra Movement Speed and 30% Damage Reduction against attacks from the front for 5s.
skills.description_html: Aulus removes all Slowing Effects and gains 30% extra Movement Speed and 30% Damage Reduction against attacks from the front for 5s.

skills.name: The Power of Axe
skills.description_text: Aulus brandishes his axe, dealing 200 (+70% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area, and enhancing his Basic Attacks for 3s after hitting enemy heroes or Creeps. Aulus recovers HP by 50 (+1% Total HP) after each Basic Attack.
skills.description_html: Aulus brandishes his axe, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in a fan-shaped area, and enhancing his Basic Attacks for 3s after hitting enemy heroes or Creeps. Aulus recovers HP by 50<font color="26e407"> (+1% Total HP)</font> after each Basic Attack.

skills.name: Undying Fury
skills.description_text:
Passive: Every time Undying Fury is upgraded, Aulus crafts a part for his axe in order. Blade Craft: His Basic Attacks deal 50 extra Physical Damage. Handle Craft: Permanently increases his Attack Range by 65% and the range of The Power of Axe. Hammer Craft: Permanently increases his Physical Penetration by 20%.

Active: Aulus raises his axe and smashes it to the ground (this skill can only be interrupted by Suppression), dealing 210 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a line and slowing them by 90% for 0.5s. A burning trail that lasts for 5s is left on the ground, dealing 90 (+40% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies who walk on it every 0.5s and slowing them by 70%.

quote: A Leonin warrior that fights to prove himself.

name: Natan

skills.name: Theory of Everything
skills.description_text:
Natan gains a stack of Entanglement each time he or his Reverse-Clone hits an enemy with a skill (up to 6 stacks). Each stack lasts 2.5s and grants 7.5% Attack Speed and 7.5% Movement Speed.

Natan's Basic Attack projectiles will return to Natan after reaching the maximum range, dealing an extra 30 (+50% Total Physical Attack) (+65% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way (inherits a portion of Attack Effects).
skills.description_html:
Natan gains a stack of Entanglement each time he or his Reverse-Clone hits an enemy with a skill (up to 6 stacks). Each stack lasts 2.5s and grants 7.5% Attack Speed and 7.5% Movement Speed.

Natan's Basic Attack projectiles will return to Natan after reaching the maximum range, dealing an extra 30 (+50% Total Physical Attack) (+65% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way (inherits a portion of Attack Effects).

skills.name: Superposition
skills.description_text: Natan shoots a dense mass of energy in the target direction, dealing 225 (+100% Total Physical Attack) (+130% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in its path.
skills.description_html: Natan shoots a dense mass of energy in the target direction, dealing 225<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+130% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in its path.

skills.name: Interference!
skills.description_text:
Natan launches a Gravitational Attractor in the target direction, dealing 150 (+50% Total Physical Attack) (+65% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in its path and knocking them back.
The Attractor detonates upon reaching the maximum range, dealing 30 (+10% Total Physical Attack) (+13% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back.
skills.description_html:
Natan launches a Gravitational Attractor in the target direction, dealing 150 (+50% Total Physical Attack) (+65% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in its path and knocking them back.
The Attractor detonates upon reaching the maximum range, dealing 30 (+10% Total Physical Attack) (+13% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back.

skills.name: Entropy?
skills.description_text:
Natan summons a Reverse-Clone that lasts 10s at 6 units away. The Reverse-Clone copies his moves and attacks in reverse and inherits 35% of his Basic Attack and skill damage.
Use Again: Natan switches places with the Reverse-Clone.

Each cast reduces other skills' remaining cooldowns by 50%. The Reverse-Clone will disappear if Natan is too far away.
