quote: The savior who travels through time and space.

name: Phoveus

skills.name: Demonic Force
skills.description_text:
Phoveus's next Basic Attack allows him to charge at the enemy, knocking them back, dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 4% of the enemy's Max HP, and gaining a Shield equal to 8% of his Max HP. This effect has a 26-14s cooldown (based on Infernal Pursuit level).
Astaros' Gaze: Whenever an enemy hero blinks, dashes, or is displaced within 8 units of Phoveus, the cooldown of Demonic Force will be reduced by 20% and the cooldown of his other skills will be reduced by 0.5s.
skills.description_html:
Phoveus's next Basic Attack allows him to charge at the enemy, knocking them back, dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 4% of the enemy's Max HP, and gaining a Shield equal to 8% of his Max HP. This effect has a 26-14s cooldown (based on Infernal Pursuit level).
Astaros' Gaze: Whenever an enemy hero blinks, dashes, or is displaced within 8 units of Phoveus, the cooldown of Demonic Force will be reduced by 20% and the cooldown of his other skills will be reduced by 0.5s.

skills.name: Demonic Impact
skills.description_text:
Phoveus slams his monolith into the ground, dealing 200 (+120% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area and slowing them by 70% for 0.5s. If this skill hits an enemy, Phoveus's next Demonic Impact will leave behind an Astaros Eye.

Astaros Eye: Implodes after a short delay, dealing 100 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Magic Damage to the enemies.
skills.description_html:
Phoveus slams his monolith into the ground, dealing 200 (+120% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area and slowing them by 70% for 0.5s. If this skill hits an enemy, Phoveus's next Demonic Impact will leave behind an Astaros Eye.

Astaros Eye: Implodes after a short delay, dealing 100 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Magic Damage to the enemies.

skills.name: Dark Wave
skills.description_text: Phoveus lowers his monolith and releases his demonic power in the target direction, knocking enemies airborne, dragging them along, and dealing 250 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Magic Damage.
skills.description_html: Phoveus lowers his monolith and releases his demonic power in the target direction, knocking enemies airborne, dragging them along, and dealing 250<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>.

skills.name: Infernal Pursuit
skills.description_text:
Sinner: Demonic Force, Astaros Eye, and Dark Wave can apply Sinner's Mark to the enemy hero hit.

Judgment: Phoveus leaps into the air and smashes down with his monolith at the enemy hero with Sinner's Mark, dealing 250 (+100% Total Physical Attack) plus extra Physical Damage equal to 5% of the target's Max HP to enemies in the area while Phoveus recovers 50 plus 6% of his Lost HP.

The HP recovered is reduced by 80% when hitting multiple enemies.

Sinner: Demonic Force, Astaros Eye, and Dark Wave can apply Sinner's Mark to the enemy hero hit.

The HP recovered is reduced by 80% when hitting multiple enemies.

quote: A former soldier from the border of the Empire who took on the chains of sin to defend his people.

name: Beatrix

skills.name: Mechanical Genius
skills.description_text:
Her extraordinary talent in the field of mechanics allowed Beatrix to produce 4 weapon(s) of truly awe-inspiring firepower.
Renner Basic Attack - Longshot: Fire a powerful shot in the enemy's current direction, dealing (+365% Total Physical Attack) - (+400% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first target hit (this shot can be dodged, and blocked by others). Deals 75% damage to Creeps.Bennett Basic Attack - Area Bombing: Bombard an area, dealing (+230% Total Physical Attack) - (+300% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to all enemies in range and slowing them by 40% for 0.5s. Deals 75% damage to Creeps.Wesker Basic Attack - Proximity Advantage: Fire 5 shots at the target, each dealing (+178% Total Physical Attack) - (+220% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage (inherits a portion of Attack Effects). Damage dealt to targets hit multiple times will decay to 25%. Deals 75% damage to Creeps.Nibiru Basic Attack - Rapid Fire: Lets loose a volley of 4 shots at the target, each shot dealing (+51% Total Physical Attack) - (+65% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage (inherits a portion of Attack Effects). Deals 75% damage to Creeps.
Beatrix cannot Crit, and converts every 1% Critical Chance gained into 2 Physical Attack.

skills.name: Masterful Gunner
skills.description_text:
Passive: Beatrix can carry 2 weapons at once, and increase her Physical Attack by 5.
Active: Beatrix takes 0.5s to swap her primary weapon with the secondary she has slung over her back, gaining an all-new way to attack and Ultimate.
skills.description_html:
Passive: Beatrix can carry 2 weapons at once, and increase her Physical Attack by 5.
Active: Beatrix takes 0.5s to swap her primary weapon with the secondary she has slung over her back, gaining an all-new way to attack and Ultimate.

skills.name: Tactical Reposition
skills.description_text: Beatrix rolls forward while fully reloading her current weapon.
skills.description_html: Beatrix rolls forward while fully reloading her current weapon.

skills.name: Renner's Apathy
skills.description_text:
Beatrix calmly sets up Renner on the battlefield and takes aim. When releasing the skill, she deals 700 (+280% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit.

Beatrix can aim for up to 8s, and she can cancel it early to reduce the cooldown by 50%.

This shot can penetrate Minions and only deals 75% damage to non-hero units.
skills.description_html:
Beatrix calmly sets up Renner on the battlefield and takes aim. When releasing the skill, she deals 700 (+280% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit.

Beatrix can aim for up to 8s, and she can cancel it early to reduce the cooldown by 50%.

This shot can penetrate Minions and only deals 75% damage to non-hero units.

skills.name: Need Backup
skills.description_text:
Having escaped battle for 3s, Beatrix can call for her butler Morgan to provide her with a backup weapons crate.
Beatrix must then choose two from the crate to serve as her primary and secondary weapons.
Her weapon selection is interrupted if she commits any action or is controlled during this period.

quote: A confident inventor girl.

name: Gloo

skills.name: Stick, Stick
skills.description_text:
Enemies gain a stack of Sticky each time they're hit by Gloo's skills, decreasing their Movement Speed by 4% for 6s. Stacks up to 5.
Each stack of Sticky on an enemy reduces their damage dealt to Gloo by 4%.
skills.description_html:
Enemies gain a stack of Sticky each time they're hit by Gloo's skills, decreasing their Movement Speed by 4% for 6s. Stacks up to 5.
Each stack of Sticky on an enemy reduces their damage dealt to Gloo by 4%.

skills.name: Slam, Slam
skills.description_text:
Gloo reaches out and slams the ground, dealing 80 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the enemy.
At the final location, a Goo is left behind that explodes after 3s to deal 300 (+12% Extra Max HP) Magic Damage to nearby enemies and immobilize them for 1s. If Gloo touches the Goo, it will explode immediately, reset the skill's cooldown, and heal Gloo for 2.5% of Max HP if the explosion hits an enemy (doubled if it hits an enemy hero).
skills.description_html:

If Gloo touches the Goo, it will explode immediately, reset the skill's cooldown, and heal Gloo for 2.5% of Max HP if the explosion hits an enemy (doubled if it hits an enemy hero).

skills.name: Spread, Spread
skills.description_text:
Gloo stretches forth to deal 100 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in its path, immobilizing them for 10%s.
If this skill hits a Goo, Gloo will charge over to it, dragging enemies in its path in the same direction for a distance.
skills.description_html:
Gloo stretches forth to deal 100 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in its path, immobilizing them for 10%s.
If this skill hits a Goo, Gloo will charge over to it, dragging enemies in its path in the same direction for a distance.

skills.name: Grab, Grab
skills.description_text:
Gloo splits into Goos for 5s, during which it gains 25% extra Movement Speed, recovers 30 (+50% Total Magic Power) (+6% Extra Max HP) Max HP per second, and deals 9 Magic Damage every 80%s to enemies it comes into contact with.
Grab, Grab: Gloo attaches itself to the target enemy hero with max Sticky stacks for up to s, recovering Max HP. For the duration, Gloo transfers of the damage it receives (calculated before damage reduction; excluding damage from turrets) to its host, and its Basic Attacks deal Magic Damage.
Go, Go: Gloo leaves its host early.
Cooldown is lowered to 5s if the host dies while Gloo is still attached to it.
skills.description_html:
Gloo splits into Goos for 5s, during which it gains 25% extra Movement Speed, recovers 30 (+50% Total Magic Power) (+6% Extra Max HP) Max HP per second, and deals 9 Magic Damage every 80%s to enemies it comes into contact with.
Grab, Grab: Gloo attaches itself to the target enemy hero with max Sticky stacks for up to s, recovering Max HP. For the duration, Gloo transfers of the damage it receives (calculated before damage reduction; excluding damage from turrets) to its host, and its Basic Attacks deal Magic Damage.
Go, Go: Gloo leaves its host early.
Cooldown is lowered to 5s if the host dies while Gloo is still attached to it.

quote: A mysterious creature that can split into many smaller ones.

name: Paquito

skills.name: Champ Stance
skills.description_text:
After every 3 skill casts, Paquito enters the Champ Stance, gaining an enhanced skill ignoring his current cooldowns. He gains 60% extra Movement Speed that decays over 1.8s after casting the enhanced skill.
Paquito's Basic Attacks only deal (+85% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
skills.description_html:
After every 3 skill casts, Paquito enters the Champ Stance, gaining an enhanced skill ignoring his current cooldowns. He gains 60% extra Movement Speed that decays over 1.8s after casting the enhanced skill.
Paquito's Basic Attacks only deal (+85% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

skills.name: Heavy Left Punch
skills.description_text:
Paquito throws a punch in the target direction, dealing 210 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit. If this skill hits an enemy hero or Creep, Paquito will also gain a 150 (+135% Total Physical Attack) shield for 2.5s.

Champ Stance: The damage is increased to 350 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and the shield value is increased to 140%. The normal and enhanced shields can stack.
skills.description_html:
Paquito throws a punch in the target direction, dealing 210 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit. If this skill hits an enemy hero or Creep, Paquito will also gain a 150 (+135% Total Physical Attack) shield for 2.5s.

Champ Stance: The damage is increased to 350 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and the shield value is increased to 140%. The normal and enhanced shields can stack.

skills.name: Jab
skills.description_text:
Paquito dashes in the target direction and throws a jab, dealing 200 (+165% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit. Paquito will stop and throw the jab immediately upon colliding with an enemy hero or Creep during the dash.

Champ Stance: The damage is increased to 350 (+230% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
skills.description_html:
Paquito dashes in the target direction and throws a jab, dealing 200 (+165% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit. Paquito will stop and throw the jab immediately upon colliding with an enemy hero or Creep during the dash.

Champ Stance: The damage is increased to 350 (+230% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

skills.name: Knockout Strike
skills.description_text:
Paquito launches an elbow strike in the target direction, dealing 250 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and knocking them back. He then throws a haymaker, dealing 300 (+90% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 75% for 1s, as he darts backward.

Champ Stance: Instead of a haymaker, Paquito launches an uppercut after the elbow strike, dealing 400 (+120% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and knocking them airborne for 0.5s.

quote: The hero who uses his two fists to protect hope and love.

name: Mathilda

skills.name: Ancestral Guidance
skills.description_text: Mathilda gains Ancestral Guidance while moving. When it's fully charged, her next Basic Attack will be enhanced, dealing 200 (+100% Total Physical Attack) (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the target and granting her 80 extra Movement Speed that decays over 2.5s.
skills.description_html: Mathilda gains <font color="a6aafb">Ancestral Guidance</font> while moving. When it's fully charged, her next Basic Attack will be enhanced, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the target and granting her 80 extra Movement Speed that decays over 2.5s.

skills.name: Soul Bloom
skills.description_text:
Mathilda resonates with the power of her ancestors for 4s, attracting wisps as her movement distance increases (up to 6 wisps).

At the end of the skill's duration, or when Mathilda casts this skill again, the wisps will seek and attack nearby enemies, each dealing 275 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and revealing the enemies' positions briefly. Subsequent damage dealt by wisps to the same target decays to 40%.
skills.description_html:
Mathilda resonates with the power of her ancestors for 4s, attracting wisps as her movement distance increases (up to 6 wisps).

At the end of the skill's duration, or when Mathilda casts this skill again, the wisps will seek and attack nearby enemies, each dealing 275 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and revealing the enemies' positions briefly. Subsequent damage dealt by wisps to the same target decays to 40%.

skills.name: Guiding Wind
skills.description_text:
Mathilda leaps in the target direction and creates a field around her, gaining a 350 (+180% Total Magic Power) shield and 25% extra Movement Speed for 3s. Allied heroes who come into contact with the field will receive a 50% shield and Guiding Wind. The first allied hero that triggers Guiding Wind will be guided to Mathilda, and both of them will gain the same Movement Speed boost.

When casting this skill during Circling Eagle, Mathilda won't change her position.
Guiding Wind expires 2s after the hero leaves Mathilda's field.
skills.description_html:

Allied heroes who come into contact with the field will receive a 50% shield and Guiding Wind. When casting this skill during Circling Eagle, Mathilda won't change her position.
Guiding Wind expires 2s after the hero leaves Mathilda's field.

skills.name: Circling Eagle
skills.description_text:
Mathilda applies a Soul Mark to the target enemy hero and circles around them for up to 3.5s, during which her wisps will fly into nearby enemies, each dealing 40 (+15% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. The Soul Mark will also slow the target by 15% and Soul Bloom will prioritize the target with Soul Mark.
Within the duration, Mathilda can select an area to dash to. At the end of the duration, she'll dash at the target with Soul Mark, dealing 320 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage while knocking enemies in her path airborne for 0.6s, transferring the Soul Mark to the first enemy hero that she knocks airborne, and reducing the skill cooldown by 40%.
Mathilda gains Control Immunity and a 400 (+160% Total Magic Power) shield for the skill duration.

Mathilda gains Control Immunity and a 400 (+160% Total Magic Power) shield for the skill duration.

quote: A brave girl who stands up and doesn't fear power.

name: Yve

skills.name: Galactic Power
skills.description_text:
Yve gains a stack of Galactic Power each time she hits an enemy hero with Void Blast or Void Crystal (up to 10 stacks).
Each stack of Galactic Power allows Yve to launch an extra attack on the next Real World Manipulation cast and increases the amount of shield gained by 5%.
skills.description_html:
Yve gains a stack of Galactic Power each time she hits an enemy hero with Void Blast or Void Crystal (up to 10 stacks).
Each stack of Galactic Power allows Yve to launch an extra attack on the next Real World Manipulation cast and increases the amount of shield gained by 5%.

skills.name: Void Blast
skills.description_text:
Yve detonates Galactic Energy at the target location, dealing 350 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the area.
Successfully hitting an enemy grants Yve 55% extra Movement Speed (halved if a non-hero enemy is hit) that decreases over 1s.
skills.description_html:
Yve detonates Galactic Energy at the target location, dealing 350 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the area.
Successfully hitting an enemy grants Yve 55% extra Movement Speed (halved if a non-hero enemy is hit) that decreases over 1s.

skills.name: Void Crystal
skills.description_text:
Yve summons a Void Crystal at the target location, dealing 220 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

Use Again: Yve commands the Crystal to fire materialized energy in the target direction for 2.7s, dealing 105 (+20% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage every 0.45s to enemies hit and slowing them by 30%. Enemies hit multiple times are slowed by an extra 6% for each hit after the first (up to 60%).
skills.description_html:
Yve summons a Void Crystal at the target location, dealing 220 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

Use Again: Yve commands the Crystal to fire materialized energy in the target direction for 2.7s, dealing 105 (+20% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage every 0.45s to enemies hit and slowing them by 30%. Enemies hit multiple times are slowed by an extra 6% for each hit after the first (up to 60%).

skills.name: Real World Manipulation
skills.description_text:
Yve creates a Starfield that lasts 15s and gains a 400 (+120% Total Magic Power) Shield. Within the duration, you can Tap or Swipe the screen to attack up to 15 times.
Tap: Deals 340 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the target area.
Swipe: Deals 65 (+10% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage every 0.45s to enemies in the target area for 2.7s and slows them by 50%.
Enemies leaving or entering the Starfield will be immobilized for 0.8s (only once against the same target).
Yve cannot be displaced while the Starfield is active, and the Starfield will remain even if Yve is controlled (except for Suppression).
skills.description_html:

quote: Keeper of the equilibrium of the universe.

name: Brody

skills.name: Abyss Corrosion
skills.description_text:
With his Basic Attacks resonated with the Abyss Power within his body, Brody is able to move while winding up his Basic Attacks (which will be interrupted when casting skills), at the cost of having longer Basic Attack Animation and lower Attack Speed Bonus. Each Basic Attack deals (+140% Total Physical Attack) (+45*Hero Level) Physical Damage (of which the damage scaling with level cannot be critical), increases Movement Speed by 30% (which will decay rapidly in 1.2s), and applies 1 stack of Abyss Mark on the enemy, capped at 4 stacks.
Each stack of Abyss Mark increases Brody's damage against the target by 5% and his Movement Speed by 5%.
skills.description_html:
With his Basic Attacks resonated with the Abyss Power within his body, Brody is able to move while winding up his Basic Attacks (which will be interrupted when casting skills), at the cost of having longer Basic Attack Animation and lower Attack Speed Bonus. Each Basic Attack deals (+140% Total Physical Attack) (+45*Hero Level) Physical Damage (of which the damage scaling with level cannot be critical), increases Movement Speed by 30% (which will decay rapidly in 1.2s), and applies 1 stack of Abyss Mark on the enemy, capped at 4 stacks.
Each stack of Abyss Mark increases Brody's damage against the target by 5% and his Movement Speed by 5%.

skills.name: Abyss Impact
skills.description_text:
Brody launches a shock wave in the designated direction, dealing 150 (+170% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage, slowing the enemies by 30% for 1.2s, and applying 1 stack of Abyss Mark.

As the shock wave travels, for each enemy it hits, it deals an extra 10% damage, inflicts extra 5% slow effect, and applies an additional stack of Abyss Mark, capped at 130% damage, 45% slow effect, and 4 stacks. This skill deals only 80% damage to Minions.
skills.description_html:
Brody launches a shock wave in the designated direction, dealing 150 (+170% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage, slowing the enemies by 30% for 1.2s, and applying 1 stack of Abyss Mark.

As the shock wave travels, for each enemy it hits, it deals an extra 10% damage, inflicts extra 5% slow effect, and applies an additional stack of Abyss Mark, capped at 130% damage, 45% slow effect, and 4 stacks. This skill deals only 80% damage to Minions.

skills.name: Corrosive Strike
skills.description_text:
Brody dashes to an enemy, dealing 200 (+70% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target, stunning the target for 0.8s, and applying 1 stack of Abyss Mark on the target.
Upon hitting the target, he is able to move one more time in the movement direction, gaining 45% Movement Speed that will decay rapidly in 1.2s.
skills.description_html:

skills.name: Torn-Apart Memory
skills.description_text: Brody locks on all the targets within 8 unit(s), dealing 300 (+165% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to them. If the target has an Abyss Mark, all Abyss Marks will be reset, dealing Physical Damage equal to 136 (+72% Extra Physical Attack) plus 4% of the target's lost HP for each stack the target has.

quote: Mysterious man whose right hand was corroded and who lost his memory.

name: Barats

skills.name: Big Guy
skills.description_text: Detona gains a stack of Big Guy for 12s each time it or Barats damages an enemy with their skills (up to 20% stacks). Each stack of Big Guy increases Detona's size, and grants 4-10 extra Hybrid Defense (scales with the level of Detona's Welcome) and 10 extra Resilience. At max stacks, Detona's Basic Attacks will be replaced with Trample, which deals (+140% Total Physical Attack) (+3.5% Total HP) Physical Damage to enemies in a circular area, slows them by 40% for 0.2s, and refreshes the duration of Big Guy with each hit.
skills.description_html: Detona gains a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Big Guy</font> for 12s each time it or Barats damages an enemy with their skills (up to 20% stacks). Each stack of <font color="a6aafb">Big Guy</font> increases Detona's size, and grants 4-10 extra Hybrid Defense (scales with the level of <font color="a6aafb">Detona's Welcome</font>) and 10 extra Resilience. At max stacks, Detona's Basic Attacks will be replaced with <font color="a6aafb">Trample</font>, which deals <font color="fba51f"> (+140% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="26e407">(+3.5% Total HP)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in a circular area, slows them by 40% for 0.2s, and refreshes the duration of <font color="a6aafb">Big Guy</font> with each hit.

skills.name: So-Called Teamwork
skills.description_text:
Detona spits contaminated oil in the target direction, dealing 60 (+7% Total HP) Physical Damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area. Barats then ignites the oil with a firecracker, dealing 120 (+180% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area (only 50% damage to Creeps).

The area of effect of So-Called Teamwork increases with the number of Big Guy stacks.
skills.description_html:
Detona spits contaminated oil in the target direction, dealing 60 (+7% Total HP) Physical Damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area. Barats then ignites the oil with a firecracker, dealing 120 (+180% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area (only 50% damage to Creeps).

The area of effect of So-Called Teamwork increases with the number of Big Guy stacks.

skills.name: Missile "Expert"
skills.description_text: Barats fires two missiles at the target location, dealing 100 (+75% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slowing enemies by 40% for 1s. The missiles expel fumes from their exhausts upon landing, dealing 100 (+75% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a rectangular area and pushing them toward Barats.
skills.description_html: Barats fires two missiles at the target location, dealing 100<font color="fba51f"> (+75% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and slowing enemies by 40% for 1s. skills.name: Detona's Welcome
skills.description_text:
After a short delay, Detona charges in the target direction, dealing 120 (+70% Total Physical Attack) (+1.2% Total HP) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit, devouring and suppressing them for 1.2s before spitting them out. If the target hits an enemy hero or a wall after being spit out, the target will cause an explosion, they and nearby enemies will take an additional 180 (+105% Total Physical Attack) (+1.8% Total HP) Physical Damage and be stunned for 1s.
For the duration, Barats becomes immune to control effects. If the channeling is canceled, 60% of the skill cooldown will be refunded.
Passive: Detona gains 4 stacks of Big Guy upon respawn.

quote: Adventurer riding a dragon lizard.

name: Khaleed

skills.name: Sand Walk
skills.description_text: Khaleed accumulates Desert Power while moving. After Desert Power is fully charged, he will glide on sand, increasing Movement Speed by 35%, making his next Basic Attack deal 50 (+140% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target (cannot Crit), and reducing the target's Movement Speed by 40% for 1.5s.
skills.description_html: Khaleed accumulates <font color="a6aafb">Desert Power</font> while moving. After <font color="a6aafb">Desert Power</font> is fully charged, he will glide on sand, increasing Movement Speed by 35%, making his next Basic Attack deal 50<font color="fba51f"> (+140% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the target (cannot Crit), and reducing the target's Movement Speed by 40% for 1.5s.

skills.name: Desert Tornado
skills.description_text:
Khaleed whirls his scimitar, dealing 200 (+140% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area and pulling them toward him. This skill can be used up to 3 time(s) in a row.

This skill deals 50% damage to Minions and Creeps.
skills.description_html:
Khaleed whirls his scimitar, dealing 200 (+140% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area and pulling them toward him. This skill can be used up to 3 time(s) in a row.

This skill deals 50% damage to Minions and Creeps.

skills.name: Quicksand Guard
skills.description_text:
Khaleed protects himself with the power of the quicksand, restoring 60 plus 5% of his lost HP and 10 Desert Power every 0.5s, reducing damage taken by 25% for up to 4s.

While channeling, quicksand appears under his feet, slowing the enemy by 60%.
This skill is a Focused Cast. Any other controls will interrupt this skill.
skills.description_html:
Khaleed protects himself with the power of the quicksand, restoring 60 plus 5% of his lost HP and 10 Desert Power every 0.5s, reducing damage taken by 25% for up to 4s.

While channeling, quicksand appears under his feet, slowing the enemy by 60%.
This skill is a Focused Cast. Any other controls will interrupt this skill.

skills.name: Raging Sandstorm
skills.description_text:
Khaleed rides the sandstorm and charges toward a designated location, dealing 100 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way and knocking them toward his destination. Khaleed is immune to control effects during this process.

Upon reaching the destination, Khaleed will smash the ground, dealing 450 (+160% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area and stunning them for 1s, and fully charge his Desert Power.

quote: A sand-walking intrepid Clan leader.

name: Benedetta

skills.name: Elapsed Daytime
skills.description_text:
When holding down the Basic Attack button, Benedetta enters the Swordout state and charges up Sword Intent. If the Basic Attack button is released after the Sword Intent is fully charged, Benedetta will use Swordout Slash in the direction she's facing and dash forward, dealing (+215% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies on the path (counts as Skill Damage and is reduced to 50% on Minions and Creeps).

Benedetta can only use Swordout Slash when her Sword Intent is fully charged and she is in Swordout state by holding down the Basic Attack button.

Benedetta also gains Sword Intent by dealing damage with her Basic Attacks and skills.
skills.description_html:
When holding down the Basic Attack button, Benedetta enters the Swordout state and charges up Sword Intent. If the Basic Attack button is released after the Sword Intent is fully charged, Benedetta will use Swordout Slash in the direction she's facing and dash forward, dealing (+215% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies on the path (counts as Skill Damage and is reduced to 50% on Minions and Creeps).

Benedetta can only use Swordout Slash when her Sword Intent is fully charged and she is in Swordout state by holding down the Basic Attack button.

Benedetta also gains Sword Intent by dealing damage with her Basic Attacks and skills.

skills.name: Phantom Slash
skills.description_text:
Benedetta withdraws swiftly and leaves a shadow in front. After a short delay, her shadow slashes forward in a fan-shaped area, dealing 200 (+75% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slowing the enemies by 60% for 0.5s.

Meanwhile, Benedetta dashes forward to slash, dealing 75 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. (If the target is hit by her shadow, damage caused by Benedetta herself will increase to 200%.)
skills.description_html:
Benedetta withdraws swiftly and leaves a shadow in front. After a short delay, her shadow slashes forward in a fan-shaped area, dealing 200 (+75% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slowing the enemies by 60% for 0.5s.

Meanwhile, Benedetta dashes forward to slash, dealing 75 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. (If the target is hit by her shadow, damage caused by Benedetta herself will increase to 200%.)

skills.name: An Eye for An Eye
skills.description_text:
Benedetta raises her weapon to defend, gaining Control Immunity and blocking damage from any source for 0.8s. After this, she stabs in the designated direction, dealing 300 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

If Benedetta successfully fends off any damage while defending, she will gain full Sword Intent. If she fends off any control effects, her subsequent stab stuns the target for 1.5s.

skills.name: Alecto: Final Blow
skills.description_text: Benedetta clenches Alecto, dashes forward (Benedetta is untargetable during the dash), and performs a slash after a short delay, detonating the Sword Intent along the path. For 2.5s, the Sword Intent deals up to a total of 1560 (+1105% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies within and slows them by 50%.

quote: Female warrior defending the Barren Lands against demon invasion.

name: Luo Yi

skills.name: Duality
skills.description_text:
Luo Yi's skills can create Sigils of Yin/Yang on the battlefield. Each Sigil lasts up to 6s.
Sigils of opposite attributes will trigger Yin-Yang Reaction when they are within a certain distance, dealing 365 (+20*Hero Level) (+190% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the marked enemies, stunning them for 0.3s, and pulling them toward each other.
Each time Luo Yi applies a new Sigil to a marked enemy, she gains a 300 (+10*Hero Level) (+150% Total Magic Power) shield (up to 3 stacks) and 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 2s.
skills.description_html:
Luo Yi's skills can create Sigils of Yin/Yang on the battlefield. Each Sigil lasts up to 6s.
Sigils of opposite attributes will trigger Yin-Yang Reaction when they are within a certain distance, dealing 365 (+20*Hero Level) (+190% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the marked enemies, stunning them for 0.3s, and pulling them toward each other.
Each time Luo Yi applies a new Sigil to a marked enemy, she gains a 300 (+10*Hero Level) (+150% Total Magic Power) shield (up to 3 stacks) and 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 2s.

skills.name: Dispersion
skills.description_text:
Luo Yi casts the energy of Yin/Yang in the target direction, dealing 210 (+135% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and those behind them in a fan-shaped area. Enemy heroes hit are marked with a Sigil of Yin/Yang.
Luo Yi stores up to 4 Dispersion charges and gains 1 charge every 8s. She also immediately gains 1 charge each time Yin-Yang Reaction is triggered.
The state of this skill changes on each cast.
skills.description_html:
Luo Yi casts the energy of Yin/Yang in the target direction, dealing 210 (+135% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and those behind them in a fan-shaped area. Enemy heroes hit are marked with a Sigil of Yin/Yang.
Luo Yi stores up to 4 Dispersion charges and gains 1 charge every 8s. She also immediately gains 1 charge each time Yin-Yang Reaction is triggered.
The state of this skill changes on each cast.

skills.name: Rotation
skills.description_text:
Luo Yi summons Fire of Yang/Aqua of Yin at the target location, dealing 250 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 60% for 0.5s.
Fire of Yan/Aqua of Yin then remains at the location for 6s, dealing 50 (+10% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage every 0.7s to nearby enemies. It can also trigger Yin-Yang Reaction with Sigils of opposite attributes.
The state of this skill changes on each cast.
skills.description_html:
Luo Yi summons Fire of Yang/Aqua of Yin at the target location, dealing 250 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 60% for 0.5s.
Fire of Yan/Aqua of Yin then remains at the location for 6s, dealing 50 (+10% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage every 0.7s to nearby enemies. It can also trigger Yin-Yang Reaction with Sigils of opposite attributes.
The state of this skill changes on each cast.

skills.name: Diversion
skills.description_text:
Luo Yi creates a Teleport Circle around herself and marks the target location (within 28 units) as its destination. After a 3s delay, allied heroes (including herself) within the Circle will be teleported to the location.

Passive: Luo Yi's Cooldown Reduction is increased by 6%.

Luo Yi creates a Teleport Circle around herself and marks the target location (within 28 units) as its destination. After a 3s delay, allied heroes (including herself) within the Circle will be teleported to the location.

Passive: Luo Yi's Cooldown Reduction is increased by 6%.

quote: Seeking to revive an ancient past, she is the sole being who has mastered the secrets of Yin and Yang.

name: Yu Zhong

skills.name: Cursing Touch
skills.description_text: Yu Zhong applies Sha Residue to enemy heroes every time he deals damage to them. Sha Residue erupts upon reaching 5 stacks on a target. Then it begins consuming 1 stack every 0.4s to deal Physical Damage equal to 30 (+20% Extra Physical Attack) plus 2.5% of the target's lost HP to the target. Each stack consumed restores 6% of Yu Zhong's lost HP. When Sha Residue erupts, Yu Zhong also gains 30% Movement Speed for 3s.
skills.description_html: Yu Zhong applies <font color="a6aafb">Sha Residue</font> to enemy heroes every time he deals damage to them. <font color="a6aafb">Sha Residue</font> erupts upon reaching 5 stacks on a target. Then it begins consuming 1 stack every 0.4s to deal <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> equal to 30<font color="fba51f"> (+20% Extra Physical Attack)</font> plus 2.5% of the target's lost HP to the target. Each stack consumed restores 6% of Yu Zhong's lost HP. When <font color="a6aafb">Sha Residue</font> erupts, Yu Zhong also gains 30% Movement Speed for 3s.

skills.name: Dragon Tail
skills.description_text: Yu Zhong infuses his power into his cloak and turns it into a weapon, which starts to attack nearby enemies after a short delay. The inner area of the cloak deals 220 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage, whereas the sharpened edge deals 275% damage and applies 2 stacks of Sha Residue.
skills.description_html: Yu Zhong infuses his power into his cloak and turns it into a weapon, which starts to attack nearby enemies after a short delay. The inner area of the cloak deals 220<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>, whereas the sharpened edge deals 275% damage and applies 2 stacks of <font color="a6aafb">Sha Residue</font>.

skills.name: Soul Grip
skills.description_text:
Yu Zhong unleashes the Dragon Soul, dealing 150 (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to all enemies in front and slowing them by 60% for 1s.

Upon hitting an enemy, Yu Zhong's next Basic Attack will be enhanced, dealing 108 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. Upon hitting multiple enemies, the enhanced Basic Attack will apply multiple stacks of Sha Residue and deal up to 200% damage.
skills.description_html:
Yu Zhong unleashes the Dragon Soul, dealing 150 (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to all enemies in front and slowing them by 60% for 1s.

Upon hitting an enemy, Yu Zhong's next Basic Attack will be enhanced, dealing 108 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. Upon hitting multiple enemies, the enhanced Basic Attack will apply multiple stacks of Sha Residue and deal up to 200% damage.

skills.name: Furious Dive
skills.description_text:
Yu Zhong leaps towards the designated area with his full strength, dealing 180 (+90% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage. He is able to dash one more time in the movement direction.
After a short delay, enemies within the area of effect will be knocked airborne for 0.6s and take 180 (+90% Extra Physical Attack) additional Physical Damage.
skills.description_html:
Yu Zhong leaps towards the designated area with his full strength, dealing 180 (+90% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage. He is able to dash one more time in the movement direction.
After a short delay, enemies within the area of effect will be knocked airborne for 0.6s and take 180 (+90% Extra Physical Attack) additional Physical Damage.

skills.name: Black Dragon Form
skills.description_text:
After channeling for 0.6s, Yu Zhong transforms into his Black Dragon Form. For up to 7s, he cannot use any skills but can move freely and will knock back enemy heroes in his path while dealing 180 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. He also gains 1000 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) Max HP, becomes immune to control effects, and ignores obstacles in this form.
Upon exiting the Black Dragon Form, Yu Zhong enters Dragonoid Form, gaining increased range on all of his skills for 10s.
skills.description_html:
After channeling for 0.6s, Yu Zhong transforms into his Black Dragon Form. For up to 7s, he cannot use any skills but can move freely and will knock back enemy heroes in his path while dealing 180 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. He also gains 1000 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) Max HP, becomes immune to control effects, and ignores obstacles in this form.
Upon exiting the Black Dragon Form, Yu Zhong enters Dragonoid Form, gaining increased range on all of his skills for 10s.

quote: Yu Zhong, the reincarnation of the Black Dragon, intends to unify the Cadia Riverlands through conquest and usher in an era of prosperity.

name: Popol and Kupa

skills.name: We Are Friends
skills.description_text:
Kupa recovers 10% Max HP per second after not taking damage for 5s. When Kupa is killed, Popol can Pray for 3s to bring Kupa back to the battlefield. Cooldown: 30s.
Every 3 consecutive attacks from Kupa will enhance Popol's next Basic Attack to deal (+220% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. Kupa has 2500 (+1200% Total Physical Attack) Max HP and inherits 100% of Popol's other attributes and passive equipment effects (excluding Jungling and Roaming equipment effects).
Kupa deals an additional 120% damage against Creeps.
skills.description_html:
Kupa recovers 10% Max HP per second after not taking damage for 5s. When Kupa is killed, Popol can Pray for 3s to bring Kupa back to the battlefield. Cooldown: 30s.
Every 3 consecutive attacks from Kupa will enhance Popol's next Basic Attack to deal (+220% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. Kupa has 2500 (+1200% Total Physical Attack) Max HP and inherits 100% of Popol's other attributes and passive equipment effects (excluding Jungling and Roaming equipment effects).
Kupa deals an additional 120% damage against Creeps.

skills.name: Bite 'em, Kupa!
skills.description_text:
Popol throws a spear at the target enemy, dealing 80 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage while simultaneously commanding Kupa to lunge at the target, dealing an additional 70 (+75% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. Kupa will continue to attack the target for 3s.
Alpha Wolf Form: Kupa stuns the enemy for 1s and bites them 3 times in quick succession.
skills.description_html:
Popol throws a spear at the target enemy, dealing 80 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage while simultaneously commanding Kupa to lunge at the target, dealing an additional 70 (+75% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. Kupa will continue to attack the target for 3s.
Alpha Wolf Form: Kupa stuns the enemy for 1s and bites them 3 times in quick succession.

skills.name: Kupa, Help!
skills.description_text:
Popol summons Kupa back to his side, gaining a 240 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) shield while dealing 240 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 35% for 0.5s. Kupa will then assist Popol to attack nearby enemies for 3s.
Alpha Wolf Form: Kupa darts back to Popol, knocking nearby enemies airborne for 0.2s. The shield and damage are increased to 125%.
skills.description_html:
Popol summons Kupa back to his side, gaining a 240 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) shield while dealing 240 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 35% for 0.5s. Kupa will then assist Popol to attack nearby enemies for 3s.
Alpha Wolf Form: Kupa darts back to Popol, knocking nearby enemies airborne for 0.2s. The shield and damage are increased to 125%.

skills.name: Popol's Surprise
skills.description_text:
Popol sets a trap at the target location that will detonate after a short delay once triggered, dealing 70 (+20% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the enemy that steps on it, immobilizing them for 1s, and creating a frost zone for 4s. Enemies in the frost zone will have their Movement Speed reduced by 20%.
Popol gains a trap charge every 22s (up to 3). Up to 3 traps can exist at the same time on the battlefield, each lasting up to 60s.
skills.description_html:

Enemies in the frost zone will have their Movement Speed reduced by 20%.
Popol gains a trap charge every 22s (up to 3). Up to 3 traps can exist at the same time on the battlefield, each lasting up to 60s.

skills.name: We Are Angry!
skills.description_text:
Popol and Kupa enter the Enraged state for 12s, gaining 15% extra Movement Speed and increasing their Attack Speed to 1.3 times.
Kupa turns into Alpha Wolf Form, gaining 1500 extra Max HP, fully restoring its HP, while enhancing its other skills.

quote: Boy and an Icefield Wolf, partners who understand each other well.

name: Atlas

skills.name: Frigid Breath
skills.description_text:
Atlas generates Frigid Breath around him for 5s each time he casts a skill. Enemies affected by Frigid Breath will have their Movement Speed gradually reduced over 2s, after which they'll be frozen for 0.5s.

Atlas gains 16-30 extra Physical & Magic Defense when Frigid Breath is present.
skills.description_html:
Atlas generates Frigid Breath around him for 5s each time he casts a skill. Enemies affected by Frigid Breath will have their Movement Speed gradually reduced over 2s, after which they'll be frozen for 0.5s.

Atlas gains 16-30 extra Physical & Magic Defense when Frigid Breath is present.

skills.name: Annihilate
skills.description_text:
Atlas smashes the ground and causes 3 explosions. Each explosion deals 215 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies.
Ejected State: If Atlas is ejected from his Mecha Sentry, both he and his Mecha will cast Annihilate.
skills.description_html:
Atlas smashes the ground and causes 3 explosions. Each explosion deals 215 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies.
Ejected State: If Atlas is ejected from his Mecha Sentry, both he and his Mecha will cast Annihilate.

skills.name: Perfect Match
skills.description_text:
Atlas enters Ejected State, gaining 40% Movement SPD and immunity to Slowing Effects. In this state, the Mecha Sentry will follow the pilot at an increasing speed (can only be controlled by Suppression). Once they meet, Atlas will return to the Mecha, dealing 320 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies nearby and stunning them for 1s.
Ejected State: Atlas and his Mecha share the same HP bar and reduce 50% of the damage taken in this state.
skills.description_html:
Atlas enters Ejected State, gaining 40% Movement SPD and immunity to Slowing Effects. In this state, the Mecha Sentry will follow the pilot at an increasing speed (can only be controlled by Suppression). Once they meet, Atlas will return to the Mecha, dealing 320 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies nearby and stunning them for 1s.
Ejected State: Atlas and his Mecha share the same HP bar and reduce 50% of the damage taken in this state.

skills.name: Fatal Links
skills.description_text:
Atlas hurls chains around and starts to channel (can only be interrupted by suppressing), dealing 225 (+75% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemy heroes hit and slowing them by 40% for 3s.
Use this skill again while channeling: Atlas will drag the targets toward him and plunk them down on the designated location, dealing 360 (+180% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.
Use this skill in Ejected State: The Mecha Sentry will return to Atlas immediately, but the stun effect will be replaced by 40% Slowing Effect.
skills.description_html:
