Use this skill in Ejected State: The Mecha Sentry will return to Atlas immediately, but the stun effect will be replaced by 40% Slowing Effect.

quote: Abysmal Sea creature who broke free from the seal.

name: Carmilla

skills.name: Vampire Pact
skills.description_text: Each time Carmilla deals damage to an enemy hero, she steals 7-11 Physical & Magic Defense (scales with level) from them. The stolen Physical & Magic Defense can stack up to 5 times and lasts 5s. However, Carmilla can only steal defense from the same enemy hero once every 5s.
skills.description_html: Each time Carmilla deals damage to an enemy hero, she steals 7-11 Physical & Magic Defense (scales with level) from them. The stolen Physical & Magic Defense can stack up to 5 times and lasts 5s. However, Carmilla can only steal defense from the same enemy hero once every 5s.

skills.name: Crimson Flower
skills.description_text:
Carmilla summons two Crimson Flowers that circle around her for 5s, dealing 100 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage each time they hit an enemy and slowing them by 10% for 0.8s (the slow effect stacks up to 50%). The circling speed of the Crimson Flowers also increases with each hit.

Carmilla recovers 75 (+35% Total Magic Power) HP each time a Crimson Flower deals damage (only recovers 30% of that amount when hitting Minions).
skills.description_html:
Carmilla summons two Crimson Flowers that circle around her for 5s, dealing 100 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage each time they hit an enemy and slowing them by 10% for 0.8s (the slow effect stacks up to 50%). The circling speed of the Crimson Flowers also increases with each hit.

Carmilla recovers 75 (+35% Total Magic Power) HP each time a Crimson Flower deals damage (only recovers 30% of that amount when hitting Minions).

skills.name: Bloodbath
skills.description_text:
Carmilla accumulates Bloodbath Energy, gaining 70% Movement Speed that decays over 4.5s.

Use Again: Carmilla unleashes the accumulated Bloodbath Energy on the target enemy hero or Creep, dealing 150 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and stunning them for 0.6s. The damage and stun duration scale with the accumulation time (up to 100%).
skills.description_html:
Carmilla accumulates Bloodbath Energy, gaining 70% Movement Speed that decays over 4.5s.

Use Again: Carmilla unleashes the accumulated Bloodbath Energy on the target enemy hero or Creep, dealing 150 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and stunning them for 0.6s. The damage and stun duration scale with the accumulation time (up to 100%).

skills.name: Curse of Blood
skills.description_text:
Carmilla casts Curse of Blood on the target location, slowing enemies hit by 50%. After 0.8s, enemies still within the area will take 450 (+130% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage, and will be immobilized for 1s, slowed by 30% and linked for 5s.

When a linked enemy takes damage or becomes controlled, all the other linked targets take 50% of the damage and become controlled for 100% of the duration. Enemies can move away from one another to break the link.
skills.description_html:
Carmilla casts Curse of Blood on the target location, slowing enemies hit by 50%. After 0.8s, enemies still within the area will take 450 (+130% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage, and will be immobilized for 1s, slowed by 30% and linked for 5s.

When a linked enemy takes damage or becomes controlled, all the other linked targets take 50% of the damage and become controlled for 100% of the duration. Enemies can move away from one another to break the link.

quote: The girl who became a Blood Demon for love.

name: Cecilion

skills.name: Overflowing
skills.description_text:
Cecilion gains 10 extra Max Mana and recovers 10 Mana each time his skill hits an enemy. Cooldown: 1s.

Cecilion has higher Max Mana and Mana Regen, and his skill damage scales with his Max Mana.
skills.description_html:
Cecilion gains 10 extra Max Mana and recovers 10 Mana each time his skill hits an enemy. Cooldown: 1s.

Cecilion has higher Max Mana and Mana Regen, and his skill damage scales with his Max Mana.

skills.name: Bat Impact
skills.description_text:
Cecilion commands a giant bat to dive at the target location, gaining 30% extra Movement Speed for 1s, dealing 85 (+70% Total Magic Power) (+7% Total Mana) Magic Damage to enemies in its path. The bat also deals 170 (+140% Total Magic Power) (+14% Total Mana) extra Magic Damage to those near the landing point, and applies Overflowing effect once.

Each subsequent cast within 6s increases this skill's Mana cost by 1.8 times (up to 4 stacks).
skills.description_html:
Cecilion commands a giant bat to dive at the target location, gaining 30% extra Movement Speed for 1s, dealing 85 (+70% Total Magic Power) (+7% Total Mana) Magic Damage to enemies in its path. The bat also deals 170 (+140% Total Magic Power) (+14% Total Mana) extra Magic Damage to those near the landing point, and applies Overflowing effect once.

Each subsequent cast within 6s increases this skill's Mana cost by 1.8 times (up to 4 stacks).

skills.name: Sanguine Claws
skills.description_text: Cecilion summons a pair of opposing claws at the target location that will clasp together after a short delay, pulling enemies in their paths to the center while dealing them 200 (+45% Total Magic Power) (+1.2% Total Mana) Magic Damage and immobilizing them for 1s.
skills.description_html: Cecilion summons a pair of opposing claws at the target location that will clasp together after a short delay, pulling enemies in their paths to the center while dealing them 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+45% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="a6aafb">(+1.2% Total Mana)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and immobilizing them for 1s.

skills.name: Bats Feast
skills.description_text:
Cecilion unleashes his Blood Demon power, gaining 60% extra Movement Speed (decays over the duration) and Slow Immunity for 1.5s. Meanwhile, he fires 36 bolts of blood energy at nearby enemies, each dealing 35 (+8% Total Magic Power) (+0.3% Total Mana) Magic Damage to the enemy hit and slowing them by 3% (up to 30%) for 1s.

Each bolt also restores 10 plus 1% of Cecilion's lost HP for him on hit.
skills.description_html:
Cecilion unleashes his Blood Demon power, gaining 60% extra Movement Speed (decays over the duration) and Slow Immunity for 1.5s. Meanwhile, he fires 36 bolts of blood energy at nearby enemies, each dealing 35 (+8% Total Magic Power) (+0.3% Total Mana) Magic Damage to the enemy hit and slowing them by 3% (up to 30%) for 1s.

Each bolt also restores 10 plus 1% of Cecilion's lost HP for him on hit.

skills.name: Moonlit Waltz
skills.description_text:
When Carmilla is nearby, Cecilion can summon her to become a Vermil Shadow around him, granting him a 520-800 shield (scales with Carmilla's level).
Carmilla can choose to leave Cecilion and charge at the target location, gaining an equal shield while dealing 520-800 Magic Damage (scales with level) to nearby enemies and slowing them by 30% for 1s.
skills.description_html:
When Carmilla is nearby, Cecilion can summon her to become a Vermil Shadow around him, granting him a 520-800 shield (scales with Carmilla's level).
Carmilla can choose to leave Cecilion and charge at the target location, gaining an equal shield while dealing 520-800 Magic Damage (scales with level) to nearby enemies and slowing them by 30% for 1s.

quote: Carmilla's Blood Demon lover.

name: Silvanna

skills.name: Knightess' Resolve
skills.description_text:
Silvanna's Basic Attacks deal 25 (+45% Total Physical Attack) (+75% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.
Silvanna's attacks apply a mark on enemy heroes for 5s on hit, each mark reducing their Physical & Magic Defense by 3-6 (up to 5 stacks).
Silvanna's skills and Basic Attacks deal 30% extra damage to enemy heroes with the max number of marks.
skills.description_html:
Silvanna's Basic Attacks deal 25 (+45% Total Physical Attack) (+75% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.
Silvanna's attacks apply a mark on enemy heroes for 5s on hit, each mark reducing their Physical & Magic Defense by 3-6 (up to 5 stacks).
Silvanna's skills and Basic Attacks deal 30% extra damage to enemy heroes with the max number of marks.

skills.name: Cometic Lance
skills.description_text: Silvanna dashes forward. Upon reaching the max range or hitting a non-Minion enemy, she swings her lance, dealing 250 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies and stunning them for 1s.
skills.description_html: Silvanna dashes forward. Upon reaching the max range or hitting a non-Minion enemy, she swings her lance, dealing 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies and stunning them for 1s.

skills.name: Spiral Strangling
skills.description_text:
Silvanna thrusts her lance in the target direction and spins it 6 times while gaining a 350 (+150% Total Magic Power) shield. Each spin deals 165 (+45% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and slightly pulls targets toward the center. Silvanna spins 1 additional time for every 50% of extra Attack Speed she possesses.

The skill deals only 50% damage against Minions.

Spiral Strangling counts as a Basic Attack but cannot Crit.
skills.description_html:
Silvanna thrusts her lance in the target direction and spins it 6 times while gaining a 350 (+150% Total Magic Power) shield. Each spin deals 165 (+45% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and slightly pulls targets toward the center. Silvanna spins 1 additional time for every 50% of extra Attack Speed she possesses.

The skill deals only 50% damage against Minions.

Spiral Strangling counts as a Basic Attack but cannot Crit.

skills.name: Imperial Justice
skills.description_text:
Silvanna leaps to the target location and creates a Circle of Light upon landing, dealing 350 (+110% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the area, slowing them by 40% for 1.5s, and restraining the closest enemy hero to the area for 3.5s. (This skill cannot be interrupted.)

Silvanna gains 100% Attack Speed and 40% Lifesteal when in the Circle.
skills.description_html:
Silvanna leaps to the target location and creates a Circle of Light upon landing, dealing 350 (+110% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the area, slowing them by 40% for 1.5s, and restraining the closest enemy hero to the area for 3.5s. (This skill cannot be interrupted.)

Silvanna gains 100% Attack Speed and 40% Lifesteal when in the Circle.

quote: Princess of the Moniyan Empire and queen regent.

name: Wanwan

skills.name: Tiger Pace
skills.description_text:
Enemy heroes hit by Wanwan's attacks will have their weaknesses and positions exposed for 5s. When hitting an enemy's weakness, Wanwan deals 67(+3*Hero Level) extra True Damage and increases their damage taken from her subsequent attacks by 10% for 5s.
Wanwan can dash a short distance after each arrow fired from her Basic Attack. The dash speed scales with her Attack Speed.
skills.description_html:
Enemy heroes hit by Wanwan's attacks will have their weaknesses and positions exposed for 5s. When hitting an enemy's weakness, Wanwan deals 67(+3*Hero Level) extra True Damage and increases their damage taken from her subsequent attacks by 10% for 5s.
Wanwan can dash a short distance after each arrow fired from her Basic Attack. The dash speed scales with her Attack Speed.

skills.name: Swallow’s Path
skills.description_text: Wanwan throws a Fire Swallow in the target direction, triggering Tiger Pace while dealing 120 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in its path. The Fire Swallow then turns into 3 rotating Swallow Daggers. After a short delay, these Swallow Daggers will fly back to Wanwan one after another, dealing 60 (+65% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies on their way back and slowing them by 30% for 1.5s. Enemies hit twice by the Swallow Daggers will be immobilized for 0.5s.
skills.description_html: Wanwan throws a Fire Swallow in the target direction, triggering <font color="a6aafb">Tiger Pace</font> while dealing 120<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in its path. The Fire Swallow then turns into 3 rotating Swallow Daggers. After a short delay, these Swallow Daggers will fly back to Wanwan one after another, dealing 60<font color="fba51f"> (+65% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies on their way back and slowing them by 30% for 1.5s. Enemies hit twice by the Swallow Daggers will be immobilized for 0.5s.

skills.name: Needles in Flowers
skills.description_text: Wanwan removes all control effects on herself and triggers Tiger Pace. Meanwhile, she shoots Deadly Needles in all directions, dealing 150 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit.
skills.description_html: Wanwan removes all control effects on herself and triggers <font color="a6aafb">Tiger Pace</font>. Meanwhile, she shoots Deadly Needles in all directions, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit.

skills.name: Crossbow of Tang
skills.description_text:
Wanwan leaps into the air and fires arrows at the target enemy hero for 2.5s in rapid succession, dealing 60 (+35% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage per arrow. If the target is killed during this attack, Wanwan will switch to another enemy hero in her attack range, gain 30% Attack Speed, and extend the skill duration by 1s (this effect can trigger up to 3 times). Wanwan is untargetable and invincible for the duration and can trigger Tiger Pace upon killing an enemy and at the end of the duration.
Crossbow of Tang can only be cast on enemy heroes with all their weaknesses hit and Wanwan gains 100% Movement Speed during the duration. This damage is regarded as Basic Attack damage, and the firing rate scales with Wanwan's Attack Speed.
skills.description_html:
Wanwan leaps into the air and fires arrows at the target enemy hero for 2.5s in rapid succession, dealing 60 (+35% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage per arrow. If the target is killed during this attack, Wanwan will switch to another enemy hero in her attack range, gain 30% Attack Speed, and extend the skill duration by 1s (this effect can trigger up to 3 times). Wanwan is untargetable and invincible for the duration and can trigger Tiger Pace upon killing an enemy and at the end of the duration.
Crossbow of Tang can only be cast on enemy heroes with all their weaknesses hit and Wanwan gains 100% Movement Speed during the duration. This damage is regarded as Basic Attack damage, and the firing rate scales with Wanwan's Attack Speed.

quote: The Agile Tiger of the Oriental Fighters and a lively young girl who wields the Crossbow of Tang.

name: Masha

skills.name: Ancient Strength
skills.description_text: Blessed by the Bear King, Masha has 3 HP bars and won't die until all of them are depleted. She can ignore an instance of damage and remove all Control effects on herself each time she loses an HP bar. When Masha only has two HP bars left, skills will only require 50% of their original HP Cost to cast. When Masha only has one HP bar left, she doesn't need to spend HP to cast skills.
skills.description_html: Blessed by the Bear King, Masha has 3 HP bars and won't die until all of them are depleted. She can ignore an instance of damage and remove all Control effects on herself each time she loses an HP bar. When Masha only has two HP bars left, skills will only require 50% of their original HP Cost to cast. When Masha only has one HP bar left, she doesn't need to spend HP to cast skills.

skills.name: Wild Power
skills.description_text:
Passive: Masha gains Power of the Wild which causes her Basic Attacks to deal extra Physical Damage equal to 2 (+1% Extra Physical Attack)% of the target's Max HP (up to 60 against Creeps and doesn't take effect on Turrets or Base).
Active: Masha spends 24% HP to increase her Movement Speed by 60% for 1.5s. She also increases the extra Physical Damage from Power of the Wild by 3 (+1% Extra Physical Attack)% of the target's Max HP and gains 50% extra Attack Speed for her next two Basic Attacks.
skills.description_html:
Passive: Masha gains Power of the Wild which causes her Basic Attacks to deal extra Physical Damage equal to 2 (+1% Extra Physical Attack)% of the target's Max HP (up to 60 against Creeps and doesn't take effect on Turrets or Base).
Active: Masha spends 24% HP to increase her Movement Speed by 60% for 1.5s. She also increases the extra Physical Damage from Power of the Wild by 3 (+1% Extra Physical Attack)% of the target's Max HP and gains 50% extra Attack Speed for her next two Basic Attacks.

skills.name: Howl Shock
skills.description_text: Masha spends 24% HP to roar at enemies, dealing 200 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and reducing their Attack Speed by 50% for 2s.
skills.description_html: Masha spends 24% HP to roar at enemies, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and reducing their Attack Speed by 50% for 2s.

skills.name: Thunderclap
skills.description_text: Masha spends 34% HP to lunge at an enemy hero (immune to control effects during the lunge), dealing 400 (+220% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage, slowing them by 25% for 2s, and knocking back nearby enemies. The cooldown of this skill will be reset each time Masha loses an HP bar.
skills.description_html: Masha spends 34% HP to lunge at an enemy hero (immune to control effects during the lunge), dealing 400<font color="fba51f"> (+220% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>, slowing them by 25% for 2s, and knocking back nearby enemies. The cooldown of this skill will be reset each time Masha loses an HP bar.

skills.name: Life Recovery
skills.description_text:
Masha gains Energy when dealing damage to enemies and extra Energy when dealing damage with Wild Power.

After leaving combat for 3s, Masha can activate this skill to spend half a full bar of Energy to recover a full HP bar. Masha is invincible while casting this skill.
skills.description_html:
Masha gains Energy when dealing damage to enemies and extra Energy when dealing damage with Wild Power.

After leaving combat for 3s, Masha can activate this skill to spend half a full bar of Energy to recover a full HP bar. Masha is invincible while casting this skill.

quote: Guardian of the Direbears.

name: Baxia

skills.name: Baxia Mark
skills.description_text:
Baxia activates the "Baxia Mark" permanently, reducing the final damage received by 25.
At the same time, Baxia will reduce the Shield and HP Regen of enemies hit by his skills by 40% for 4s.
skills.description_html:
Baxia activates the "Baxia Mark" permanently, reducing the final damage received by 25.
At the same time, Baxia will reduce the Shield and HP Regen of enemies hit by his skills by 40% for 4s.

skills.name: Baxia-Shield Unity
skills.description_text:
Baxia retracts himself into his shield and accelerates forward. When hitting an enemy unit, he will deal 300 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to it and nearby enemies, stunning the target for 0.8s and slightly knocking other nearby enemies back.
During the process of accelerating forward, use this skill again to launch Baxia upward so that he can cross obstacles and enemy minions. When leaping up, if there is an enemy hero under Baxia, he will strike this hero, dealing 375 (+75% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to this hero and nearby enemies, stunning the target hit for 1.5s, and slightly knocking other nearby enemy targets back.
skills.description_html:
Baxia retracts himself into his shield and accelerates forward. When hitting an enemy unit, he will deal 300 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to it and nearby enemies, stunning the target for 0.8s and slightly knocking other nearby enemies back.
During the process of accelerating forward, use this skill again to launch Baxia upward so that he can cross obstacles and enemy minions. When leaping up, if there is an enemy hero under Baxia, he will strike this hero, dealing 375 (+75% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to this hero and nearby enemies, stunning the target hit for 1.5s, and slightly knocking other nearby enemy targets back.

skills.name: Shield of Spirit
skills.description_text:
Baxia throws out his shield, dealing Magic Damage equal to 180 (+120% Total Magic Power) plus 6% of the target's Max HP to the enemies along the way, marking them for 5s, and slowing them by 50% for 1s. The shield disappears upon hitting the first enemy hero or creep.
Baxia can cast the skill again in a short while. If an enemy hero or creep is hit by the skill, the skill's cooldown will be reduced to 15%.
skills.description_html:
Baxia throws out his shield, dealing Magic Damage equal to 180 (+120% Total Magic Power) plus 6% of the target's Max HP to the enemies along the way, marking them for 5s, and slowing them by 50% for 1s. The shield disappears upon hitting the first enemy hero or creep.
Baxia can cast the skill again in a short while. If an enemy hero or creep is hit by the skill, the skill's cooldown will be reduced to 15%.

skills.name: Tortoise’s Puissance
skills.description_text:
Baxia holds his shield to the front and begins sprinting frantically, gaining 30% extra Movement Speed for 10s while leaving a lava path behind. Enemies on the path will take 40 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and be slowed by 15% for 0.5s every 0.5s.
For the duration, the Damage Reduction effect from Baxia Mark is increased to 200%.
skills.description_html:
Baxia holds his shield to the front and begins sprinting frantically, gaining 30% extra Movement Speed for 10s while leaving a lava path behind. Enemies on the path will take 40 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and be slowed by 15% for 0.5s every 0.5s.
For the duration, the Damage Reduction effect from Baxia Mark is increased to 200%.

quote: The Mystic Tortoise of the Oriental Fighters, a shield-wielding, unstoppable wheel of flames.

name: Lylia

skills.name: Angry Gloom
skills.description_text:
Lylia gets power from Gloom, increasing her Movement Speed by 15%. Each Gloom upgrade further increases this bonus by 5%.
Gloom gains an upgrade every time he devours Shadow Energy, up to 5 times. Gloom upgrade increases the detonation damage of Shadow Energy.
skills.description_html:
Lylia gets power from Gloom, increasing her Movement Speed by 15%. Each Gloom upgrade further increases this bonus by 5%.
Gloom gains an upgrade every time he devours Shadow Energy, up to 5 times. Gloom upgrade increases the detonation damage of Shadow Energy.

skills.name: Magic Shockwave
skills.description_text:
Lylia sends out Gloom with a shockwave, dealing 250 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in a line and slowing them by 30% for 1.5s.
If Gloom touches Shadow Energy, he will devour and detonate it.
skills.description_html:
Lylia sends out Gloom with a shockwave, dealing 250 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in a line and slowing them by 30% for 1.5s.
If Gloom touches Shadow Energy, he will devour and detonate it.

skills.name: Shadow Energy
skills.description_text:
Lylia condenses Shadow Energy at the target location, dealing 90 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 80%.
Shadow Energy can be detonated by Gloom's devour, dealing 220 (+115% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the enemies nearby. Each Gloom upgrade increases the detonation damage by 20%, up to 80%.
Gloom will restore 20% of Shadow Energy's Recharge Time when it hits an enemy hero.
Lylia starts with the Shadow Energy skill, storing one charge every 6s.
skills.description_html:
Lylia condenses Shadow Energy at the target location, dealing 90 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 80%.
Shadow Energy can be detonated by Gloom's devour, dealing 220 (+115% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the enemies nearby. Each Gloom upgrade increases the detonation damage by 20%, up to 80%.
Gloom will restore 20% of Shadow Energy's Recharge Time when it hits an enemy hero.
Lylia starts with the Shadow Energy skill, storing one charge every 6s.

skills.name: Black Shoes
skills.description_text: Lylia returns to the Black Shoes' location 4s ago and restores her HP and Mana to the previous state, and an extra 10% Max HP. She also gains 20% extra Movement Speed for 2s.
skills.description_html: Lylia returns to the Black Shoes' location 4s ago and restores her HP and Mana to the previous state, and an extra 10% Max HP. She also gains 20% extra Movement Speed for 2s.

quote: A funny and witted little witch.

name: Dyrroth

skills.name: Wrath of the Abyss
skills.description_text:
When Dyrroth's Rage reaches 50%, he will enhance Burst Strike and Spectre Step.
After every 2 Basic Attacks, Dyrroth will release Circle Strike, dealing (+160% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the circle and recovering HP according to the damage he deals (Circle Strike doesn't have Attack Effect). Each time he hits an enemy hero, the cooldown of Burst Strike and Spectre Step will be reduced by 1s.
skills.description_html:
When Dyrroth's Rage reaches 50%, he will enhance Burst Strike and Spectre Step.
After every 2 Basic Attacks, Dyrroth will release Circle Strike, dealing (+160% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the circle and recovering HP according to the damage he deals (Circle Strike doesn't have Attack Effect). Each time he hits an enemy hero, the cooldown of Burst Strike and Spectre Step will be reduced by 1s.

skills.name: Burst Strike
skills.description_text:
Dyrroth releases a burst strike in a designated direction. Each burst deals 200 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies and slows them by 25% for 1.5s. (The damage decays against the same target and decreases to only 75% on minions.)

Abyss Enhanced: Burst Strike has a longer range, deals 140% of the original damage, and its Slowing Effect is doubled.
skills.description_html:
Dyrroth releases a burst strike in a designated direction. Each burst deals 200 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies and slows them by 25% for 1.5s. (The damage decays against the same target and decreases to only 75% on minions.)

Abyss Enhanced: Burst Strike has a longer range, deals 140% of the original damage, and its Slowing Effect is doubled.

skills.name: Spectre Step
skills.description_text:
Dyrroth dashes in the designated direction. He will stop when he has traveled the max distance or hits one enemy hero or a Creep, dealing 230 (+60% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target and slightly knocking them back. When he uses this skill again, he will lock onto a target and release a Fatal Strike (cannot apply to Minions), dealing 345 (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage and reducing the target's Physical Defense by 40% for 4s.

Abyss Enhanced: Fatal Strike will reach further and deal 150% of the original damage, slow the target by an extra 90% and reduce the target's Physical Defense by 60% for 4s.
skills.description_html:
Dyrroth dashes in the designated direction. He will stop when he has traveled the max distance or hits one enemy hero or a Creep, dealing 230 (+60% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target and slightly knocking them back. When he uses this skill again, he will lock onto a target and release a Fatal Strike (cannot apply to Minions), dealing 345 (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage and reducing the target's Physical Defense by 40% for 4s.

Abyss Enhanced: Fatal Strike will reach further and deal 150% of the original damage, slow the target by an extra 90% and reduce the target's Physical Defense by 60% for 4s.

skills.name: Abysm Strike
skills.description_text: After a short delay, Dyrroth launches a destructive strike in the target direction (this skill can only be interrupted by Suppression), dealing 650 (+250% Extra Physical Attack) plus 20% of the target's lost HP as Physical Damage to enemies in its path, and slowing them by 55% for 0.8s. This skill deals up to 1500 damage to non-hero enemies.
skills.description_html: After a short delay, Dyrroth launches a destructive strike in the target direction (this skill can only be interrupted by Suppression), dealing 650<font color="fba51f"> (+250% Extra Physical Attack)</font> plus 20% of the target's lost HP as <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in its path, and slowing them by 55% for 0.8s. This skill deals up to 1500 damage to non-hero enemies.

quote: Prince of the Empire who was kidnapped and used by the Abyss.

name: Ling

skills.name: Cloud Walker
skills.description_text:
Ling's superb Lightness Skill allows him to leap among walls. He gains 4 extra Lightness Points per second when he's on a wall and 5 extra Lightness Points each time he deals damage.

Ling gains 1.6 times Crit Chance from all sources but only has 140% Crit Damage.
skills.description_html:
Ling's superb Lightness Skill allows him to leap among walls. He gains 4 extra Lightness Points per second when he's on a wall and 5 extra Lightness Points each time he deals damage.

Ling gains 1.6 times Crit Chance from all sources but only has 140% Crit Damage.

skills.name: Finch Poise
skills.description_text:
Passive: Ling’s Critical Chance is permanently increased by 2.5%.

Active: Ling casts his Lightness Skill, leaping onto the designated wall, entering half-stealth state, restoring Lightness Points more quickly and gaining 30% Movement Speed. If Ling receives damage, he will leave the half-stealth state. If he is controlled, he will fall onto the ground and be slowed by 30% for 2s. When using this skill to jump from a wall to another, it will reset the Cooldown and refresh the half-stealth state.
skills.description_html:
Passive: Ling’s Critical Chance is permanently increased by 2.5%.

Active: Ling casts his Lightness Skill, leaping onto the designated wall, entering half-stealth state, restoring Lightness Points more quickly and gaining 30% Movement Speed. If Ling receives damage, he will leave the half-stealth state. If he is controlled, he will fall onto the ground and be slowed by 30% for 2s. When using this skill to jump from a wall to another, it will reset the Cooldown and refresh the half-stealth state.

skills.name: Defiant Sword
skills.description_text:
Ling charges in the target direction and stabs nearby enemies, dealing them 300 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
If Ling casts this skill when he's on the wall (no energy cost), he'll dash to the target location on the ground, dealing 300 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area and slowing them by 30% for 1.5s.
Defiant Sword is regarded as Basic Attack.
skills.description_html:
Ling charges in the target direction and stabs nearby enemies, dealing them 300 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
If Ling casts this skill when he's on the wall (no energy cost), he'll dash to the target location on the ground, dealing 300 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area and slowing them by 30% for 1.5s.
Defiant Sword is regarded as Basic Attack.

skills.name: Tempest of Blades
skills.description_text:
Ling leaps into the air, becoming invincible and gaining 10% extra Movement Speed for 1.5s. He ignores obstacles when in the air. He then lands on the ground, dealing 250 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area and slowing them by 40% for 1.5s, knocking those in the center airborne for 1s, and creating a Sword Field for 8s.

Four Tempest of Blades will also appear on the edge of the Sword Field. Ling can touch them to reduce the cooldown of Finch Poise by 4s, reset the cooldown of Defiant Sword, and gain 25 Lightness Points.
skills.description_html:
Ling leaps into the air, becoming invincible and gaining 10% extra Movement Speed for 1.5s. He ignores obstacles when in the air. He then lands on the ground, dealing 250 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area and slowing them by 40% for 1.5s, knocking those in the center airborne for 1s, and creating a Sword Field for 8s.

Four Tempest of Blades will also appear on the edge of the Sword Field. Ling can touch them to reduce the cooldown of Finch Poise by 4s, reset the cooldown of Defiant Sword, and gain 25 Lightness Points.

quote: A graceful, free-soaring Finch and the Oriental Fighter who inherited the Vermilion Bird's power.

name: X.Borg

skills.name: Firaga Armor
skills.description_text:
X.Borg's Firaga Armor inherits 160% of his Max HP. When his armor is destroyed, X.Borg rolls in the direction of the Joystick and becomes immune to damage. The armor's energy will gradually regenerate while X.Borg is in the Armorless State. At full energy, X.Borg re-equips the armor and restores it to 30%.
X.Borg's fire damage heats enemies up, causing them to enter the Overheated state. Enemies in the Overheated state will drop Firaga supplies when they take fire damage from X.Borg. Picking up a Firaga supply restores 10% of the Armor's HP, or 10 energy while in the Armorless state.
skills.description_html:
X.Borg's Firaga Armor inherits 160% of his Max HP. When his armor is destroyed, X.Borg rolls in the direction of the Joystick and becomes immune to damage. The armor's energy will gradually regenerate while X.Borg is in the Armorless State. At full energy, X.Borg re-equips the armor and restores it to 30%.
X.Borg's fire damage heats enemies up, causing them to enter the Overheated state. Enemies in the Overheated state will drop Firaga supplies when they take fire damage from X.Borg. Picking up a Firaga supply restores 10% of the Armor's HP, or 10 energy while in the Armorless state.

skills.name: Fire Missiles
skills.description_text:
X.Borg sprays fire, dealing 25 (+60% Total Physical Attack) (+40% Total Magic Power) Physical Damage 7 times over 2s to enemies in front of him. He deals True Damage to enemies in the Overheated state (75% damage to minions).

Armorless State: The attack area becomes narrower but longer, while the damage is reduced to 60%.
skills.description_html:
X.Borg sprays fire, dealing 25 (+60% Total Physical Attack) (+40% Total Magic Power) Physical Damage 7 times over 2s to enemies in front of him. He deals True Damage to enemies in the Overheated state (75% damage to minions).

Armorless State: The attack area becomes narrower but longer, while the damage is reduced to 60%.

skills.name: Fire Stake
skills.description_text:
X.Borg fires 5 Fire Stakes forward and recalls them after 1.7s. Each stake deals 50 (+20% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and pulls enemies and Firaga Supplies along its path back to him.

Armorless State: X.Borg adjusts the Fire Stake launcher, making the stakes travel further and closer together.
skills.description_html:
X.Borg fires 5 Fire Stakes forward and recalls them after 1.7s. Each stake deals 50 (+20% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and pulls enemies and Firaga Supplies along its path back to him.

Armorless State: X.Borg adjusts the Fire Stake launcher, making the stakes travel further and closer together.

skills.name: Last Insanity
skills.description_text:
X.Borg charges in the target direction while spinning and spraying flames (cannot pick up Firaga Supplies during this time), dealing 90 (+60% Extra Physical Attack) (+45% Total Magic Power) Physical Damage 14 times and slowing enemies hit by 25%. He stops upon running into an enemy hero and will slow them by an additional 40%. After 3s, X.Borg's Firaga Armor detonates, dealing 300 plus 15% of the target's Max HP as True Damage. If his armor is destroyed before it can self-detonate, it will only deal 50% of the damage. The detonation destroys his Firaga Armor, removes all debuffs, and collects all nearby Firaga Supplies.

Use Again: X.Borg stops spraying fire and immediately detonates his Firaga Armor.

quote: An uncontrollable flame that's determined to take revenge against Eruditio.

name: Terizla

skills.name: Body of Smith
skills.description_text:
Terizla gains 1% extra Damage Reduction (up to 20 (+1*Hero Level)%) for every 2.5% HP lost.
He cannot gain extra Attack Speed and will convert every 1% extra Attack Speed he's supposed to receive into 1 extra Physical Attack.
skills.description_html:
Terizla gains 1% extra Damage Reduction (up to 20 (+1*Hero Level)%) for every 2.5% HP lost.
He cannot gain extra Attack Speed and will convert every 1% extra Attack Speed he's supposed to receive into 1 extra Physical Attack.

skills.name: Revenge Strike
skills.description_text: Terizla cracks the ground with his hammer and the fissure will spread out, dealing 300 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage. After the fissure hits the first target, it will drill into the target and slow them by 15%. At the same time, Terizla's Movement Speed will be increased by 15% for 3.5s. The fissure on target will then explode, dealing 300 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) plus 20% of the enemy's lost HP Physical Damage.
skills.description_html: Terizla cracks the ground with his hammer and the fissure will spread out, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. After the fissure hits the first target, it will drill into the target and slow them by 15%. At the same time, Terizla's Movement Speed will be increased by 15% for 3.5s. The fissure on target will then explode, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Extra Physical Attack)</font> plus 20% of the enemy's lost HP <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

skills.name: Execution Strike
skills.description_text:
Terizla swings his hammer in a fan-shaped area ahead. This skill can be cast up to 3 times. The first two attacks deal 90 (+135% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage each, while the third deals 225 (+220% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. Enemies hit will also be slowed by 20% for 1.25s (the Slowing Effect can stack).
Deals only 80% damage to Minions.

skills.name: Penalty Zone
skills.description_text: Terizla jumps to the designated area, dealing 300 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and knocking enemies airborne for 0.6s. He then summons Scaffold and slows enemies by 25%. Scaffold will send out a hook at enemy heroes in range and pull them several times while dealing 150 (+30% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage each time.

quote: Once an eccentric master smith, but now an avenger siding with the Abyss.

name: Esmeralda

skills.name: Starmoon Casket
skills.description_text:
Esmeralda manipulates Stardust and Frostmoon: Stardust deals Physical Damage while Frostmoon deals Magic Damage and gives the target a shield equal to 135% of Frostmoon's damage dealt. Each Basic Attack deals (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and 100 (+75% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.
The damage dealt by Esmeralda ignores all shield effects and gradually converts her shield into HP.
skills.description_html:
Esmeralda manipulates Stardust and Frostmoon: Stardust deals Physical Damage while Frostmoon deals Magic Damage and gives the target a shield equal to 135% of Frostmoon's damage dealt. Each Basic Attack deals (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and 100 (+75% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.
The damage dealt by Esmeralda ignores all shield effects and gradually converts her shield into HP.

skills.name: Frostmoon Shield
skills.description_text: Esmeralda gains 400 (+150% Total Magic Power) Shield and 40% Movement Speed which rapidly decays over its duration for 4s. Meanwhile, she gradually transforms the shields of her nearby enemies into her own shield, capped at 50% of her Max HP.
skills.description_html: Esmeralda gains 400<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> Shield and 40% Movement Speed which rapidly decays over its duration for 4s. Meanwhile, she gradually transforms the shields of her nearby enemies into her own shield, capped at 50% of her Max HP.

skills.name: Stardust Dance
skills.description_text: Esmeralda waves Stardust and Frostmoon, dealing 240 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and 300 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies. Each time she deals damage to a hero, the cooldown of Frostmoon Shield is reduced by 1.5s (damaging non-hero units grants a 0.5s reduction) and the enemy's Movement Speed is reduced by 10% for 1.5s.
skills.description_html: Esmeralda waves Stardust and Frostmoon, dealing 240<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+120% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies. skills.name: Falling Starmoon
skills.description_text:
Esmeralda coheres the power of Astrospace into her two weapons - Stardust and Frostmoon. The longer this skill is channeled, the longer the cast range.

Use Again: Esmeralda casts Stardust at the target location, dealing 350 (+90% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage, and then blinks to the target location and casts Frostmoon, dealing 350 (+140% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and immobilizing enemies in the area for 1s.
skills.description_html:
Esmeralda coheres the power of Astrospace into her two weapons - Stardust and Frostmoon. The longer this skill is channeled, the longer the cast range.

Use Again: Esmeralda casts Stardust at the target location, dealing 350 (+90% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage, and then blinks to the target location and casts Frostmoon, dealing 350 (+140% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and immobilizing enemies in the area for 1s.

quote: A mysterious astrologer.

name: Guinevere

skills.name: Super Magic
skills.description_text:
Guinevere deals 25% extra damage to airborne enemies and deals (+80% Total Physical Attack) (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage with her Basic Attacks.
Guinevere builds Super Magic each time she deals damage. Once fully charged, her next Basic Attack becomes guided, dealing 80 (+100% Total Physical Attack) (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic damage on hit and restoring 80 plus 8% of her lost HP.
Enemies hit by Guinevere's skills or enhanced Basic Attack will be marked for 5s. Those with 3 marks will be knocked airborne when hit by her Violet Requiem.
skills.description_html:
Guinevere deals 25% extra damage to airborne enemies and deals (+80% Total Physical Attack) (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage with her Basic Attacks.
Guinevere builds Super Magic each time she deals damage. Once fully charged, her next Basic Attack becomes guided, dealing 80 (+100% Total Physical Attack) (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic damage on hit and restoring 80 plus 8% of her lost HP.
Enemies hit by Guinevere's skills or enhanced Basic Attack will be marked for 5s. Those with 3 marks will be knocked airborne when hit by her Violet Requiem.

skills.name: Energy Wave
skills.description_text:
Guinevere releases an energy orb in the target direction, dealing 300 (+125% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and slowing enemies by 50% for 1.2s.
Successfully hitting an enemy reduces all her skill cooldowns by 1s.
skills.description_html:
Guinevere releases an energy orb in the target direction, dealing 300 (+125% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and slowing enemies by 50% for 1.2s.
Successfully hitting an enemy reduces all her skill cooldowns by 1s.

skills.name: Spatial Migration
skills.description_text:
Guinevere leaps to the target location, dealing 250 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. Enemy heroes and Creeps hit will be knocked airborne for 1s and take 125 (+50% Total Magic Power) additional Magic Damage.
Use Again: Guinevere blinks toward the target direction and leaves an illusion behind. If the illusion takes damage by hero, it restores Super Magic for Guinevere and explodes after 1.5s, dealing 100 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.
skills.description_html:
Guinevere leaps to the target location, dealing 250 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. Enemy heroes and Creeps hit will be knocked airborne for 1s and take 125 (+50% Total Magic Power) additional Magic Damage.
Use Again: Guinevere blinks toward the target direction and leaves an illusion behind. If the illusion takes damage by hero, it restores Super Magic for Guinevere and explodes after 1.5s, dealing 100 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Violet Requiem
skills.description_text:
Guinevere creates a force field around her, gaining Control Immunity while attacking nearby enemies 11 times within 2s, dealing 880 (+385% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage in total.
Airborne enemies hit will be knocked airborne again, up to 8 additional times.

Guinevere creates a force field around her, gaining Control Immunity while attacking nearby enemies 11 times within 2s, dealing 880 (+385% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage in total.
Airborne enemies hit will be knocked airborne again, up to 8 additional times.

quote: Aristocratic girl with a strange temperament, loved by her elder brother Lancelot.

name: Granger

skills.name: Capriccio
skills.description_text:
Granger can load his gun with up to 6 bullets at a time. Each 6th bullet is guaranteed to Crit.
Granger's Basic Attack deals 800 Physical Damage, but he only gains 8% of his total extra Attack Speed.
skills.description_html:
Granger can load his gun with up to 6 bullets at a time. Each 6th bullet is guaranteed to Crit.
Granger's Basic Attack deals 800 Physical Damage, but he only gains 8% of his total extra Attack Speed.

skills.name: Rhapsody
skills.description_text: Granger immediately reloads his gun and fires continuously in the target direction, dealing 60 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage with each shot (deals 35 extra damage against Creeps).
skills.description_html: Granger immediately reloads his gun and fires continuously in the target direction, dealing 60<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> with each shot (deals 35 extra damage against Creeps).

skills.name: Rondo
skills.description_text:
Granger blinks in the designated direction, and his next 2 Basic Attacks deal extra 15% of damage in 5s.

Each time Rhapsody hits an enemy hero, the CD of this skill will be reduced by 0.5s.
skills.description_html:
Granger blinks in the designated direction, and his next 2 Basic Attacks deal extra 15% of damage in 5s.

Each time Rhapsody hits an enemy hero, the CD of this skill will be reduced by 0.5s.

skills.name: Death Sonata
skills.description_text: Granger immediately reloads and fires a cannon shot in the target direction with the super cannon hidden in his violin case. The cannon shot will pass through Minions and explode upon hitting an enemy hero, dealing Physical Damage equal to 150 (+110% Total Physical Attack) plus 12% of the target's lost HP to enemies in the area and slowing them by 80%. Granger can fire the super cannon 3 times at the cost of 2 bullets per shot, and can move once in the target direction after each shot. When Death Sonata ends, its cooldown will be reduced by 15% for every 2 bullets remaining.
skills.description_html: Granger immediately reloads and fires a cannon shot in the target direction with the super cannon hidden in his violin case. The cannon shot will pass through Minions and explode upon hitting an enemy hero, dealing <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> equal to 150<font color="fba51f"> (+110% Total Physical Attack)</font> plus 12% of the target's lost HP to enemies in the area and slowing them by 80%. Granger can fire the super cannon 3 times at the cost of 2 bullets per shot, and can move once in the target direction after each shot. When <font color="a6aafb">Death Sonata</font> ends, its cooldown will be reduced by 15% for every 2 bullets remaining.

quote: A mysterious demon hunter that operates outside the conventions of the Church of Light. Always seen with a violin case in hand, he hunts down demons with his two soul-devouring weapons.

name: Khufra

skills.name: Spell Curse
skills.description_text:
Khufra activates the Spell Curse left by Esmeralda every 12s, enhancing his next Basic Attack. The enhanced Basic Attack gains extra attack range and deals Magic Damage equal to (+120% Total Physical Attack) plus 6% of the target's Max HP. He also slows the target by 30% for 1.5s and heals 8% of his Max HP on hit.
Each time Khufra applies a control effect to an enemy hero with his skill, the cooldown of Spell Curse is reduced by 4s.
skills.description_html:
Khufra activates the Spell Curse left by Esmeralda every 12s, enhancing his next Basic Attack. The enhanced Basic Attack gains extra attack range and deals Magic Damage equal to (+120% Total Physical Attack) plus 6% of the target's Max HP. He also slows the target by 30% for 1.5s and heals 8% of his Max HP on hit.
Each time Khufra applies a control effect to an enemy hero with his skill, the cooldown of Spell Curse is reduced by 4s.

skills.name: Tyrant's Revenge
skills.description_text: Khufra pulls the bandage on his arms to launch himself in the specified direction, dealing Physical Damage equal to 50 plus 7 (+1.5% Extra Physical Attack)% of his Max HP to all enemy units on the path. When blinking to the furthest distance or encountering a first enemy hero, Khufra will immediately stop, dealing Physical Damage equal to 50 plus 7 (+1.5% Extra Physical Attack)% of his Max HP to enemies nearby and then knocking them in the air for up to 1s.
skills.description_html: Khufra pulls the bandage on his arms to launch himself in the specified direction, dealing <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> equal to 50 plus 7<font color="fba51f"> (+1.5% Extra Physical Attack)</font>% of his Max HP to all enemy units on the path. When blinking to the furthest distance or encountering a first enemy hero, Khufra will immediately stop, dealing <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> equal to 50 plus 7<font color="fba51f"> (+1.5% Extra Physical Attack)</font>% of his Max HP to enemies nearby and then knocking them in the air for up to 1s.

skills.name: Bouncing Ball
skills.description_text:
Khufra uses bandage to wrap himself into a magic bouncing ball, increasing his own Physical & Magic Defense by 30%. Enemies trying to use blink skills to move across Khufra will be knocked airborne.
Each time the magic bouncing ball hits the ground, it will deal Magic Damage equal to 50 plus 3 (+2% Extra Physical Attack)% of his Max HP to enemies nearby and slow them by 80%. Lasts 0.2s.
skills.description_html:
Khufra uses bandage to wrap himself into a magic bouncing ball, increasing his own Physical & Magic Defense by 30%. Enemies trying to use blink skills to move across Khufra will be knocked airborne.
Each time the magic bouncing ball hits the ground, it will deal Magic Damage equal to 50 plus 3 (+2% Extra Physical Attack)% of his Max HP to enemies nearby and slow them by 80%. Lasts 0.2s.

skills.name: Tyrant's Rage
skills.description_text: Khufra pushes back all enemy targets around him toward his front (this skill can only be interrupted by Suppression), dealing 300 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slowing them down for 1.25s. If the enemies are knocked against walls, extra Physical Damage equal to 150% of this skill's damage will be inflicted upon them, and they will be stunned, instead of slowed.

quote: Sealed ancient tyrant.

name: Badang

skills.name: Chivalry Fist
skills.description_text:
Every time Badang's Basic Attack hits a target, he gains a stack of Chivalry Fist. After gaining 4 stacks, his next Basic Attack deals 50 (+30% Total Physical Attack) extra Physical Damage to enemies hit and knocks them back. Enemies that are knocked into obstacles will be stunned for 0.6s (Minions and Creeps are stunned directly).
Fist Wind generated by Badang's skills will trigger this effect directly, and Fist Wind from his Ultimate increases the stun duration to 1s.
skills.description_html:
Every time Badang's Basic Attack hits a target, he gains a stack of Chivalry Fist. After gaining 4 stacks, his next Basic Attack deals 50 (+30% Total Physical Attack) extra Physical Damage to enemies hit and knocks them back. Enemies that are knocked into obstacles will be stunned for 0.6s (Minions and Creeps are stunned directly).
Fist Wind generated by Badang's skills will trigger this effect directly, and Fist Wind from his Ultimate increases the stun duration to 1s.

skills.name: Fist Wind
skills.description_text:
Badang unleashes a gust of Fist Wind in the target direction, dealing 125 (+90% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit, slowing them by 30% for 1.5s, and knocking them back. The Fist Wind will explode upon hitting an obstacle, dealing 100 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies. Fist Wind can trigger attack effects and grants Badang 1 Chivalry Fist stack upon cast.
Badang stores up to 2 Fist Wind charges and restores 1 charge every 10.4s.
skills.description_html:
Badang unleashes a gust of Fist Wind in the target direction, dealing 125 (+90% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit, slowing them by 30% for 1.5s, and knocking them back. The Fist Wind will explode upon hitting an obstacle, dealing 100 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies. Fist Wind can trigger attack effects and grants Badang 1 Chivalry Fist stack upon cast.
Badang stores up to 2 Fist Wind charges and restores 1 charge every 10.4s.

skills.name: Fist Break
skills.description_text:
Badang dashes in the target direction, dealing 230 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in his path while gaining a 350 (+150% Total Physical Attack) shield that lasts 5s. He stops immediately upon hitting an enemy hero, slightly knocking them back while creating an obstacle that lasts 4s behind them. Enemies hit by the obstacle are dealt 130 (+30% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

Use Again: Badang removes the obstacle he created.
skills.description_html:
Badang dashes in the target direction, dealing 230 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in his path while gaining a 350 (+150% Total Physical Attack) shield that lasts 5s. Enemies hit by the obstacle are dealt 130 (+30% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

Use Again: Badang removes the obstacle he created.

skills.name: Fist Crack
skills.description_text:
Badang throws a flurry of punches in the target direction, dealing 60 (+54% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit multiple times (can trigger attack effects). The Fist Wind generated by the punches will explode upon hitting an obstacle, dealing 30 (+27% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies.
Badang is immune to control effects for the duration.

quote: Island hero who gained supernatural power after defeating the water monster.

name: Faramis

skills.name: Vicious Retrieval
skills.description_text: Every 4s, Faramis' next skill against enemy heroes and summoned objects generates a soul fragment on the spot. Faramis can absorb the soul fragment to restore 100 (+50% Total Magic Power) HP and gain 2 extra Magic Power (up to 40 stacks). Upon death, he consumes the absorbed soul fragments to reduce the respawn timer, each reducing the timer by 3% (up to 90%). Enemies that die around Faramis also have a chance to drop soul fragments.
skills.description_html: Every 4s, Faramis' next skill against enemy heroes and summoned objects generates a soul fragment on the spot. Faramis can absorb the soul fragment to restore 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> HP and gain 2 extra Magic Power (up to 40 stacks). Upon death, he consumes the absorbed soul fragments to reduce the respawn timer, each reducing the timer by 3% (up to 90%). Enemies that die around Faramis also have a chance to drop soul fragments.

skills.name: Shadow Stampede
skills.description_text:
Faramis enters the Shadow state for 3s, gaining 70% extra Movement Speed, 25 extra Physical & Magic Defense, 20% cooldown reduction of this skill, and the ability to move through terrain. Enemy heroes that come into contact with Faramis in this state are dealt 250 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and applied with a Nether Mark. Upon leaving the Shadow state, Faramis drags all the marked enemy heroes toward him, dealing 250 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. Use again to leave the Shadow state early and drag marked enemies toward him.
The range of soul fragment absorption is increased while this skill is active.
skills.description_html:

Upon leaving the Shadow state, Faramis drags all the marked enemy heroes toward him, dealing 250 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. Use again to leave the Shadow state early and drag marked enemies toward him.
The range of soul fragment absorption is increased while this skill is active.

skills.name: Ghost Bursters
skills.description_text: Faramis gathers Nether energy in a fan-shaped area ahead, dealing 330 (+144% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies within. The energy will then split and bounce to nearby enemies, dealing 200 (+86% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage (splits up to 2 time(s) on enemy hero hits and 1 time(s) on non-enemy hero hits).
skills.description_html: Faramis gathers Nether energy in a fan-shaped area ahead, dealing 330<font color="62f8fe"> (+144% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies within. skills.name: Nether Realm
skills.description_text: Faramis turns his surroundings into the Nether Realm for 6s, making affected allied heroes (including himself) enter the Specter state and granting them 400 plus 10 (+5% Total Magic Power)% extra HP and 50% extra Movement Speed for 1s. When the Specter state breaks, the hero will clear all debuffs and enter a brief Resurrection state for 1.3s. An allied hero's Specter state ends when they leave the Nether Realm.
skills.description_html: Faramis turns his surroundings into the <font color="a6aafb">Nether Realm</font> for 6s, making affected allied heroes (including himself) enter the <font color="a6aafb">Specter</font> state and granting them 400 plus 10<font color="62f8fe"> (+5% Total Magic Power)</font>% extra HP and 50% extra Movement Speed for 1s. When the <font color="a6aafb">Specter</font> state breaks, the hero will clear all debuffs and enter a brief Resurrection state for 1.3s. An allied hero's <font color="a6aafb">Specter</font> state ends when they leave the <font color="a6aafb">Nether Realm</font>.

quote: A necromancer in Necrokeep who's determined to find a cure for the Mist.

name: Kadita

skills.name: Thalassophobia
skills.description_text: Kadita gains the Blessing of the Ocean every 30s. The Blessing is triggered when she takes damage from enemy heroes and lasts 4s, allowing her to recover 65% of the HP lost within the duration afterward.
skills.description_html: Kadita gains the <font color="a6aafb">Blessing of the Ocean</font> every 30s. The Blessing is triggered when she takes damage from enemy heroes and lasts 4s, allowing her to recover 65% of the HP lost within the duration afterward.

skills.name: Ocean Ode
skills.description_text:
Kadita summons an ocean wave to carry herself in the target direction and back, dealing 250 (+90% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 30%. While inside the wave, she gains Control Immunity and 50% Damage Reduction. This skill can pass through obstacles and terrain.

Use Again: Kadita exits the wave without interrupting the wave's movement.
skills.description_html:
Kadita summons an ocean wave to carry herself in the target direction and back, dealing 250 (+90% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 30%. While inside the wave, she gains Control Immunity and 50% Damage Reduction. This skill can pass through obstacles and terrain.

Use Again: Kadita exits the wave without interrupting the wave's movement.

skills.name: Breath of the Ocean
skills.description_text:
After a short delay, Kadita summons an ocean wave to erupt at the target location, dealing 350 (+140% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and knocking them airborne for 1s.

Kadita can cast this skill during Ocean Ode to summon an ocean wave beneath her with a shorter eruption delay.
skills.description_html:
After a short delay, Kadita summons an ocean wave to erupt at the target location, dealing 350 (+140% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and knocking them airborne for 1s.

Kadita can cast this skill during Ocean Ode to summon an ocean wave beneath her with a shorter eruption delay.

skills.name: Rough Waves
skills.description_text:
Kadita dives into the ground and sends ocean waves in all directions (this skill can only be interrupted by Suppression), each dealing 270 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 30%. Enemies hit by multiple waves take increased damage. After a short period, the waves return to Kadita, each dealing 180 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit.

When underground, Kadita becomes untargetable and gains 60% Movement Speed.

name: Minsitthar

skills.name: Mark of the King
skills.description_text: Minsitthar's Basic Attacks and skills apply a stack of Mark of the King, up to 5 stacks. Upon reaching max stacks, the next attack detonates all Mark of the King stacks, dealing Physical Damage equal to 400 (+6% Total HP) of Minsitthar's Max HP and stunning the target for 0.8s while healing Minsitthar for 400 (+6% Total HP) HP. Can only trigger once every 6s on the same target.
skills.description_html: Minsitthar's Basic Attacks and skills apply a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Mark of the King</font>, up to 5 stacks. Upon reaching max stacks, the next attack detonates all <font color="a6aafb">Mark of the King</font> stacks, dealing <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> equal to 400<font color="26e407"> (+6% Total HP)</font> of Minsitthar's Max HP and stunning the target for 0.8s while healing Minsitthar for 400<font color="26e407"> (+6% Total HP)</font> HP. Can only trigger once every 6s on the same target.

skills.name: Spear of Glory
skills.description_text: Minsitthar thrusts forward with the Spear of Glory, dealing 175 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slowing enemies hit by 30%. Enemy heroes hit by the tip of the spear will be stunned for 0.6s. After a short delay, Minsitthar pulls back the spear, dealing 175 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to all enemies along the way and dragging enemy heroes hit to him.
skills.description_html: Minsitthar thrusts forward with the Spear of Glory, dealing 175<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and slowing enemies hit by 30%. After a short delay, Minsitthar pulls back the spear, dealing 175<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to all enemies along the way and dragging enemy heroes hit to him.

skills.name: Shield Assault
skills.description_text: Minsitthar awakens the power in his shield and releases it, dealing 100 (+45% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to all enemies in a rectangular area and slowing them by 80% (decaying rapidly over 2s). Meanwhile, he enters Phalanx state for 3s, reducing damage taken from the front by 25% and enhancing his Basic Attack to swiftly strike an area in front of him for 100 (+45% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage per hit.
skills.description_html: Minsitthar awakens the power in his shield and releases it, dealing 100<font color="fba51f"> (+45% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to all enemies in a rectangular area and slowing them by 80% (decaying rapidly over 2s). skills.description_text:
Minsitthar charges forward and calls 4 Royal Guards to form a field around him. The Royal Guards cannot move but will attack enemies in the field and deal (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to them.
Enemies in the field are slowed by 20% and cannot use movement skills.

quote: A young king that led the people of Mahar Pura to victory against invaders.

name: Harith

skills.name: Key Insight
skills.description_text: Harith gains insight from his Key. He gains 7% Hybrid Lifesteal for each nearby enemy hero, stacking up to 35%.
skills.description_html: Harith gains insight from his Key. He gains 7% Hybrid Lifesteal for each nearby enemy hero, stacking up to 35%.

Harith and his phantom will then release Synchro Fission toward each other, dealing 165 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to all enemy units on the path. When the 2 energy waves collide, an explosion occurs, dealing 495 (+180% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to all enemies in the explosion area.

Harith's enhanced Basic Attack deals 200 (+90% Total Physical Attack)(+90% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and slows enemies by 40%. Hitting an enemy with Harith's enhanced Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Chrono Dash by 3s.

Harith uses his Key to summon the Zaman Force. When the multidimensional rift appears, the cooldown of Chrono Dash is reduced by 4s. The rift initially slows enemy heroes in the area by 50%, and will continuously slow enemy heroes by 15% afterwards.
If Harith comes into contact with the rift using Chrono Dash, he will absorb the energy within and reduce the cooldown of Synchro Fission by 1s and Chrono Dash by 3s.
Harith gains 15% Resilience while on the rift.

quote: Leonin boy who came to the Moniyan Empire from Azrya.

name: Thamuz

skills.name: Grand Lord Lava
skills.description_text:
When Thamuz is holding his Scythes, each of his Basic Attacks has a chance to conjure a burst of Lava Energy beneath the target that erupts after a 0.7s delay, dealing 45 (+100% Total Physical Attack)(+5*Hero Level) True Damage.
When without Scythes, Thamuz gains 25% extra Movement Speed and will enhance his next Basic Attack after retrieving the Scythes. The enhanced Basic Attack slows the target by 30% and is guaranteed to trigger Lava Energy.
skills.description_html:
When Thamuz is holding his Scythes, each of his Basic Attacks has a chance to conjure a burst of Lava Energy beneath the target that erupts after a 0.7s delay, dealing 45 (+100% Total Physical Attack)(+5*Hero Level) True Damage.
When without Scythes, Thamuz gains 25% extra Movement Speed and will enhance his next Basic Attack after retrieving the Scythes. The enhanced Basic Attack slows the target by 30% and is guaranteed to trigger Lava Energy.

skills.name: Molten Scythes
skills.description_text:
Thamuz tosses Scythes in the target direction. After travelling for a certain distance or hitting the first enemy hero, they deal 120 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. The Scythes will then slow nearby enemies by 30% and deal 45 (+20% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage every 0.5s.
After leaving Thamuz for a period of time or a certain distance, the Scythes will return to Thamuz and drag enemies in their path to him. Thamuz can approach the Scythes or cast the skill again to retrieve them.

After leaving Thamuz for a period of time or a certain distance, the Scythes will return to Thamuz and drag enemies in their path to him. Thamuz can approach the Scythes or cast the skill again to retrieve them.

skills.name: Chasm Trample
skills.description_text:
Thamuz jumps to a designated area to deal 230 (+60% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slow the enemy units by 25% for 2s upon landing.
If the Scythes are still travelling, they will return to Thamuz and Molten Scythes will reset its CD instantly.
skills.description_html:

skills.name: Cauterant Inferno
skills.description_text:
Thamuz spouts the lava stored in his body, dealing 300 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and creating a Cauterant Zone around him. The Cauterant Zone lasts 9s and deals 30 (+10% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage every 0.5s to enemies in the area.
Meanwhile, Thamuz gains 500 extra Max HP, heals himself by the same amount, and increases his Attack Speed by 1.3 times. He also recovers 1.5% Max HP each time he deals damage with Basic Attacks or his Scythes.

quote: King of the Fire Demons.

name: Kimmy

skills.name: Anti-Grav Thruster
skills.description_text:
Hold: Kimmy continuously shoots Chemical Bolts in the target direction, each bolt consuming 120% energy and dealing 1 Magic Damage to the enemy hit. Chemical Bolts that fail to hit an enemy will explode at the end of their paths, dealing the same amount of damage to nearby enemies.
The Chemical Bolts can Crit.

Hold: Kimmy continuously shoots Chemical Bolts in the target direction, each bolt consuming 120% energy and dealing 1 Magic Damage to the enemy hit. Chemical Bolts that fail to hit an enemy will explode at the end of their paths, dealing the same amount of damage to nearby enemies.
The Chemical Bolts can Crit.

skills.name: Starlium Beam
skills.description_text:
Kimmy shoots out enhanced Chemical Spray and recoils in the opposite direction. Enemies that come into contact with the Spray left on the path will take 120 Magic Damage every 300 (+50% Total Physical Attack) (+60% Total Magic Power)s and be slowed by for s.
Kimmy also restores energy upon casting this skill.

skills.name: Deadly Thorns

For every 50 damage inflicted upon Belerick, he has a 25% chance to shoot the nearest enemy unit, dealing Magic Damage equal to 55(+5*Hero Level) plus 1.8% of his Max HP (scales with level). This attack can be triggered once every 0.4s.
His HP obtained from Equipment and Emblems is increased by 30%.

Deals 80% extra damage against Minions.
skills.description_html:
Belerick releases vines in a designated direction, dealing 200 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the path and slowing them by 25%. Ancient Seeds left by the vines will erupt into thorns after 1s, dealing 200 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies on the path and taunting them for 1.2s.

Deals 80% extra damage against Minions.

skills.name: Nature's Strike
skills.description_text:
Belerick increases his Movement Speed by 80% and enhances his next Basic Attack. (The Movement Speed gained will decrease in 2s.)
This enhanced Basic Attack deals 300 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and slows the target by 60% for 1.4s. Belerick also recovers HP equal to 240 plus 10% of his lost HP.
Each time Deadly Thorns is triggered, reduce the cooldown of this skill by 1s.
skills.description_html:

This enhanced Basic Attack deals 300 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and slows the target by 60% for 1.4s. Belerick also recovers HP equal to 240 plus 10% of his lost HP.
Each time Deadly Thorns is triggered, reduce the cooldown of this skill by 1s.

skills.name: Wrath of Dryad
skills.description_text: Belerick conjures spreading vines around him, dealing 100 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the area 4 times, taunting and slowing them for 1.5s.
skills.description_html: Belerick conjures spreading vines around him, dealing 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+30% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in the area 4 times, taunting and slowing them for 1.5s.

quote: A kind and fraternal elemental creature.

name: Hanzo

skills.name: Ame no Habakiri
skills.description_text: Damage dealt by Hanzo's Basic Attacks and skills inflicts a stack of Dark Ninjutsu on the target, up to 5 stacks. Ninjutsu: Demon Feast can only be cast on targets with full stacks of Dark Ninjutsu.
skills.description_html: Damage dealt by Hanzo's Basic Attacks and skills inflicts a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Dark Ninjutsu</font> on the target, up to 5 stacks. <font color="a6aafb">Ninjutsu: Demon Feast</font> can only be cast on targets with full stacks of <font color="a6aafb">Dark Ninjutsu</font>.

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Demon Feast
skills.description_text:
The skill can only be used on targets with max stacks of Dark Ninjutsu. When targeting a creep, Hanzo will immediately devour it and digest it over a period of time to recover 20% HP.
When targeting the Turtle/Lord/enemy heroes, deals 600 (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage, recovers 10% HP, and reduces this skill's cooldown by 60%.
skills.description_html:
The skill can only be used on targets with max stacks of Dark Ninjutsu. When targeting a creep, Hanzo will immediately devour it and digest it over a period of time to recover 20% HP.
When targeting the Turtle/Lord/enemy heroes, deals 600 (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage, recovers 10% HP, and reduces this skill's cooldown by 60%.

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Dark Mist
skills.description_text:
Hanzo dashes in the target direction, leaving dark mist in front that deals 90 (+45% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area every 0.5s, up to 5 times (this damage counts as Basic Attack damage but cannot Crit).
The dark mist slows enemies in the area by 40% and grants Hanzo 20% Movement Speed.
skills.description_html:
Hanzo dashes in the target direction, leaving dark mist in front that deals 90 (+45% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area every 0.5s, up to 5 times (this damage counts as Basic Attack damage but cannot Crit).
The dark mist slows enemies in the area by 40% and grants Hanzo 20% Movement Speed.

skills.name: Kinjutsu: Pinnacle Ninja
skills.description_text:
Hanzo charges into battle as Hanekage, consuming 17 Energy per second. He gains 2 Energy when a non-hero unit dies nearby and 20 Energy when it's a hero. After consuming all his Energy, Hanzo's body will be slowly drawn to Hanekage's current position.
While in Hanekage form, Hanzo's body is invincible, and Hanekage ignores obstacles and gains 50% Movement Speed (decays over time) and 30% Attack Speed.
After being killed, Hanekage will be immediately drawn to Hanzo's position, during which he recovers 16% HP and cannot be targeted. This effect is also triggered when the skill is cast again. If Hanekage is killed, Hanzo will be slowed by 50% and reveal his location for 6s.
skills.description_html:

While in Hanekage form, Hanzo's body is invincible, and Hanekage ignores obstacles and gains 50% Movement Speed (decays over time) and 30% Attack Speed.
After being killed, Hanekage will be immediately drawn to Hanzo's position, during which he recovers 16% HP and cannot be targeted. This effect is also triggered when the skill is cast again. If Hanekage is killed, Hanzo will be slowed by 50% and reveal his location for 6s.

quote: Genius ninja in the Shadow Sect who is at the crossroads.

name: Lunox

skills.name: Dreamland Twist
skills.description_text:
Lunox is twisted by the powers of Chaos and Order.
When Lunox uses Power of Order, she gains 0.5% of Spell Vamp for every 1% of Magic Penetration.
When Lunox uses Power of Chaos, she gains 0.5% of Magic Penetration for every 1% of Spell Vamp.
skills.description_html:
Lunox is twisted by the powers of Chaos and Order.
When Lunox uses Power of Order, she gains 0.5% of Spell Vamp for every 1% of Magic Penetration.
When Lunox uses Power of Chaos, she gains 0.5% of Magic Penetration for every 1% of Spell Vamp.

skills.name: Starlight Pulse
skills.description_text:
Lunox summons a rain of starlight upon nearby enemies, dealing 200 (+110% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. The starlight then returns to Lunox, each restoring 75 (+30% Total Magic Power) HP to her. The HP restored is doubled when hitting enemy heroes.

This skill shares cooldown with Chaos Assault. Grants one stack of Power of Order after use and ends the Power of Chaos enhanced state.
skills.description_html:

skills.name: Chaos Assault
skills.description_text:
Lunox unleashes Chaos Energy at an enemy, dealing Magic Damage equal to 250 (+120% Total Magic Power) plus 2.5% of the target's Max HP (1.5% of Max HP against Creeps).

This skill shares cooldown with Starlight Pulse. Grants one stack of Power of Chaos after use.
skills.description_html:
Lunox unleashes Chaos Energy at an enemy, dealing Magic Damage equal to 250 (+120% Total Magic Power) plus 2.5% of the target's Max HP (1.5% of Max HP against Creeps).

This skill shares cooldown with Starlight Pulse. Grants one stack of Power of Chaos after use.

skills.name: Cosmic Fission
skills.description_text: When Lunox uses the power of Order and Chaos, she will deal 300 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the targets along the way and slow them by 40% for 2s.
skills.description_html: When Lunox uses the power of Order and Chaos, she will deal 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the targets along the way and slow them by 40% for 2s.

skills.name: Order & Chaos
skills.description_text:
Lunox is twisted by the powers of Chaos and Order.

When Lunox uses Power of Order, she gains Brilliance and becomes invincible while dealing continuous damage to nearby enemies.

When Lunox uses Power of Chaos, she gains Darkening and can blink in a target direction and greatly reduces the cooldown of Chaos Assault for a brief period.

quote: A miraculous creature born in Twilight Orb.

name: Leomord

skills.name: The Oath Keeper
skills.description_text:
Leomord's Basic Attacks are guaranteed to Crit against enemies below 50% Max HP, dealing 200% damage.
Leomord converts every 1% Crit Chance gained into 2 Physical Attack.
skills.description_html:
Leomord's Basic Attacks are guaranteed to Crit against enemies below 50% Max HP, dealing 200% damage.
Leomord converts every 1% Crit Chance gained into 2 Physical Attack.

skills.name: Momentum
skills.description_text:
Leomord gains a 150 (+50% Total Physical Attack) shield and begins channeling, slowing enemies in the target direction by 25%. When the channeling is complete or interrupted, he thrusts his sword in the same direction, dealing up to 500 (+180% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit (scales with channel time) and slowing them by 40% for 1s.
Leomord can cast this skill again to actively interrupt the channeling.

skills.name: Decimation Assault
skills.description_text: Leomord charges in a designated direction, dealing 300 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way and slowing them by 30% for 1s.

skills.name: Phantom Steed
skills.description_text:
Leomord summons Barbiel to rush to him, knocking back and dealing 100 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to all enemies in its path.
If Barbiel comes in contact with Leomord, they will enter the Mounted State, gaining 50% Movement Speed that decays over 2s.
Mounted State: Leomord gains a brand-new set of skills, and his Basic Attack can be used while moving and hits a circular area to deal AOE damage. Leomord also gains 70 Movement Speed and 30 Physical & Magic Defense.
