quote: A sworn knight who vowed to guard Necrokeep until his last breath.

name: Vale

skills.name: Windtalk
skills.description_text: Vale gains 1 stack of Windtalk each time he gets a kill or an assist that increases his Movement Speed by 8. This effect can stack up to 10 times.
skills.description_html: Vale gains 1 stack of <font color="a6aafb">Windtalk</font> each time he gets a kill or an assist that increases his Movement Speed by 8. This effect can stack up to 10 times.

skills.name: Wind Blade
skills.description_text: Vale unleashes two wind blades toward the left and right of a target area, each dealing 250 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit.
skills.description_html: Vale unleashes two wind blades toward the left and right of a target area, each dealing 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+80% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit.

skills.name: Windblow
skills.description_text: Vale sends a whirlwind in the target direction, dealing 350 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and knocking them airborne for 0.8s (each enemy can only be knocked airborne 1 time). When the whirlwind reaches its destination, it will remain for 1.6s while continuously dealing a total of 150 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in range.

When the whirlwind reaches its destination, it will remain for 1.6s while continuously dealing a total of 150<font color="62f8fe"> (+30% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in range.

skills.description_text:
Vale summons a windstorm at the target location, dealing a total of 150 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the area and slowing them by 20% while continuously pulling them into its center. After 1s, the windstorm will explode, dealing 1000 (+240% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.

The remaining whirlwinds will also be pulled into the center.

quote: The heir to Wind Fort, a wind mage.

name: Claude

skills.name: Battle Side-by-side
skills.description_text: Dexter assists Claude on each of his Basic Attacks, dealing 25 (+25% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the same target (inherits a portion of Attack Effects).
skills.description_html: <font color="a6aafb">Dexter</font> assists Claude on each of his Basic Attacks, dealing 25<font color="fba51f"> (+25% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the same target (inherits a portion of Attack Effects).

skills.name: Art of Thievery
skills.description_text:
Claude emits a disruption wave in the target direction, dealing 250 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area and reducing their Movement Speed by 20% and Attack Speed by 10%.

For each enemy hit, Claude gains 4% Movement & Attack Speed (doubled for enemy heroes hit) for 6s (up to 5 stacks).

skills.name: Battle Mirror Image
skills.description_text:
Claude conjures a mirror image of Dexter at the target location that automatically attacks nearby enemies for 5.5s. The mirror image's Basic Attack deals 25 (+25% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and can trigger Claude's attack effects.

Use Again: Claude switches places with the mirror image.

skills.name: Blazing Duet
skills.description_text: Claude and Dexter rapidly fire at nearby enemies for 3s, dealing 140 (+10% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to up to two enemies with each shot (these attacks count as Basic Attacks). Claude also gains a 20 (+3% Total Physical Attack) shield each time the Ultimate deals damage to an enemy.

quote: An excellent thief who comes and goes without a trace.

name: Aldous

skills.name: Contract: Transform
skills.description_text:
After every 2 Basic Attacks, Aldous gains a 500 (+3 times the number of Soul Steal stacks) shield for 3s on his next Basic Attack.
This effect can only be triggered once every 5s.
skills.description_html:
After every 2 Basic Attacks, Aldous gains a 500 (+3 times the number of Soul Steal stacks) shield for 3s on his next Basic Attack.
This effect can only be triggered once every 5s.

skills.name: Contract: Soul Steal
skills.description_text:
Aldous unleashes his inner energy to enhance his next Basic Attack to deal Physical Damage equal to 200 (+100% Total Physical Attack) plus 5 times the number of Soul Steal stacks.

If this attack kills an enemy hero/Siege Minion/other non-hero unit, Aldous will gain 10/10/4 stacks of Soul Steal (up to 650 stacks).

The enhanced Basic Attack deals 300% extra Base Damage to Minions or Creeps. Aldous gets an extra 5/2 stack(s) of Soul Steal when a nearby enemy Siege Minion/other non-hero unit dies.
skills.description_html:
Aldous unleashes his inner energy to enhance his next Basic Attack to deal Physical Damage equal to 200 (+100% Total Physical Attack) plus 5 times the number of Soul Steal stacks.

The enhanced Basic Attack deals 300% extra Base Damage to Minions or Creeps. Aldous gets an extra 5/2 stack(s) of Soul Steal when a nearby enemy Siege Minion/other non-hero unit dies.

skills.name: Contract: Explosion
skills.description_text: Aldous assumes a defensive stance, gaining 30% Damage Reduction and 20% extra Movement Speed for 2s or until manual cancellation. He then deals 100 (+20% Total Physical Attack)-200 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and stuns them for 0.5-1s (scales with defensive stance duration).

skills.name: Contract: Chase Fate
skills.description_text: Aldous gains vision of all enemy heroes for 5s. During this time, if Aldous uses this skill again, he can dash toward an enemy hero. When Aldous hits that enemy hero, he will deal Physical Damage equal to 250 plus 8% of the target's Max HP and knock back the target for 1s. (Aldous can interrupt target's Recall during the dash.)

quote: The guardian of the Minoan Labyrinth.

name: Selena

skills.name: Symbiosis
skills.description_text:
Selena can switch freely between her two forms.

Elven Form: Selena applies Abyssal Mark when her skills deal damage. Marks last 8s and can stack up to 2 times.

Abyssal Form: Selena's Basic Attacks become melee and deal (+25% Total Magic Power) additional Magic Damage. Her skills deal 240-450 (+40% Total Magic Power) additional Magic Damage to enemies with Abyssal Mark and consume their mark stacks by 1. This damage is increased to 250% against Creeps.
skills.description_html:
Selena can switch freely between her two forms.

Elven Form: Selena applies Abyssal Mark when her skills deal damage. Marks last 8s and can stack up to 2 times.

Abyssal Form: Selena's Basic Attacks become melee and deal (+25% Total Magic Power) additional Magic Damage. Her skills deal 240-450 (+40% Total Magic Power) additional Magic Damage to enemies with Abyssal Mark and consume their mark stacks by 1. This damage is increased to 250% against Creeps.

skills.name: Abyssal Trap
skills.description_text:
Selena summons an Abyssal Devil to lurk underground. The Abyssal Devil will attach itself to any enemy that approaches, inflicting a stack of Abyssal Mark and reducing their Movement Speed by 50% for 1s. The Abyssal Devil then explodes, dealing 350 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the area and reducing their Movement Speed by 50% for 1s.

Each additional Abyssal Devil on an enemy increases the final damage by 50%.

Each Abyssal Devil can lurk up to 60s and up to 3 Abyssal Devils can exist at the same time.
skills.description_html:

The Abyssal Devil then explodes, dealing 350 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the area and reducing their Movement Speed by 50% for 1s.

Each additional Abyssal Devil on an enemy increases the final damage by 50%.

Each Abyssal Devil can lurk up to 60s and up to 3 Abyssal Devils can exist at the same time.

skills.name: Abyssal Arrow
skills.description_text:
Selena fires an abyssal wraith in the target direction that stops when it hits an enemy hero, Creep, or Summon, dealing 250 (+20% Total Magic Power) to 500 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the target hit and stunning them for 0.5s to 2.5s while revealing their locations (the damage and stun duration increase with the wraith's travel distance).

The wraith will pick up Abyssal Trap as it travels over it and will apply the trap to the enemy target upon stunning them.

If the wraith stuns an enemy for 0.9s or longer, Selena will gain 60% Movement Speed for 2s.
skills.description_html:

quote: Dark Elf girl who fell into the Abyss.

name: Kaja

skills.name: Wrath Sanction
skills.description_text:
Kaja achieves Wrath Sanction every 6s. His next Basic Attack will send lightning at enemies, dealing Magic Damage equal to 100 (+100% Total Magic Power) plus 4% of targets' Max HP and paralyzing them. The lightning will jump to enemies nearby as well (up to 3 times).

Increases damage by 200% of targets' Max HP on Minions and Creeps.

Paralyze: Slows enemy heroes and summons while reducing their damage by 2.5% (up to 6 stacks) for 5s.

Each time Electric Blade deals damage, Kaja restores 100 HP (decays to 30% after multiple hits).

Bounces from her Basic Attacks inherit a portion of Attack Effects.

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Equinox
skills.description_text:
Passive: The secret Ninjutsu of the Scarlet Shadow makes Hanabi immune to control effects when she has a shield from any source.

Active: Hanabi gains a 300 (+40% Total Physical Attack) shield for 5s. When the shield is active, Hanabi gains 20% Movement Speed and 25% Attack Speed, and 20% of her damage dealt to enemy heroes will be added to this shield (only adds 10% of the damage dealt to non-hero units). This shield cannot exceed 50% of Hanabi's max HP.
skills.description_html:
Passive: The secret Ninjutsu of the Scarlet Shadow makes Hanabi immune to control effects when she has a shield from any source.

Active: Hanabi gains a 300 (+40% Total Physical Attack) shield for 5s. When the shield is active, Hanabi gains 20% Movement Speed and 25% Attack Speed, and 20% of her damage dealt to enemy heroes will be added to this shield (only adds 10% of the damage dealt to non-hero units). This shield cannot exceed 50% of Hanabi's max HP.

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Soul Scroll
skills.description_text: Hanabi fires the energy Kunai in the targeted direction, dealing 350 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way and reducing their Movement Speed by 60% for 1s. Enemy units hit will also be marked, allowing Hanabi's next Bounce Damage from Basic Attacks to deal 30 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage on them with no damage decay.
skills.description_html: Hanabi fires the energy Kunai in the targeted direction, dealing 350<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies along the way and reducing their Movement Speed by 60% for 1s. Enemy units hit will also be marked, allowing Hanabi's next Bounce Damage from Basic Attacks to deal 30<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> on them with no damage decay.

skills.name: Forbidden Jutsu: Higanbana
skills.description_text: Hanabi throws Higanbana in the targeted direction, dealing 300 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first enemy hero hit and immobilizing them for 0.8s. After 1s, Higanbana will bloom at the location of the first hit, dealing 300 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies. Subsequent hits on the same target decay to 30% damage.

quote: Leader of the Scarlet Sect, in the Scarlet Shadow of the Cadia Riverlands.

name: Uranus

skills.name: Radiance
skills.description_text: Uranus absorbs the energy generated by incoming attacks to strengthen himself, regenerating a certain amount of HP every 0.8s. Each stack lasts 1.2s. When at max stacks (11.2), Uranus regenerates 10-20 HP (scales with level).
skills.description_html: Uranus absorbs the energy generated by incoming attacks to strengthen himself, regenerating a certain amount of HP every 0.8s. Each stack lasts 1.2s. When at max stacks (11.2), Uranus regenerates 10-20 HP (scales with level).

skills.name: Ionic Edge
skills.description_text:
Uranus releases two energy blades that orbit around him, dealing 155 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemy targets and slowing them by 10 for 30%s.

Each time this skill deals damage to a target, they will be marked with a stack for 2s (max of 1 stack per target per cast). Each stack increases the damage of this skill by 2 (to a max of 1). Each energy blade will only deal damage to the same target once.
skills.description_html:
Uranus releases two energy blades that orbit around him, dealing 155 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemy targets and slowing them by 10 for 30%s.

Each time this skill deals damage to a target, they will be marked with a stack for 2s (max of 1 stack per target per cast). Each stack increases the damage of this skill by 2 (to a max of 1). Each energy blade will only deal damage to the same target once.

skills.name: Transcendent Ward
skills.description_text:
Uranus charges to the target location, dealing 80 (+20% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way, and 160 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies at the target location and slowing them by 25%. Uranus also generates a 300 (+200% Total Magic Power) shield for 4s.

The shield explodes at the end of its duration or when destroyed, dealing 300 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies nearby.
skills.description_html:
Uranus charges to the target location, dealing 80 (+20% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way, and 160 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies at the target location and slowing them by 25%. Uranus also generates a 300 (+200% Total Magic Power) shield for 4s.

The shield explodes at the end of its duration or when destroyed, dealing 300 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies nearby.

skills.name: Consecration
skills.description_text:
Uranus unleashes the energy stored within his body, removing slow effects on himself, recovering 200 HP, and gaining 60% Movement Speed for 8s (decays over time).

Uranus directly gains 5 stacks of Radiance, increasing shields received and HP Regen by 20% for 8s.
skills.description_html:
Uranus unleashes the energy stored within his body, removing slow effects on himself, recovering 200 HP, and gaining 60% Movement Speed for 8s (decays over time).

Uranus directly gains 5 stacks of Radiance, increasing shields received and HP Regen by 20% for 8s.

quote: Guardian made from lightning and air, guards the Celestial Palace.

name: Martis

skills.name: Asura's Wrath
skills.description_text: Each time Martis uses a skill, his Attack Speed will be increased by 30%, 120% maximum. Lasts 4s. He gains (+6*Hero Level) extra Attack at full stacks.
skills.description_html: Each time Martis uses a skill, his Attack Speed will be increased by 30%, 120% maximum. Lasts 4s. He gains (+6*Hero Level) extra Attack at full stacks.

skills.name: Asura Aura
skills.description_text: Martis draws enemies to a fan-shaped area in front of him and deals 350 (+130% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage, slowing them by 40% for 2s.
skills.description_html: Martis draws enemies to a fan-shaped area in front of him and deals 350<font color="fba51f"> (+130% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>, slowing them by 40% for 2s.

skills.name: Mortal Coil
skills.description_text:
Martis strikes in the target direction three times, each time dealing 225 (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit. Enemies hit by the first and third strike are also knocked back. The attack direction can be changed once using the Joystick.

Use Again: Martis leaps in the target direction, dealing 300 (+150% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in his path and knocking them airborne.
Martis gains Control Immunity and 60% Damage Reduction when casting this skill.
skills.description_html:
Martis strikes in the target direction three times, each time dealing 225 (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit. Enemies hit by the first and third strike are also knocked back. The attack direction can be changed once using the Joystick.

Use Again: Martis leaps in the target direction, dealing 300 (+150% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in his path and knocking them airborne.
Martis gains Control Immunity and 60% Damage Reduction when casting this skill.

skills.name: Decimation
skills.description_text:
Martis lunges at a designated enemy hero, dealing 800 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage (deals True Damage if the enemy's HP is below 50%).
If the enemy is killed by this skill, Martis can cast the skill again within 10s and gains 100% extra Movement Speed that gradually decays over 5s. Each successive cast also increases the skill's damage by 15% (up to 30%).
skills.description_html:
Martis lunges at a designated enemy hero, dealing 800 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage (deals True Damage if the enemy's HP is below 50%).
If the enemy is killed by this skill, Martis can cast the skill again within 10s and gains 100% extra Movement Speed that gradually decays over 5s. Each successive cast also increases the skill's damage by 15% (up to 30%).

quote: Persistent and victorious Asura King.

name: Valir

skills.name: Ashing
skills.description_text:
Valir's skills apply a stack of Ablaze to enemies hit, dealing them Magic Damage equal to 1 (+0.2% Total Magic Power)% of their Max HP per second for 3s.
At 3 stacks, the fire detonates, dealing Magic Damage equal to 5 (+1% Total Magic Power)% of the target's Max HP to the enemy and stunning them for 1s (the same target can only be stunned by Valir's skills once every 7s.)
skills.description_html:
Valir's skills apply a stack of Ablaze to enemies hit, dealing them Magic Damage equal to 1 (+0.2% Total Magic Power)% of their Max HP per second for 3s.
At 3 stacks, the fire detonates, dealing Magic Damage equal to 5 (+1% Total Magic Power)% of the target's Max HP to the enemy and stunning them for 1s (the same target can only be stunned by Valir's skills once every 7s.)

skills.name: Burst Fireball
skills.description_text:
Valir launches a fireball that explodes upon hitting the first target, dealing 235 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and slowing them by 30% for 1s. The lingering flame on the ground will explode after 1s, dealing 118 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.
Valir recharges 1 fireball every 9s and can hold up to 2 fireball charges. Hitting an enemy hero or Legend Creep with this skill will immediately restore a fireball charge, while hitting a Minion will restore 4 of the recharge time.
Once enhanced by Vengeance Flame, the cast range of Burst Fireball increases by 30%.
skills.description_html:
Valir launches a fireball that explodes upon hitting the first target, dealing 235 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and slowing them by 30% for 1s. The lingering flame on the ground will explode after 1s, dealing 118 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.
Valir recharges 1 fireball every 9s and can hold up to 2 fireball charges. Hitting an enemy hero or Legend Creep with this skill will immediately restore a fireball charge, while hitting a Minion will restore 4 of the recharge time.
Once enhanced by Vengeance Flame, the cast range of Burst Fireball increases by 30%.

skills.name: Searing Torrent
skills.description_text:
Valir unleashes a torrent of flames in the target direction, dealing 200 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and knocking them to the end of its path.
Vengeance Flame: The torrent forms a firewall at the end of its path that lasts 4s and deals 100 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies per second.
Enemies hit by the torrent or the firewall are slowed by 25% for 1s.
skills.description_html:
Valir unleashes a torrent of flames in the target direction, dealing 200 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and knocking them to the end of its path.
Vengeance Flame: The torrent forms a firewall at the end of its path that lasts 4s and deals 100 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies per second.
Enemies hit by the torrent or the firewall are slowed by 25% for 1s.

skills.name: Vengeance Flame
skills.description_text: Valir removes all existing debuffs on him, gains 40% Movement Speed that decays over 3s, and conjures 4 Vengeance Flames, enhancing Burst Fireball and Searing Torrent for 9s.
skills.description_html: Valir removes all existing debuffs on him, gains 40% Movement Speed that decays over 3s, and conjures 4 <font color="a6aafb">Vengeance Flames</font>, enhancing <font color="a6aafb">Burst Fireball</font> and <font color="a6aafb">Searing Torrent</font> for 9s.

quote: Heir to Fire Throat, fire mage.

name: Gusion

skills.name: Dagger Specialist
skills.description_text: Each skill cast adds a rune to Gusion's dagger (stacks up to 4 times). Each stack enhances Gusion's next Basic Attack to deal additional damage equal to 3% of the target's Max HP and restore 50 (+25% Total Magic Power) HP to himself.
skills.description_html: Each skill cast adds a rune to Gusion's dagger (stacks up to 4 times). Each stack enhances Gusion's next Basic Attack to deal additional damage equal to 3% of the target's Max HP and restore 50<font color="62f8fe"> (+25% Total Magic Power)</font> HP to himself.

skills.name: Sword Spike
skills.description_text:
Gusion throws a dagger in the target direction, dealing 200 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and marking them.

Use Again: Gusion moves behind the marked enemy, dealing 200 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to them. This skill cannot be interrupted while Gusion is moving behind the marked enemy.
skills.description_html:
Gusion throws a dagger in the target direction, dealing 200 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and marking them.

Use Again: Gusion moves behind the marked enemy, dealing 200 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to them. This skill cannot be interrupted while Gusion is moving behind the marked enemy.

skills.name: Shadowblade Slaughter
skills.description_text:
Gusion throws a volley of daggers in the target direction, each dealing 100 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 6% for 2s (when hit by multiple daggers, the slow effect can stack up to 30%).

Use Again: Gusion recalls the daggers, each dealing 65 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in its path.
skills.description_html:
Gusion throws a volley of daggers in the target direction, each dealing 100 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 6% for 2s (when hit by multiple daggers, the slow effect can stack up to 30%).

Use Again: Gusion recalls the daggers, each dealing 65 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in its path.

skills.name: Incandescence
skills.description_text:
Gusion dashes to the target location, resetting the cooldowns of Sword Spike and Shadowblade Slaughter. If Shadowblade Slaughter was cast once before the reset, Gusion can throw another five daggers on his next Shadowblade Slaughter cast, and recall a total of ten daggers afterward.

Use Again: Gusion dashes a short distance in the target direction.
skills.description_html:
Gusion dashes to the target location, resetting the cooldowns of Sword Spike and Shadowblade Slaughter. If Shadowblade Slaughter was cast once before the reset, Gusion can throw another five daggers on his next Shadowblade Slaughter cast, and recall a total of ten daggers afterward.

Use Again: Gusion dashes a short distance in the target direction.

quote: Rebellious son of House Paxley.

name: Angela

skills.name: Smart Heart
skills.description_text: Angela gains 7.5% extra Movement Speed for 4s each time she casts a skill (up to 30%). When she's attached to an allied hero, the Movement Speed boost is transferred to the allied hero.
skills.description_html: Angela gains 7.5% extra Movement Speed for 4s each time she casts a skill (up to 30%). When she's attached to an allied hero, the Movement Speed boost is transferred to the allied hero.

skills.name: Love Waves
skills.description_text:
Angela sends Love Waves in the target direction, dealing 170 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit, revealing their positions briefly, and applying a stack of Lover's Mark (up to 5 stacks). Each stack of Lover's Mark increases the damage by 20% and slows enemies hit by 8% for 3s.

Love Waves also restore 150 (+75% Total Magic Power) HP to allied heroes hit. Angela can store up to 5 charges of this skill and the recharge time is affected by Cooldown Reduction.
skills.description_html:
Angela sends Love Waves in the target direction, dealing 170 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit, revealing their positions briefly, and applying a stack of Lover's Mark (up to 5 stacks). Each stack of Lover's Mark increases the damage by 20% and slows enemies hit by 8% for 3s.

Love Waves also restore 150 (+75% Total Magic Power) HP to allied heroes hit. Angela can store up to 5 charges of this skill and the recharge time is affected by Cooldown Reduction.

skills.name: Puppet-on-a-String
skills.description_text:
Angela launches a Puppet String at the target enemy, dealing 300 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and gradually slowing them by up to 80%. If the enemy is still connected to the string after 3s, they'll be immobilized for 1.5s and dealt 450 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.

Each stack of Lover's Mark increases the final damage by 20%.
skills.description_html:
Angela launches a Puppet String at the target enemy, dealing 300 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and gradually slowing them by up to 80%. If the enemy is still connected to the string after 3s, they'll be immobilized for 1.5s and dealt 450 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.

Each stack of Lover's Mark increases the final damage by 20%.

skills.name: Heartguard
skills.description_text:
Angela begins channeling, applying a 800 (+250% Total Magic Power) shield that lasts 6s to the target allied hero regardless of distance. After the channeling is complete, she attaches herself to the allied hero for 12s, during which she can cast skills at zero Mana cost.
Angela can cast this skill again to cancel the channeling or detach herself from the allied hero. The attaching state will end early if the allied hero is killed.
skills.description_html:
Angela begins channeling, applying a 800 (+250% Total Magic Power) shield that lasts 6s to the target allied hero regardless of distance. After the channeling is complete, she attaches herself to the allied hero for 12s, during which she can cast skills at zero Mana cost.
Angela can cast this skill again to cancel the channeling or detach herself from the allied hero. The attaching state will end early if the allied hero is killed.

quote: Artificial human made in Laboratory 1718.

name: Jawhead

skills.name: Mecha Suppression
skills.description_text: Each time Jawhead deals damage to an enemy hero or a Creep, he inflicts a stack of Mecha Suppression on them for 3s (up to 6 stacks). Each stack of Mecha Suppression increases all damage dealt to the target by 2% (limited to 50% for Creeps).
skills.description_html: Each time Jawhead deals damage to an enemy hero or a Creep, he inflicts a stack of Mecha Suppression on them for 3s (up to 6 stacks). Each stack of Mecha Suppression increases all damage dealt to the target by 2% (limited to 50% for Creeps).

skills.name: Smart Missiles
skills.description_text: Jawhead launches up to 12 missiles at random nearby enemies over 5s, each missile dealing 135 (+30% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the enemy hit.
skills.description_html: Jawhead launches up to 12 missiles at random nearby enemies over 5s, each missile dealing 135<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the enemy hit.

skills.name: Ejector
skills.description_text:
Jawhead gains 30% Movement Speed and a 500 (+100% Total Physical Attack) shield for 5s.

Use Again: Jawhead flings the nearest unit (prioritizes heroes) to the target location, dealing 300 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area and stunning them for 0.5s. Can be used on allied heroes and they will not take damage.
skills.description_html:
Jawhead gains 30% Movement Speed and a 500 (+100% Total Physical Attack) shield for 5s.

Use Again: Jawhead flings the nearest unit (prioritizes heroes) to the target location, dealing 300 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area and stunning them for 0.5s. Can be used on allied heroes and they will not take damage.

skills.name: Unstoppable Force
skills.description_text: Jawhead charges into the target enemy hero, dealing 350 (+150% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and briefly stunning them. Enemies around the target are knocked back and dealt the same amount of damage. Jawhead is immune to control effects during the charge.
skills.description_html: Jawhead charges into the target enemy hero, dealing 350<font color="fba51f"> (+150% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and briefly stunning them. Enemies around the target are knocked back and dealt the same amount of damage. Jawhead is immune to control effects during the charge.

quote: Intelligent robot used to protect little Ailee.

name: Lesley

skills.name: Lethal Shot
skills.description_text:
If Lesley doesn't take damage for 5s, her next Basic Attack gains extra range and 50% Crit Chance and deals 100 (+100% Total Physical Attack) True Damage (20% extra damage against minions).
Each point of fixed Physical Penetration and each 1% Physical Penetration Lesley acquires is converted into 1% Crit Damage, but her base Crit Damage is reduced to 130%.
Lesley's Basic Attack restores 5 points of energy and her Lethal Shot doubles the amount of energy restored. The Lethal Shot effect will activate immediately after Lesley uses a skill.
skills.description_html:
If Lesley doesn't take damage for 5s, her next Basic Attack gains extra range and 50% Crit Chance and deals 100 (+100% Total Physical Attack) True Damage (20% extra damage against minions).
Each point of fixed Physical Penetration and each 1% Physical Penetration Lesley acquires is converted into 1% Crit Damage, but her base Crit Damage is reduced to 130%.
Lesley's Basic Attack restores 5 points of energy and her Lethal Shot doubles the amount of energy restored. The Lethal Shot effect will activate immediately after Lesley uses a skill.

skills.name: Master of Camouflage
skills.description_text:
Lesley enters the Camouflage state, gaining double Energy Regen, 40% extra Movement Speed, and 85 extra Physical Attack.

The state lasts 3s or until Lesley takes or deals damage. Enemies can detect Lesley's position through distortions of their surroundings.
skills.description_html:
Lesley enters the Camouflage state, gaining double Energy Regen, 40% extra Movement Speed, and 85 extra Physical Attack.

The state lasts 3s or until Lesley takes or deals damage. Enemies can detect Lesley's position through distortions of their surroundings.

skills.name: Tactical Grenade
skills.description_text:
Lesley throws a tactical grenade in the target direction while jumping back slightly, dealing 150 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area and knocking them back.

Lesley can cast this skill during Ultimate Snipe to cancel the state and immediately fire a Fatal Bullet at the target. The attack is only triggered when there are unfired Fatal Bullets left.
skills.description_html:
Lesley throws a tactical grenade in the target direction while jumping back slightly, dealing 150 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area and knocking them back.

Lesley can cast this skill during Ultimate Snipe to cancel the state and immediately fire a Fatal Bullet at the target. The attack is only triggered when there are unfired Fatal Bullets left.

skills.name: Ultimate Snipe
skills.description_text:
Lesley locks onto the target enemy hero and fires 4 Fatal Bullets in succession, each dealing Physical Damage equal to 250 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) plus 5% of their lost HP and restoring 10 energy on hit. The Bullets can be blocked by other enemy heroes.

If this skill is interrupted, each remaining Bullet reduces the skill cooldown by 10%.

Passive: Lesley's Crit Chance is increased by 10%.
skills.description_html:
Lesley locks onto the target enemy hero and fires 4 Fatal Bullets in succession, each dealing Physical Damage equal to 250 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) plus 5% of their lost HP and restoring 10 energy on hit. The Bullets can be blocked by other enemy heroes.

If this skill is interrupted, each remaining Bullet reduces the skill cooldown by 10%.

Passive: Lesley's Crit Chance is increased by 10%.

quote: Adopted daughter of House Vance, a clandestine sniper.

name: Pharsa

skills.name: Spiritual Unity
skills.description_text: Every 5 to 8s (varies with Feathered Air Strike level), Verri enters the Hunting state and assists Pharsa on her next attack against an enemy hero, dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 8% of the target's Max HP (+ 1% for every 200 Magic Power owned) and slowing them by 60% for 1s.
skills.description_html: Every 5 to 8s (varies with <font color="a6aafb">Feathered Air Strike</font> level), Verri enters the Hunting state and assists Pharsa on her next attack against an enemy hero, dealing extra <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> equal to 8% of the target's Max HP (+ 1% for every 200 Magic Power owned) and slowing them by 60% for 1s.

skills.name: Curse of Crow
skills.description_text:
Pharsa unleashes a blast of magic at the target location, dealing 300 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and marking them for 4s.

When Pharsa hits a marked enemy with a Basic Attack or active skill, the mark is consumed to stun them for 1s.
Marked enemies have their position revealed.
skills.description_html:
Pharsa unleashes a blast of magic at the target location, dealing 300 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and marking them for 4s.

When Pharsa hits a marked enemy with a Basic Attack or active skill, the mark is consumed to stun them for 1s.
Marked enemies have their position revealed.

skills.name: Energy Impact
skills.description_text: Pharsa releases magic energy in the target direction, dealing 525 (+145% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit.
skills.description_html: Pharsa releases magic energy in the target direction, dealing 525<font color="62f8fe"> (+145% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit.

skills.name: Feathered Air Strike
skills.description_text:
Passive: Each level-up reduces Spiritual Unity's interval by 1s.
Active: Pharsa takes flight for 8s and bombards the target location, dealing 570 (+160% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies within the area. This skill can be cast up to 4 times within the duration.
skills.description_html:
Passive: Each level-up reduces Spiritual Unity's interval by 1s.
Active: Pharsa takes flight for 8s and bombards the target location, dealing 570 (+160% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies within the area. This skill can be cast up to 4 times within the duration.

skills.name: Wings by Wings
skills.description_text:
Pharsa turns into mist and wraps herself around Verri, gaining 150% extra Movement Speed (decreasing over time) and the ability to fly over terrain. This state lasts up to 5s or until she uses a Basic Attack or skills, or is controlled.

The skill's cooldown is reduced by 0s each time Pharsa levels up.
skills.description_html:
Pharsa turns into mist and wraps herself around Verri, gaining 150% extra Movement Speed (decreasing over time) and the ability to fly over terrain. This state lasts up to 5s or until she uses a Basic Attack or skills, or is controlled.

The skill's cooldown is reduced by 0s each time Pharsa levels up.

quote: Crow Princess of Askati Forest.

name: Helcurt

skills.name: Shadow of Styx
skills.description_text:
Helcurt remains in Prowler state until spotted by the enemy team, gaining 15% extra Movement Speed, and continuously regenerating (+30% Total Physical Attack) HP if he has not dealt any damage.
He gains 50% extra Attack Speed and 50% extra Movement Speed (decreasing over time) for 4s upon being spotted and leaves Prowler state 0.75s later.
Any hero killed after being hit by Helcurt leaves a dark fog that explodes and spreads with a cooldown of 10s. Helcurt Conceals himself while within the dark fog.
skills.description_html:
Helcurt remains in Prowler state until spotted by the enemy team, gaining 15% extra Movement Speed, and continuously regenerating (+30% Total Physical Attack) HP if he has not dealt any damage.
He gains 50% extra Attack Speed and 50% extra Movement Speed (decreasing over time) for 4s upon being spotted and leaves Prowler state 0.75s later.
Any hero killed after being hit by Helcurt leaves a dark fog that explodes and spreads with a cooldown of 10s. Helcurt Conceals himself while within the dark fog.

skills.name: Hidden Terror
skills.description_text:
Passive: When Helcurt is in Prowler state, the skill terrifies enemy heroes hit and briefly reveals them. Its cooldown decreases 3 times as fast as normal.

Active: Helcurt blinks to the target location and deals 150 (+70% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies within the area, reducing their Movement Speed by 60% for 0.75s.
skills.description_html:
Passive: When Helcurt is in Prowler state, the skill terrifies enemy heroes hit and briefly reveals them. Its cooldown decreases 3 times as fast as normal.

Active: Helcurt blinks to the target location and deals 150 (+70% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies within the area, reducing their Movement Speed by 60% for 0.75s.

skills.name: Deadly Stinger
skills.description_text:
Passive: Helcurt gains one Deadly Stinger for every 1.5s spent in Prowler state or on each Basic Attack. Up to 5 stingers can be stored.
Active: Helcurt fires all Deadly Stingers forward, each dealing 180 (+50% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies (Minions and Creeps take only 70% of the damage).
Deadly Stinger counts as a Basic Attack but cannot Crit.
skills.description_html:
Passive: Helcurt gains one Deadly Stinger for every 1.5s spent in Prowler state or on each Basic Attack. Up to 5 stingers can be stored.
Active: Helcurt fires all Deadly Stingers forward, each dealing 180 (+50% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies (Minions and Creeps take only 70% of the damage).
Deadly Stinger counts as a Basic Attack but cannot Crit.

skills.name: Dark Night Falls
skills.description_text:
Helcurt summons the Dark Night, reducing all enemies' sight range and making them lose sight of their allies for 3s. During Dark Night, Helcurt gains 40% extra Movement Speed.

The Dark Night makes it easier for Helcurt to leave enemies' sight range.
skills.description_html:
Helcurt summons the Dark Night, reducing all enemies' sight range and making them lose sight of their allies for 3s. During Dark Night, Helcurt gains 40% extra Movement Speed.

The Dark Night makes it easier for Helcurt to leave enemies' sight range.

quote: The nightmare of the Abyss who's willing to betray anyone in order to survive.

name: Zhask

skills.name: Decimation
skills.description_text: Upon death, Zhask summons a frenzied Nightmaric Spawn on the spot, which gradually loses HP over time until death.
skills.description_html: Upon death, Zhask summons a frenzied <font color="a6aafb">Nightmaric Spawn</font> on the spot, which gradually loses HP over time until death.

skills.name: Nightmaric Spawn
skills.description_text:
Zhask summons a Nightmaric Spawn that inherits 55% of his Attributes (HP, Hybrid Defense, and Magic Power). Nightmaric Spawn will automatically attack nearby enemies by firing a Death Ray at the target, dealing 55 (+20% extra Attack Speed) (+20% Magic Power) Magic Damage and slowing them by up to 30%. If Zhask is too far away from Nightmaric Spawn, it will disappear.
Death Ray is considered as a Basic Attack but cannot Crit.
Fusion Enhanced: The damage of Nightmaric Spawn is increased to 180%, and it can be repositioned.
skills.description_html:
Zhask summons a Nightmaric Spawn that inherits 55% of his Attributes (HP, Hybrid Defense, and Magic Power). Nightmaric Spawn will automatically attack nearby enemies by firing a Death Ray at the target, dealing 55 (+20% extra Attack Speed) (+20% Magic Power) Magic Damage and slowing them by up to 30%. If Zhask is too far away from Nightmaric Spawn, it will disappear.
Death Ray is considered as a Basic Attack but cannot Crit.
Fusion Enhanced: The damage of Nightmaric Spawn is increased to 180%, and it can be repositioned.

skills.name: Mind Eater
skills.description_text:
Zhask fires a penetrating mental missile in the designated direction, dealing 300 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. Afterward, Nightmaric Spawn will attack enemies hit by Mind Eater for 120 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and stun them for 0.5s.

Fusion Enhanced: Increases the damage dealt by Mind Eater by 540 (+180% Total Magic Power).
skills.description_html:
Zhask fires a penetrating mental missile in the designated direction, dealing 300 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. Afterward, Nightmaric Spawn will attack enemies hit by Mind Eater for 120 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and stun them for 0.5s.

Fusion Enhanced: Increases the damage dealt by Mind Eater by 540 (+180% Total Magic Power).

skills.name: Hive Clones
skills.description_text:
Zhask releases a swarm of Hive Clones in the targeted direction. The clones will explode and deal 55 (+18% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies on contact, reducing their Movement Speed by 80% for 1s.
If Hive Clones find no target, they will burrow into the ground and ambush enemies passing by.
Fusion Enhanced: Zhask releases several swarms of Hive Clones.
Subsequent damage dealt to the same target decays to 20%.
skills.description_html:
Zhask releases a swarm of Hive Clones in the targeted direction. The clones will explode and deal 55 (+18% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies on contact, reducing their Movement Speed by 80% for 1s.
If Hive Clones find no target, they will burrow into the ground and ambush enemies passing by.
Fusion Enhanced: Zhask releases several swarms of Hive Clones.
Subsequent damage dealt to the same target decays to 20%.

skills.name: Dominator's Descent
skills.description_text:
Zhask selects a designated position to summon Nightmaric Spawn and fuses with it. Nightmaric Spawn can inherit 100% of his attributes and get extra of them. His skills are enhanced during the fusion period.

Use Again: Zhask immediately gets off Nightmaric Spawn and loses enhancement.
skills.description_html:
Zhask selects a designated position to summon Nightmaric Spawn and fuses with it. Nightmaric Spawn can inherit 100% of his attributes and get extra of them. His skills are enhanced during the fusion period.

Use Again: Zhask immediately gets off Nightmaric Spawn and loses enhancement.

quote: King of the Swarm who disrupts the balance of the universe.

name: Hylos

skills.name: Thickened Blood
skills.description_text:
Hylos gains 1.5 extra Max HP for every 1 extra Max Mana he possesses.

When out of Mana, Hylos can use his HP for skill casts.
skills.description_html:
Hylos gains 1.5 extra Max HP for every 1 extra Max Mana he possesses.

When out of Mana, Hylos can use his HP for skill casts.

skills.name: Law and Order
skills.description_text:
Hylos gains 50% Movement Speed and causes his next Basic Attack within 3s to deal 300 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the target, knocking back and stunning them for 1s.

The extra Movement Speed rapidly decays over the duration and vanishes after the next Basic Attack.
skills.description_html:
Hylos gains 50% Movement Speed and causes his next Basic Attack within 3s to deal 300 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the target, knocking back and stunning them for 1s.

The extra Movement Speed rapidly decays over the duration and vanishes after the next Basic Attack.

skills.name: Ring of Punishment
skills.description_text:
Hylos releases the Ring of Punishment, dealing 100 (+20% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies per second while slowing them by 4% and reducing their Attack Speed by 7.5% for 2.5s (up to 8 stacks). Each stack also increases the enemy's damage taken from the Ring of Punishment by 5%. The Ring of Punishment consumes 30 Mana per second when it's active.

Use Again: Hylos cancels the Ring of Punishment.
skills.description_html:
Hylos releases the Ring of Punishment, dealing 100 (+20% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies per second while slowing them by 4% and reducing their Attack Speed by 7.5% for 2.5s (up to 8 stacks). Each stack also increases the enemy's damage taken from the Ring of Punishment by 5%. The Ring of Punishment consumes 30 Mana per second when it's active.

Use Again: Hylos cancels the Ring of Punishment.

skills.name: Glorious Pathway
skills.description_text:
Hylos creates a huge pathway in the target direction, reducing enemies' Movement Speed by 75% for 1s. The pathway lasts 6s.
When on the pathway, Hylos gains Slow Immunity and recovers 3% of his Max HP per second. Allied heroes moving along the pathway gain 60% extra Movement Speed, while enemy heroes on the pathway will be slowed by 25%.
skills.description_html:
Hylos creates a huge pathway in the target direction, reducing enemies' Movement Speed by 75% for 1s. The pathway lasts 6s.
When on the pathway, Hylos gains Slow Immunity and recovers 3% of his Max HP per second. Allied heroes moving along the pathway gain 60% extra Movement Speed, while enemy heroes on the pathway will be slowed by 25%.

quote: Centaur guarding the Misty Mountains.

name: Diggie

skills.name: Young Again
skills.description_text: Upon death, Diggie reverses time and turns back to egg form, in which he can continue to move around and gains a new set of skills. He cannot be targeted in egg form and will revive after a period of time.
skills.description_html: Upon death, Diggie reverses time and turns back to egg form, in which he can continue to move around and gains a new set of skills. He cannot be targeted in egg form and will revive after a period of time.

skills.name: Auto Alarm Bomb
skills.description_text:
Diggie flings an owl alarm to the target location that remains stationary for 25s or until it reacts to the first enemy in range, chasing them and exploding upon collision. The explosion deals 350 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slows them by 30%.

Diggie gains 2 stacks of Dangerous Sparks each time an enemy hero is hit by the explosion (up to 60 stacks), each stack increasing the skill's damage by 1%. He loses half the stacks upon death, but can gain 1 stack of Dangerous Sparks each time his skill hits an enemy hero when in egg form.

Up to 5 owl alarms can exist at the same time.
skills.description_html:
Diggie flings an owl alarm to the target location that remains stationary for 25s or until it reacts to the first enemy in range, chasing them and exploding upon collision. The explosion deals 350 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slows them by 30%.

Diggie gains 2 stacks of Dangerous Sparks each time an enemy hero is hit by the explosion (up to 60 stacks), each stack increasing the skill's damage by 1%. He loses half the stacks upon death, but can gain 1 stack of Dangerous Sparks each time his skill hits an enemy hero when in egg form.

Up to 5 owl alarms can exist at the same time.

skills.name: Reverse Time
skills.description_text:
Diggie marks the target enemy hero for 4s and pulls them back to their previous location after the duration ends, dealing 150 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and briefly slowing them by 80%.

If the enemy moves out of the circle, the pull will be triggered early.
skills.description_html:
Diggie marks the target enemy hero for 4s and pulls them back to their previous location after the duration ends, dealing 150 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and briefly slowing them by 80%.

If the enemy moves out of the circle, the pull will be triggered early.

skills.name: Time Journey
skills.description_text: Diggie removes all debuffs on nearby allied heroes (including himself) and grants them a 650 (+300% Total Magic Power) shield and Control Immunity for 2s. He also gains 50% Movement Speed for 0.5s.
skills.description_html: Diggie removes all debuffs on nearby allied heroes (including himself) and grants them a 650<font color="62f8fe"> (+300% Total Magic Power)</font> shield and Control Immunity for 2s. He also gains 50% Movement Speed for 0.5s.

quote: The owl scholar who can control time.

name: Lancelot

skills.name: Soul Cutter
skills.description_text: Each time Lancelot charges, his damage is increased by 7.5% for 4s, up to 30%.
skills.description_html: Each time Lancelot charges, his damage is increased by 7.5% for 4s, up to 30%.

skills.name: Puncture
skills.description_text:
Lancelot charges in the target direction, dealing 150 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way and applying a Sword Mark to the first unmarked enemy hit. The Sword Mark lasts 3s.

If Lancelot successfully applies a Sword Mark to an enemy, the skill's cooldown will be reset.
skills.description_html:
Lancelot charges in the target direction, dealing 150 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way and applying a Sword Mark to the first unmarked enemy hit. The Sword Mark lasts 3s.

If Lancelot successfully applies a Sword Mark to an enemy, the skill's cooldown will be reset.

skills.name: Thorned Rose
skills.description_text: Lancelot strikes in the target direction 3 times, each time dealing 220 (+130% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit (damage is reduced when multiple enemies are hit). He's untargetable and invincible during this process. Enemies in the center of the area take all the 3 hits and are slowed by 20% for 0.5s. The slow effect can stack.
skills.description_html: Lancelot strikes in the target direction 3 times, each time dealing 220<font color="fba51f"> (+130% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit (damage is reduced when multiple enemies are hit). He's untargetable and invincible during this process. Enemies in the center of the area take all the 3 hits and are slowed by 20% for 0.5s. The slow effect can stack.

skills.name: Phantom Execution
skills.description_text: After a short delay, Lancelot performs an executioner's strike in the target direction, dealing 350 (+170% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit. He is invincible throughout the process.
skills.description_html: After a short delay, Lancelot performs an executioner's strike in the target direction, dealing 350<font color="fba51f"> (+170% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit. He is invincible throughout the process.

quote: Prodigal son and genius swordsman of House Baroque.

name: Odette

skills.name: Lakeshore Ambience
skills.description_text:
Each skill cast grants extra range on Odette's next Basic Attack within 8s and causes it to bounce between enemies (or an enemy and herself if only one enemy is in range), dealing 144-200 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage per hit.

Odette's skills will also trigger this effect when hitting an enemy. This effect stacks up to 3 times.
skills.description_html:
Each skill cast grants extra range on Odette's next Basic Attack within 8s and causes it to bounce between enemies (or an enemy and herself if only one enemy is in range), dealing 144-200 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage per hit.

Odette's skills will also trigger this effect when hitting an enemy. This effect stacks up to 3 times.

skills.name: Avian Authority
skills.description_text: Odette releases a magic swan in the target direction, dealing 300 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 30% for 2s.
skills.description_html: Odette releases a magic swan in the target direction, dealing 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 30% for 2s.

skills.name: Blue Nova
skills.description_text: Odette releases a set of magic energy balls in the target direction, dealing 250 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and immobilizing them for 1.5s. After hitting an enemy, another energy ball will split off and attack a nearby enemy (prioritizes enemy heroes), dealing them 250 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and immobilizing them for 1.5s.
skills.description_html: Odette releases a set of magic energy balls in the target direction, dealing 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the first enemy hit and immobilizing them for 1.5s. After hitting an enemy, another energy ball will split off and attack a nearby enemy (prioritizes enemy heroes), dealing them 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and immobilizing them for 1.5s.

skills.name: Swan Song
skills.description_text:
Odette begins to dance, gaining a 1400 (+150% Total Magic Power) shield while dealing up to 2400 (+900% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in a large area around her for 5s. The bounce speed and frequency of Lakeshore Ambience's sound wave in the area are also enhanced when the skill is active.
Use again while the skill is active to dash in the target direction.
The skill is a channeling cast and will be interrupted if Odette is hit by high level control effects (knocked airborne, transformed, etc.) or if she performs another action.
skills.description_html:
Odette begins to dance, gaining a 1400 (+150% Total Magic Power) shield while dealing up to 2400 (+900% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in a large area around her for 5s. quote: Innocent princess that grew up in the Swan Castle and genius mage that excels in sword and scepter.

name: Argus

skills.name: Warmonger
skills.description_text:
When Argus' Meteoric Sword reaches 100 Malice Energy, he will launch a Demonic Slash with his next Basic Attack, dealing 180 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovering 150 (+10% Total Physical Attack) HP. This attack ignores 40% of the target's Physical Defense.
Argus' Meteoric Sword gains 5 Malice Energy per second and 10 Energy per Basic Attack (critical strikes grant an additional 10 Energy).
skills.description_html:
When Argus' Meteoric Sword reaches 100 Malice Energy, he will launch a Demonic Slash with his next Basic Attack, dealing 180 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovering 150 (+10% Total Physical Attack) HP. This attack ignores 40% of the target's Physical Defense.
Argus' Meteoric Sword gains 5 Malice Energy per second and 10 Energy per Basic Attack (critical strikes grant an additional 10 Energy).

skills.name: Demonic Grip
skills.description_text:
Argus stretches out a demonic hand in the target direction, dealing 125 (+60% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first enemy hero or Creep hit, stunning them for 0.7s, and pulling him and the target towards each other. If no enemy is hit, Argus pulls himself toward the hand's destination instead.
Use Again: Argus dashes and strikes in the target direction, dealing 175 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the path.
skills.description_html:
Argus stretches out a demonic hand in the target direction, dealing 125 (+60% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first enemy hero or Creep hit, stunning them for 0.7s, and pulling him and the target towards each other. If no enemy is hit, Argus pulls himself toward the hand's destination instead.
Use Again: Argus dashes and strikes in the target direction, dealing 175 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the path.

skills.name: Meteoric Sword
skills.description_text:
After a short delay, Argus thrusts his Meteoric Sword in the target direction, dealing 120 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit (200% damage against minions) and reducing their Movement Speed by 80% for 0.8s. The delay time will decrease as Argus' Attack Speed increases.
Enemy heroes or Creeps hit will be Cursed for 4s, during which they will leave a Cursed Trail behind. Argus gains 20% Movement Speed while on a Cursed Trail. Argus' Basic Attacks on Cursed targets will grant extra double Malice Energy.
Meteoric Sword damage counts as Basic Attack damage and can trigger Attack Effects.
skills.description_html:
After a short delay, Argus thrusts his Meteoric Sword in the target direction, dealing 120 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit (200% damage against minions) and reducing their Movement Speed by 80% for 0.8s. The delay time will decrease as Argus' Attack Speed increases.
Enemy heroes or Creeps hit will be Cursed for 4s, during which they will leave a Cursed Trail behind. Argus gains 20% Movement Speed while on a Cursed Trail. Argus' Basic Attacks on Cursed targets will grant extra double Malice Energy.
Meteoric Sword damage counts as Basic Attack damage and can trigger Attack Effects.

skills.name: Eternal Evil
skills.description_text:
Argus removes all debuffs on himself (except for Suppression) and enters Eternal Evil state, gaining Death Immunity for 4s. While in this state, 40% of his damage dealt to enemy heroes will be converted into HP for him once the state ends.

Leaving the Eternal Evil state also resets enemy Turrets' damage increase against Argus.]

Passive: Permanently increases the recharge of Malice Energy by 150 (+50% Total Physical Attack) per second.
skills.description_html:
Argus removes all debuffs on himself (except for Suppression) and enters Eternal Evil state, gaining Death Immunity for 4s. While in this state, 40% of his damage dealt to enemy heroes will be converted into HP for him once the state ends.

Leaving the Eternal Evil state also resets enemy Turrets' damage increase against Argus.]

Passive: Permanently increases the recharge of Malice Energy by 150 (+50% Total Physical Attack) per second.

quote: The angel who fell from light into darkness.

name: Grock

skills.name: Earthen Force
skills.description_text:
When near a wall or turret, Grock gains 10% Movement Speed, 15 (+8*Hero Level) Physical Defense, and 18 (+4.8*Hero Level) HP Regen.

Each point of Grock's extra Physical Attack increases his Physical Defense by 0.5.
skills.description_html:
When near a wall or turret, Grock gains 10% Movement Speed, 15 (+8*Hero Level) Physical Defense, and 18 (+4.8*Hero Level) HP Regen.

Each point of Grock's extra Physical Attack increases his Physical Defense by 0.5.

skills.name: Power of Nature
skills.description_text:
Grock charges his weapon with the Power of Nature and then launches a powerful sweep, dealing 300 (+160% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 40% for 2s. Damage dealt will increase the longer the skill is channeled, up to 250%.

Using Power of Nature near a wall will grant Control Immunity.
skills.description_html:
Grock charges his weapon with the Power of Nature and then launches a powerful sweep, dealing 300 (+160% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 40% for 2s. Damage dealt will increase the longer the skill is channeled, up to 250%.

Using Power of Nature near a wall will grant Control Immunity.

skills.name: Guardian's Barrier
skills.description_text: Grock conjures a stone wall at the target location, dealing 300 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies. The stone wall lasts 5s and can block enemies who try to pass through.
skills.description_html: Grock conjures a stone wall at the target location, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies. The stone wall lasts 5s and can block enemies who try to pass through.

skills.name: Wild Charge
skills.description_text:
Grock charges in the target direction, dealing 360 (+75% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in his path and knocking them airborne.

If he hits a wall or turret during the charge, he deals an additional 360 (+90% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and stuns them for 1.8s.
skills.description_html:
Grock charges in the target direction, dealing 360 (+75% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in his path and knocking them airborne.

If he hits a wall or turret during the charge, he deals an additional 360 (+90% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and stuns them for 1.8s.

quote: Stone man awakened from sleep.

name: Irithel

skills.name: Jungle Heart
skills.description_text:
Irithel and Leo's immaculate teamwork allows her to shoot while moving. Each Basic Attack will shoot 2 crossbow bolt(s) (but takes longer to refill) that deal (+55% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage per bolt (inherits a portion of Attack Effects).
Moving will build up Jungle Heart, up to a maximum of 10 units, and cause the next Basic Attack to unleash 1 additional bolt(s).
skills.description_html:
Irithel and Leo's immaculate teamwork allows her to shoot while moving. Each Basic Attack will shoot 2 crossbow bolt(s) (but takes longer to refill) that deal (+55% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage per bolt (inherits a portion of Attack Effects).
Moving will build up Jungle Heart, up to a maximum of 10 units, and cause the next Basic Attack to unleash 1 additional bolt(s).

skills.name: Strafe
skills.description_text: Irithel launches a volley of arrows on the target area, dealing 330 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies within and reducing their Physical Defense by 15 for 3s.
skills.description_html: Irithel launches a volley of arrows on the target area, dealing 330<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies within and reducing their Physical Defense by 15 for 3s.

skills.name: Force of The Queen
skills.description_text: Leo lets out a piercing roar, dealing 200 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 40% for 2s.
skills.description_html: Leo lets out a piercing roar, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and slowing them by 40% for 2s.

skills.name: Heavy Crossbow
skills.description_text: Irithel orders Leo to leap in the target direction and empowers her crossbow for 10s. For the duration, she gains 30 Movement Speed and her Basic Attacks shoot enhanced crossbow bolts, dealing 120 (+65% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target and nearby units. Jungle Heart also accumulates faster for the duration.
skills.description_html: Irithel orders Leo to leap in the target direction and empowers her crossbow for 10s. For the duration, she gains 30 Movement Speed and her Basic Attacks shoot enhanced crossbow bolts, dealing 120<font color="fba51f"> (+65% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the target and nearby units. <font color="a6aafb">Jungle Heart</font> also accumulates faster for the duration.

quote: The forest hunter with a smilodon.

name: Harley

skills.name: Magic Master
skills.description_text:
Harley's mastery of magic allows his Basic Attacks and skills to reduce the enemy's Magic Defense by 2 and increase his Attack Speed by 5%-10% (scales with level) for 3s on hit. This effect stacks up to 10 times.
Harley's Basic Attacks deal 60 (+50% Total Physical Attack) (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.
skills.description_html:
Harley's mastery of magic allows his Basic Attacks and skills to reduce the enemy's Magic Defense by 2 and increase his Attack Speed by 5%-10% (scales with level) for 3s on hit. This effect stacks up to 10 times.
Harley's Basic Attacks deal 60 (+50% Total Physical Attack) (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.

skills.name: Poker Trick
skills.description_text:
Harley throws 3 waves of cards (3 cards per wave), with each card dealing 130 (+25% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies.
After the same target is hit 3 times, the damage will decay to 50% on subsequent hits.
skills.description_html:
Harley throws 3 waves of cards (3 cards per wave), with each card dealing 130 (+25% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies.
After the same target is hit 3 times, the damage will decay to 50% on subsequent hits.

skills.name: Space Escape
skills.description_text:
Harley blinks in the designated direction, leaving a magic hat at his starting location and increasing his Movement Speed by 60% for 2s.

Use Again: Use again within 4s to return to the hat's location and cancel the Movement Speed effect.
skills.description_html:
Harley blinks in the designated direction, leaving a magic hat at his starting location and increasing his Movement Speed by 60% for 2s.

Use Again: Use again within 4s to return to the hat's location and cancel the Movement Speed effect.

skills.name: Deadly Magic
skills.description_text:
Harley casts a magic ring of fire at an enemy hero, dealing 200 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and slowing them by 40% for 1.5s. The ring will stay around the target, during which Harley can hit the ring to damage the target. The ring will explode after 4s, dealing Magic Damage equal to 200 (+50% Total Magic Power) plus 30% of the damage taken by the target while the ring was active.

The ring of fire can be blocked by other enemy heroes before it reaches its target.
skills.description_html:
Harley casts a magic ring of fire at an enemy hero, dealing 200 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and slowing them by 40% for 1.5s. The ring will stay around the target, during which Harley can hit the ring to damage the target. The ring will explode after 4s, dealing Magic Damage equal to 200 (+50% Total Magic Power) plus 30% of the damage taken by the target while the ring was active.

The ring of fire can be blocked by other enemy heroes before it reaches its target.

quote: The young mage whose powers awakened once thrust into danger and who now arrives at the Magic Academy to study.

name: Gatotkaca

skills.name: Steel Bones
skills.description_text:
Gatotkaca gains Physical Defense equal to 2% of his lost HP (up to 200). For every 300 damage he takes (calculated before damage reduction), he gains 5 Rage (up to 100).

Upon reaching over 25 Rage, Gatotkaca's next Basic Attack becomes enhanced, consuming all Rage to deal extra Magic Damage and recover HP. The extra damage scales with his Rage, level, and Magic Power.
skills.description_html:
Gatotkaca gains Physical Defense equal to 2% of his lost HP (up to 200). For every 300 damage he takes (calculated before damage reduction), he gains 5 Rage (up to 100).

Upon reaching over 25 Rage, Gatotkaca's next Basic Attack becomes enhanced, consuming all Rage to deal extra Magic Damage and recover HP. The extra damage scales with his Rage, level, and Magic Power.

skills.name: Blast Iron Fist
skills.description_text: Gatotkaca slams the ground, creating a shattered zone in the target direction while dealing 200 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies within. Enemies in the shattered zone will take 100 (+20% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage per second and be slowed by 30%.
skills.description_html: Gatotkaca slams the ground, creating a shattered zone in the target direction while dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies within. Enemies in the shattered zone will take 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+20% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> per second and be slowed by 30%.

skills.name: Unbreakable
skills.description_text: Gatotkaca begins channeling, then sprints in the target direction with a battle cry, forcing enemies on the path to attack him and deal 200 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage for 1.5s. The sprint distance scales with the channel time. Canceling the Skill reduces 50% of the remaining Cooldown.
skills.description_html: Gatotkaca begins channeling, then sprints in the target direction with a battle cry, forcing enemies on the path to attack him and deal 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> for 1.5s. The sprint distance scales with the channel time. Canceling the Skill reduces 50% of the remaining Cooldown.

skills.name: Avatar of the Guardian
skills.description_text:
Gatotkaca jumps to the target location, dealing 500 (+300% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies and knocking them airborne for 1s. Enemies near the center of the area will be knocked airborne for a longer duration, while enemies on the fringes will be pulled to the center.

The camera will move with the skill indicator but won't grant extra sight.
skills.description_html:
Gatotkaca jumps to the target location, dealing 500 (+300% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies and knocking them airborne for 1s. Enemies near the center of the area will be knocked airborne for a longer duration, while enemies on the fringes will be pulled to the center.

The camera will move with the skill indicator but won't grant extra sight.

quote: Warrior from the Arcadhem universe.

name: Karrie

skills.name: Lightwheel Mark
skills.description_text: Karrie's Basic Attacks and skills apply a stack of Lightwheel Mark on hit. skills.description_text:
Yi Sun-shin attacks with his longbow or glaive according to his distance from the target.

Weapon Mastery: After each weapon swap, the next two attacks will be enhanced. The first attack deals 70%-55% Crit Damage and the second attack deals 1-15% Crit Damage. Each enhanced attack grants Movement Speed for s and reduces the cooldown of Traceless by s.

After every s or when Yi Sun-shin respawns, a Turtle Ship will spawn at the allied Base. Yi Sun-shin can board the Turtle Ship, gaining Movement Speed (decays to after s) and enhancing Traceless.

skills.name: Traceless
skills.description_text: Yi Sun-shin dashes forward and slashes with his glaive, dealing 150 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and becoming immune to control effects for 1s.
skills.description_html: Yi Sun-shin dashes forward and slashes with his glaive, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and becoming immune to control effects for 1s.

skills.name: Blood Floods
skills.description_text:
Tap: Yi Sun-shin slashes swiftly with his glaive, dealing 240 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

Hold: Yi Sun-shin shoots a powerful arrow, dealing 240 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target. The arrow's damage scales with the hold time, up to 200%. This damage decays with the number of enemies hit but can't go below . His Movement Speed is reduced by while holding the skill.

Yi Sun-shin gains Weapon Mastery immediately when this skill is used.

skills.name: Mountain Shocker
skills.description_text:
Passive: Increases the damage of Heavenly Vow's first enhanced Basic Attack by 5 and second enhanced Basic Attack by 15.

Active: Yi Sun-shin commands the naval fleet to launch 70% waves of cannon shots on the locations of all enemy heroes, revealing their positions and dealing 2 Physical Damage to enemies in the area with each wave. (When a target is hit multiple times by the same wave, a maximum of 20% damage will be dealt.)

quote: Leader of the City of the Dragon Fleet.

name: Ruby

skills.name: Let's Dance!
skills.description_text:
Ruby starts with 6%-20% Spell Vamp (scales with level) and her skills have a 125% Spell Vamp Ratio (but her Basic Attacks cannot trigger Lifesteal).

After each skill cast, Ruby can dash to another location and gains 8-25 Physical & Magic Defense (scales with level) for 4s (stacks up to 3 times).

Ruby starts with 6%-20% Spell Vamp (scales with level) and her skills have a 125% Spell Vamp Ratio (but her Basic Attacks cannot trigger Lifesteal).

After each skill cast, Ruby can dash to another location and gains 8-25 Physical & Magic Defense (scales with level) for 4s (stacks up to 3 times).

skills.name: Be Good!
skills.description_text: Ruby swings her scythe, dealing 90 (+70% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit. She then unleashes a shockwave in the same direction, dealing 90 (+70% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 40% for 1s.

She then unleashes a shockwave in the same direction, dealing 90<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 40% for 1s.

skills.name: Don't Run, Wolf King!
skills.description_text: Ruby swings her scythe around herself twice, each swing dealing 60 (+55% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies, stunning them for 0.5s, and slowly pulling them toward her.
skills.description_html: Ruby swings her scythe around herself twice, each swing dealing 60<font color="fba51f"> (+55% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies, stunning them for 0.5s, and slowly pulling them toward her.

quote: A girl who grew up with Roger's help.

name: Alpha

skills.name: Beta, Advance!
skills.description_text:
When Alpha uses a skill, Beta will be summoned to attack. Enemies that are hit by Beta 2 time(s) will be Locked On.

Locked On: After Alpha deals damage to the target, Beta will fire a laser at them, dealing 80 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) (+8*Hero Level) True Damage and briefly applying a powerful slow effect.
This skill only deals 75% damage to Creeps.
skills.description_html:

Locked On: After Alpha deals damage to the target, Beta will fire a laser at them, dealing 80 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) (+8*Hero Level) True Damage and briefly applying a powerful slow effect.
This skill only deals 75% damage to Creeps.

skills.name: Rotary Impact
skills.description_text:
Alpha unleashes an energy wave in the target direction, dealing 100 (+90% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in its path and slowing them by 40% for 1s.

Beta then strafes enemies along the same path, dealing 60 (+30% Extra Physical Attack) True Damage.

Beta then strafes enemies along the same path, dealing 60 (+30% Extra Physical Attack) True Damage.

skills.name: Force Swing
skills.description_text:
After a short delay, Alpha swings his blade in the target direction, dealing 180 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area and restoring 40 (+30% Extra Physical Attack) HP for each enemy hit.

Beta then strafes enemies in the same area, dealing 60 (+30% Total Physical Attack) True Damage.

skills.name: Spear of Alpha
skills.description_text:
Beta dives to the target location, dealing 100 (+20% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and stunning them for 1s. Alpha then leaps towards the same location, knocking enemies in his path airborne and carrying them to the landing location. Alpha then slams down, dealing 250 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slowing the enemies by 40% for 1.5s.

Beta then attacks the same area 5 times, dealing 15 (+30% Extra Physical Attack) True Damage each time.

quote: A pure cyborg made by Laboratory 1718.

name: Sun

skills.name: Simian God
skills.description_text: Enemies hit by Sun and his Doppelgangers will have their Physical Defense reduced by 5% (stacks up to 6 times). Sun recovers HP equal to 75 of the Doppelganger's Physical Attack each time a Doppelganger deals damage.
skills.description_html: Enemies hit by Sun and his Doppelgangers will have their Physical Defense reduced by 5% (stacks up to 6 times). Sun recovers HP equal to 75 of the Doppelganger's Physical Attack each time a Doppelganger deals damage.

skills.name: Endless Variety
skills.description_text:
Sun hurls his Golden Staff in the target direction, dealing 200 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in its path. Upon hitting an enemy hero or Creep, or reaching the maximum range, the Golden Staff morphs into a Doppelganger that lasts 5s and inherits 40% of Sun's attributes (and a portion of his Attack Effects).

Endless Variety and Swift Exchange are learned and upgraded together and share the same cooldown.
skills.description_html:

skills.name: Swift Exchange

Sun hurls his Golden Staff in the target direction, dealing 200 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in its path.
He conjures a Doppelganger at his location that lasts 5s and inherits 40% of his attributes (and a portion of Attack Effects). Meanwhile, Sun conceals himself and moves with the Golden Staff.

This counts as Basic Attack damage and can trigger Attack Effects but cannot Crit.

quote: The immortal Monkey King, resolute and unyielding like the mountain that bore him.

name: Chou

skills.name: Only Fast
skills.description_text: After traveling 5 units, Chou deals 180% damage on his next Basic Attack (cannot Crit), briefly slows the target by 90% and reduces their Physical Defense by 10(+1*Hero Level) for 3s (up to 2 stacks).
skills.description_html: After traveling 5 units, Chou deals 180% damage on his next Basic Attack (cannot Crit), briefly slows the target by 90% and reduces their Physical Defense by 10(+1*Hero Level) for 3s (up to 2 stacks).

skills.description_text:
Chou strikes in the target direction, dealing 180 (+70% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit. This skill can be cast 3 times before it goes on cooldown. On the 3rd cast, Chou also knocks enemies hit airborne.

Hitting an enemy hero with the 3rd cast resets the cooldown of Shunpo.

skills.description_text: Chou charges in the target direction, gaining Control Immunity and a 200 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) shield.
skills.description_html: Chou charges in the target direction, gaining Control Immunity and a 200<font color="fba51f"> (+200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> shield.

Chou strikes a roundhouse kick at the target enemy hero, dealing them 400 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage and knocking them back.

Cast the skill again to chase up the target, dealing a total of 480 (+220% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
