name: Kagura

skills.name: Yin Yang Gathering
skills.description_text: Upon retrieving the Seimei Umbrella, Kagura gains a 450 (+80% Total Magic Power) shield, stuns nearby enemies for 0.5s, and slows them by 60% for 1s. Cooldown: 4.5s.
skills.description_html: Upon retrieving the <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella</font>, Kagura gains a 450<font color="62f8fe"> (+80% Total Magic Power)</font> shield, stuns nearby enemies for 0.5s, and slows them by 60% for 1s. Cooldown: 4.5s.

skills.name: Seimei Umbrella Open
skills.description_text:
Kagura sends the Seimei Umbrella to the target location, dealing 315 (+105% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in its path and slowing them by 60% for 0.5s. The Umbrella will automatically return to Kagura when she's too far away.
This skill deals 130% damage to non-hero enemies.
skills.description_html:

skills.description_text: Kagura removes all debuffs on her and leaps in the target direction, while leaving the Seimei Umbrella behind.

quote: A young spirit born of the deep longings stored within the Seimei Umbrella, she has finally stepped out of her dream, like a radiant bloom, in defiance of the dark night.

name: Natalia

skills.name: Assassin Instinct
skills.description_text:
If Natalia stays in a bush without taking damage for 1s, she will enter Camouflage state and gain 15% Movement Speed. In this state, Natalia's next Basic Attack will teleport her behind her target and deal 200 (+110% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage while silencing the target for 0.25s.

Dealing damage, taking damage or using skills will immediately end the Camouflage state, but her next Basic Attack will remain enhanced for another 1s.

Natalia's base Crit Damage is reduced to 150%, but her damage to Creeps is increased to 150%.
skills.description_html:
If Natalia stays in a bush without taking damage for 1s, she will enter Camouflage state and gain 15% Movement Speed. In this state, Natalia's next Basic Attack will teleport her behind her target and deal 200 (+110% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage while silencing the target for 0.25s.

Dealing damage, taking damage or using skills will immediately end the Camouflage state, but her next Basic Attack will remain enhanced for another 1s.

Natalia's base Crit Damage is reduced to 150%, but her damage to Creeps is increased to 150%.

Natalia dashes in the target direction, dealing 250 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in her path.

After hitting an enemy, she can cast this skill again within 5s.
skills.description_html:

Passive: Natalia gains 15% extra Crit Chance.

Active: Natalia immediately enters Assassin Instinct state. Natalia can store up to 2 charges of her Ultimate and each charge has a recharge time of 30s. Creep kills will reduce the current remaining recharge time by 50% of the full recharge time.

skills.name: Mystic Favor
skills.description_text: After Gord hits an enemy 4 times with Basic Attacks or skills within a short period of time, the next attack on the target will deal an additional 140 (+60% Total Magic Power) True Damage and slow them by 20% for 1s (the slow effect stacks up to 2 times).

skills.name: Mystic Projectile
skills.description_text: Gord conjures a Mystic Orb that bounces in the target direction and explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing 270 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the area, while stunning them and revealing their locations for 1s.

Gord unleashes an energy beam in the target direction, dealing 110 (+32% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit every 0.2s (up to 16 times).

The direction of the beam can be adjusted using the Joystick.

name: Freya

skills.name: Power of Einherjar
skills.description_text:
After casting a skill, Freya gains 200% Attack Speed for her next 2 Basic Attacks (this effect can stack up to 6 times).

Freya gains 1 stack of Sacred Orb on each Basic Attack and can spend Sacred Orb stacks to cast Spirit Combo consecutively.
Freya's Basic Attacks only deal 75% damage to Creeps.

After casting a skill, Freya gains 200% Attack Speed for her next 2 Basic Attacks (this effect can stack up to 6 times).

Freya gains 1 stack of Sacred Orb on each Basic Attack and can spend Sacred Orb stacks to cast Spirit Combo consecutively.
Freya's Basic Attacks only deal 75% damage to Creeps.

skills.description_text: Freya jumps to the target location, dealing 200 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and pulling them towards her.

Freya strikes in the target direction, gaining a 60 (+70% Extra Physical Attack) shield while dealing 20 (+90% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 30% for 0.5s. Freya can cast this skill again within 3.5s at the cost of 2 stacks of Sacred Orb.

On the 3rd cast, Freya leaps into the air and smashes the area below, dealing 26 (+108% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies within range and knocking them airborne for 0.4s.

quote: The Valkyrie who guards the Northern Vale.

name: Hayabusa

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Trace of Shadow
skills.description_text: Hayabusa's attacks apply a stack of Shadow Mark on hit (up to 4 stacks). Each stack lasts 6s and increases Hayabusa's damage to the enemy by 5%.
skills.description_html: Hayabusa's attacks apply a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Shadow Mark</font> on hit (up to 4 stacks). Each stack lasts 6s and increases Hayabusa's damage to the enemy by 5%.

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Phantom Shuriken
skills.description_text:
Hayabusa throws three returning shurikens in the target direction, each dealing 220 (+75% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 35% for 2s. Enemies hit by multiple shurikens take 70% less damage after the first hit, and Creeps take 50% less damage after the first hit. Hayabusa restores 10 energy when hitting non-Minion enemies.

Passive: Hayabusa permanently gains 3% Spell Vamp.

Hayabusa throws three returning shurikens in the target direction, each dealing 220 (+75% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 35% for 2s. Enemies hit by multiple shurikens take 70% less damage after the first hit, and Creeps take 50% less damage after the first hit. Hayabusa restores 10 energy when hitting non-Minion enemies.

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Quad Shadow
skills.description_text:
Hayabusa dashes in the target direction and releases four phantoms that travel in separate directions. The phantoms will remain at the end of their paths or attach themselves to the first enemy hero hit, dealing 130 (+30% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slowing them by 40% for 2s. Hayabusa will immediately stop if he hits an enemy hero during the dash.

Use Again: Hayabusa teleports to a phantom's location and reduces the cooldown of Ninjutsu: Phantom Shuriken by 1s. If the phantom is attached to an enemy hero, he also deals 130 (+30% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the enemy.

Hayabusa blends into the shadows and launches 6 single-target attacks on enemies in the area, each dealing 140 (+40% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

The attacks prioritize enemies with Shadow Mark and each will consume a mark to deal 90 (+40% Extra Physical Attack) extra Physical Damage. Shadow Kill does not apply Shadow Mark.

quote: The young leader of the Shadow Sect who wields his blade through moonless nights, walking the path of nindo without fear.

name: Lolita

skills.name: Noumenon Energy Core
skills.description_text: Every 6s, the Noumenon Energy Core grants a 20 (+2.5% Total HP) (+20% Total Magic Power) shield to Lolita and nearby allied heroes, and an extra shield after a skill or the Ultimate is cast. This shield can stack up to 3 times and lasts 30s.

This damage is doubled against Minions.

skills.name: Guardian's Reflection
skills.description_text:
Lolita raises her shield and reflects all incoming ranged Basic Attacks and Projectiles in the direction of the shield for 3s. The shield will break after taking 1000 (+15% Total HP) damage.

The damage and effects from the Unique Passives of an attacker's equipment will not apply to the shield and will not be reflected. This skill can be interrupted by high level control effects.

The damage and effects from the Unique Passives of an attacker's equipment will not apply to the shield and will not be reflected. This skill can be interrupted by high level control effects.

skills.name: Noumenon Blast
skills.description_text:
Lolita begins charging for 2s while slowing enemies in a fan-shaped area by 50%. When the charging is complete or is stopped, Lolita slams her hammer on the ground, dealing up to 500 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area and stunning them for up to 2s (the damage and stun duration are based on the charge time).

Use Again: Lolita immediately stops charging and slams her hammer on the ground.
skills.description_html:
Lolita begins charging for 2s while slowing enemies in a fan-shaped area by 50%. When the charging is complete or is stopped, Lolita slams her hammer on the ground, dealing up to 500 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area and stunning them for up to 2s (the damage and stun duration are based on the charge time).

Use Again: Lolita immediately stops charging and slams her hammer on the ground.

quote: Member of the Eruditio Rangers and protector of the Leviathan workshop.

name: Minotaur

skills.name: Rage Incarnate
skills.description_text: When Minotaur applies a control effect to an enemy hero with a skill, he will also reduce their Hybrid Defense by 5 (+0.5*Hero Level). When Minotaur heals an allied hero with a skill, he will also increase their Hybrid Defense by 5 (+0.5*Hero Level) for 2s. These effects are doubled in Enraged state.
skills.description_html: When Minotaur applies a control effect to an enemy hero with a skill, he will also reduce their Hybrid Defense by 5 (+0.5*Hero Level). When Minotaur heals an allied hero with a skill, he will also increase their Hybrid Defense by 5 (+0.5*Hero Level) for 2s. These effects are doubled in Enraged state.

skills.name: Despair Stomp
skills.description_text:
Minotaur jumps to the target location, dealing 280 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area and briefly knocking them airborne. Enemies hit will also be slowed by 40% while Minotaur enhances his Basic Attacks to deal (+3% Total HP) extra Physical Damage for 2s.

Enraged: Increases the AOE range and the damage dealt by (+3% Total HP) Physical Damage.
skills.description_html:

Enraged: Increases the AOE range and the damage dealt by (+3% Total HP) Physical Damage.

skills.name: Motivation Roar
skills.description_text:
Minotaur motivates himself and nearby allied heroes, recovering 220 (+60% Total Magic Power) HP for himself and his allies. Minotaur additionally recovers 5% of his lost HP.

Enraged: Minotaur gains Enraged Regen for 2s, during which he recovers HP equal to 100% of damage taken from enemy heroes' Basic Attacks.

Enraged: Minotaur gains Enraged Regen for 2s, during which he recovers HP equal to 100% of damage taken from enemy heroes' Basic Attacks.

skills.name: Minoan Fury
skills.description_text:
Minotaur enters Enraged state and smashes the ground 3 times. The first 2 hits deal 180 (+85% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and slow them by 40%, while the final hit deals 200 (+85% Total Physical Attack) True Damage and knocks targets airborne. Minotaur is immune to control effects during this attack.

The Enraged state lasts 12s and enhances Minotaur's skills for the duration.

quote: Minoan prince determined to restore his homeland.

name: Layla

skills.name: Malefic Gun
skills.description_text: Layla deals increased damage to enemies farther away from her (starting at 100% and increasing to 115% at 6 units away). This does not include Turrets.
skills.description_html: Layla deals increased damage to enemies farther away from her (starting at 100% and increasing to 115% at 6 units away). This does not include Turrets.

skills.name: Malefic Bomb
skills.description_text:
Layla fires a Malefic Bomb in the target direction, dealing 200 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit (can Crit).

Upon hitting an enemy, Layla's Basic Attacks and Void Projectile gain extra range for 3s, and she gains 60% extra Movement Speed that decays over 1.2s. The duration of the Movement Speed boost is doubled if an enemy hero is hit.
skills.description_html:

skills.description_text:
Layla fires an orb of Malefic Energy at the target enemy that explodes on hit, dealing 170 (+65% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to targets in the area and applying a Magic Mark on them for 3s.
When Layla hits an enemy with a Magic Mark, she deals 100 (+35% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and stuns them for 0.25s.

Layla fires a blast of Malefic Energy in the target direction, dealing 500 (+150% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a line.

Passive: The range of Layla's Void Projectile and Basic Attacks is increased by 0.6 units. Her sight range is also slightly increased each time this skill is upgraded.

quote: The backbone of the Eruditio Rangers who is also known as the Shining Star.

name: Fanny

skills.name: Air Superiority
skills.description_text: During flight, Fanny deals 10%-20% extra damage to enemies hit (scales with flying speed) and applies a stack of Prey Mark to them (up to 2 stacks) on each attack. Her subsequent skill hits on marked enemy heroes restore 8 energy per stack for her. The energy restoration is reduced if she hits multiple enemy heroes within a short period of time.
skills.description_html: During flight, Fanny deals 10%-20% extra damage to enemies hit (scales with flying speed) and applies a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Prey Mark</font> to them (up to 2 stacks) on each attack. Her subsequent skill hits on marked enemy heroes restore 8 energy per stack for her. The energy restoration is reduced if she hits multiple enemy heroes within a short period of time.

skills.name: Tornado Strike
skills.description_text: Fanny whirls her blades, dealing 275 (+85% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies.
skills.description_html: Fanny whirls her blades, dealing 275<font color="fba51f"> (+85% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Steel Cable
skills.description_text:
Fanny shoots a cable in the target direction that pulls her to the first obstacle hit. She can cast this skill again within 2s until her energy runs out. Each successive cast reduces the skill's energy cost by 2.

Fanny automatically casts Tornado Strike upon hitting an enemy mid-flight, as long as her energy is sufficient.

skills.description_text: Fanny leaps at the target enemy hero or Creep with her blades, dealing 400 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage. Each stack of Prey Mark on the target increases this damage by 30%.

quote: A blade dancer in the battlefield.

skills.name: Dragon Flurry
skills.description_text: After every 3 Basic Attacks, Zilong triggers Dragon Flurry on the next Basic Attack, hitting the target 3 times. Each hit deals 30 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Basic Attack damage and heals himself for 50 (+20% Total Physical Attack) HP.

skills.name: Spear Flip
skills.description_text: Zilong flings the target enemy over his head, dealing 250 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

Zilong lunges at the target enemy, dealing 250 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and reducing their Physical Defense by 15 for 2s. He then launches a Basic Attack on the same target.

The cooldown of Spear Strike is reset each time Zilong kills an enemy.

Zilong removes all slow effects on himself and gains 40% Movement Speed, 35% Attack Speed, and Slow Immunity for 7.5s.

Eudora casts forked lightning in the target direction, dealing 350 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.

Enemies affected by Superconductor will take 190 (+30% Total Magic Power) extra Magic Damage after a short delay.

Eudora hurls an orb of lightning at the target enemy, dealing 350 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage, stunning them for 1.2s, and reducing their Magic Defense by 10 for 1.8s.

If the enemy is affected by Superconductor, the lightning orb will bounce to up to 3 nearby enemies (prioritizes enemy heroes), dealing 175 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and stunning them for 0.9s.

skills.name: Divine Resurrection
skills.description_text: When Rafaela is killed, she turns into a beam of Holy Light and launches herself at her killer after a 40s delay. This attack deals True Damage equal to 2.5 of the target's Max HP upon hit and can be blocked by other enemy heroes, dealing damage to them instead. This effect won't be triggered if the killer is a non-hero enemy or if they're too far away.

Rafaela calls upon Holy Light, recovering 100 (+35% Total Magic Power) HP for nearby allied heroes, plus an additional 150 (+45% Total Magic Power) HP for herself and the most injured allied hero in range. She also increases the Movement Speed of nearby allied heroes by 30% and grants Slow Immunity for 1s.

Every 20 point(s) of Magic Power will add 1% to the Movement Speed bonus.

Clint fires 5 bullets in quick succession in the target direction, each dealing 250 (+85% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the enemy hit.

The bullets will spread evenly across enemies in a fan-shaped area. Enemies hit by multiple bullets will take less damage after the first bullet.

Clint shoots a trap net in the target direction, slightly jumping back while dealing 140 (+30% Total Physical Attack) (+150% Total Magic Power) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit and immobilizing them for 1.2s.

Successfully hitting an enemy reduces the cooldown of this skill by 40%.

Bruno gains 2.5% extra Crit Chance each time he deals damage with his skills (up to 8 stacks).

Bruno has higher Physical Attack but only gains 80% extra Attack Speed from all sources.

Bruno kicks a Powerball on his next Basic Attack, dealing 100 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target, slowing them by 30%, and speeding up by 30% for 0.5s.

The Powerball then bounces back toward Bruno and lands on the ground. He or allied heroes can retrieve the Powerball for another attack and reduce the cooldown of Flying Tackle by 1s.

Each of his subsequent Basic Attacks consumes a stack to deal Physical Damage equal to (+95% Total Physical Attack) plus 4(+0.4*Hero Level)% of the target's Max HP to nearby enemies.

Bane fires his Crab Claw Cannon in the target direction, dealing 150 (+160% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit and then 150% damage to a random enemy behind them (prioritizes enemy heroes). Enemies hit are slowed by 10 (+10% Total Magic Power)% for 1s.

Every 100 Physical Attack Bane possesses reduces this skill's cooldown by an additional 8%.

Every 100 Magic Power Bane possesses additionally reduces this skill's cooldown by 7%.

Franco will consume all Wasteland Force stacks on his next skill cast to increase the skill's damage by up to 150%.

Akai's Basic Attacks deal 25 (+5% Total HP) extra Physical Damage to marked enemies.

Akai charges in the target direction, dealing 300 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way. If Akai hits an enemy hero during this process, he'll knock them airborne for 0.5s and be able to roll in the Joystick's direction once.

Akai can cast Headbutt during Heavy Spin to quickly adjust his position.

If the target is an enemy hero, the cooldowns of Karina's non-Ultimate skills are reduced by 1.5s.
skills.description_html:
Karina's third consecutive attack on the same enemy deals extra True Damage equal to 100 plus 5 (+2.5% Total Magic Power)% of their lost HP (up to 2000 True Damage against creeps).

If the target is an enemy hero, the cooldowns of Karina's non-Ultimate skills are reduced by 1.5s.

skills.name: Dance of Blades
skills.description_text:
Karina enters the Dance of Blades state for 3.5s, during which she gains 45% extra Movement Speed, blocks all incoming Basic Attacks, and reflects 100 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage back to the attacker (the damage reflection effect has a cooldown of 0.4s).

Karina's next Basic Attack within the duration deals 150 (+55% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage, slows the target by 45% for 1s, and is guaranteed to Crit. Casting the enhanced Basic Attack or Shadow Assault ends the Dance of Blades state early.
skills.description_html:
Karina enters the Dance of Blades state for 3.5s, during which she gains 45% extra Movement Speed, blocks all incoming Basic Attacks, and reflects 100 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage back to the attacker (the damage reflection effect has a cooldown of 0.4s).

Karina's next Basic Attack within the duration deals 150 (+55% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage, slows the target by 45% for 1s, and is guaranteed to Crit. Casting the enhanced Basic Attack or Shadow Assault ends the Dance of Blades state early.

skills.name: Dance of Death
skills.description_text: Karina launches a spinning slash, dealing 375 (+125% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.
skills.description_html: Karina launches a spinning slash, dealing 375<font color="62f8fe"> (+125% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Shadow Assault
skills.description_text:
Karina dashes to the target enemy hero, dealing them 350 (+160% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage, applying a Shadow Mark to them, and leaving a Shadowform behind them. The Shadow Mark and Shadowform both last 5s. If the enemy dies within the duration, the cooldown of this skill is reset.

Use Again: Karina dashes back to the Shadowform's location, dealing 150 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way.
skills.description_html:
Karina dashes to the target enemy hero, dealing them 350 (+160% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage, applying a Shadow Mark to them, and leaving a Shadowform behind them. The Shadow Mark and Shadowform both last 5s. If the enemy dies within the duration, the cooldown of this skill is reset.

Use Again: Karina dashes back to the Shadowform's location, dealing 150 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way.

quote: Killer from the Dark Elf tribe who is fighting to rescue her sister Selena.

name: Alucard

skills.name: Pursuit
skills.description_text:
After each skill cast, Alucard's next Basic Attack allows him to dash to the target's location and deal (+140% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
Demon Hunter: Alucard deals 10% extra damage to Creeps.
skills.description_html:
After each skill cast, Alucard's next Basic Attack allows him to dash to the target's location and deal (+140% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
Demon Hunter: Alucard deals 10% extra damage to Creeps.

skills.name: Groundsplitter
skills.description_text: Alucard rolls to the target location and slams his blade on the ground, dealing 270 (+110% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 40% for 2s.
skills.description_html: Alucard rolls to the target location and slams his blade on the ground, dealing 270<font color="fba51f"> (+110% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 40% for 2s.

skills.name: Whirling Smash
skills.description_text: Alucard launches a whirling slash, dealing 345 (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies.
skills.description_html: Alucard launches a whirling slash, dealing 345<font color="fba51f"> (+120% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Fission Wave
skills.description_text:
Passive: Alucard permanently gains 10% Hybrid Lifesteal.

Active: Alucard absorbs the energy of enemies in the target area, reducing their Movement Speed by 30% and Hybrid Defense by 10. Alucard gains 10 Hybrid Defense and reduces the cooldown of his other skills to 50% for 6s.

Use Again: Alucard releases a shockwave in the target direction, dealing 400 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit.
skills.description_html:

Active: Alucard absorbs the energy of enemies in the target area, reducing their Movement Speed by 30% and Hybrid Defense by 10. Alucard gains 10 Hybrid Defense and reduces the cooldown of his other skills to 50% for 6s.

Use Again: Alucard releases a shockwave in the target direction, dealing 400 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit.

quote: Demon hunter who detests the darkness.

name: Tigreal

skills.name: Fearless
skills.description_text:
Tigreal gains a stack of Fearless each time he uses a skill or is hit by a Basic Attack. After getting 4 stacks, Tigreal will consume all Fearless stacks to block the next incoming Basic Attack (including attacks from Turrets).

Attacks from Minions do not grant Fearless stacks nor trigger its effect.
skills.description_html:
Tigreal gains a stack of Fearless each time he uses a skill or is hit by a Basic Attack. After getting 4 stacks, Tigreal will consume all Fearless stacks to block the next incoming Basic Attack (including attacks from Turrets).

Attacks from Minions do not grant Fearless stacks nor trigger its effect.

skills.name: Attack Wave
skills.description_text: Tigreal smashes the ground with his hammer and sends a shockwave that erupts 3 times in the target direction, each time dealing 270 (+70% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the fan-shaped area and slowing them by 20%/40%/60% for 1.5s.
skills.description_html: Tigreal smashes the ground with his hammer and sends a shockwave that erupts 3 times in the target direction, each time dealing 270<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies along the fan-shaped area and slowing them by 20%/40%/60% for 1.5s.

skills.name: Sacred Hammer
skills.description_text:
Tigreal charges in the target direction, dealing (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way and pushing them to the end of the charge.

Use Again: Tigreal can use this skill again within 4s, dealing 280 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in front of him and knocking them airborne for 0.6s.
skills.description_html:
Tigreal charges in the target direction, dealing (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way and pushing them to the end of the charge.

Use Again: Tigreal can use this skill again within 4s, dealing 280 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in front of him and knocking them airborne for 0.6s.

skills.name: Implosion
skills.description_text:
Tigreal unleashes the power of his hammer, pulling nearby enemies to him and stunning them for 1.8s while dealing 270 (+130% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

The first half of the channeling can be interrupted by control effects. The second half of the channeling can only be interrupted by Suppression.

quote: Leader of the Light's Order, guardian of the Moniyan Empire.

name: Nana

skills.name: Molina's Gift
skills.description_text:
Upon taking fatal damage, Nana removes all debuffs on her and transforms, becoming untargetable and invincible, and gains 30% Movement Speed for 2s. She also recovers 10% Max HP over the duration.

Nana can only transform once every 150s and cannot cast skills in the transformed form.
skills.description_html:
Upon taking fatal damage, Nana removes all debuffs on her and transforms, becoming untargetable and invincible, and gains 30% Movement Speed for 2s. She also recovers 10% Max HP over the duration.

Nana can only transform once every 150s and cannot cast skills in the transformed form.

skills.name: Magic Boomerang
skills.description_text: Nana hurls her Magic Boomerang in the target direction, dealing damage to enemies hit on its way out and back. The boomerang deals 300 (+90% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit. For every additional enemy hit, the damage is reduced by 10% (max reduction of 30%).
skills.description_html: Nana hurls her Magic Boomerang in the target direction, dealing damage to enemies hit on its way out and back. The boomerang deals 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+90% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the first enemy hit. For every additional enemy hit, the damage is reduced by 10% (max reduction of 30%).

skills.name: Molina Smooch
skills.description_text:
Nana throws Molina at the target location, dealing 250 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies within range and Transforming enemy heroes hit into small animals.

If Molina does not hit an enemy hero, she will remain on the ground and chase the nearest enemy hero that comes into range, Transforming the first enemy hero she touches.

Transform: Reduces the target's Movement Speed by 50% and Magic Defense by 30% for 1.5s. Transformed heroes cannot attack or use skills.

skills.name: Molina Blitz
skills.description_text: Nana summons Molina to strike the target area 3 times, each time dealing 440 (+140% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies within and slowing them by 30% for 1s. Enemies hit consecutively will be stunned for 1s.
skills.description_html: Nana summons Molina to strike the target area 3 times, each time dealing 440<font color="62f8fe"> (+140% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies within and slowing them by 30% for 1s. Enemies hit consecutively will be stunned for 1s.

quote: Little Leonin with no worries.

name: Alice

skills.name: Blood Ancestry
skills.description_text:
Alice restores 3% Max Mana per second.
Each time Alice levels up, her Movement Speed increases by 3 and Healing Received increases by 1%.
skills.description_html:
Alice restores 3% Max Mana per second.
Each time Alice levels up, her Movement Speed increases by 3 and Healing Received increases by 1%.

skills.name: Flowing Blood
skills.description_text:
Alice casts a sphere of blood energy in the target direction, dealing 400 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in its path.

Use Again: Alice immediately teleports to the blood sphere's location.
skills.description_html:
Alice casts a sphere of blood energy in the target direction, dealing 400 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in its path.

Use Again: Alice immediately teleports to the blood sphere's location.

skills.name: Blood Awe
skills.description_text:
Alice deals 200 (+75% Total Magic Power) plus 2.5 (+0.3% Total Mana)% of the target's Max HP as Magic Damage to nearby enemies and immobilizes them for 0.5s. After the immobilize effect ends, the targets will be slowed by 70% for 1.5s.

Creeps can only take up to 250 damage from the Max HP-based damage.
skills.description_html:
Alice deals 200 (+75% Total Magic Power) plus 2.5 (+0.3% Total Mana)% of the target's Max HP as Magic Damage to nearby enemies and immobilizes them for 0.5s. After the immobilize effect ends, the targets will be slowed by 70% for 1.5s.

Creeps can only take up to 250 damage from the Max HP-based damage.

skills.name: Blood Ode
skills.description_text:
Alice enters the blood-draining state, consuming 60 Mana while dealing 30 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies every 0.5s. She recovers 40 (+30% Total Magic Power) HP each time she damages an enemy hero (only 50% of that HP for other enemy units).

Each time this effect damages an enemy hero, the cooldown of Flowing Blood is reduced by 0.2s and the cooldown of Blood Awe is reduced by 0.5s.

Each time this effect damages an enemy hero, the cooldown of Flowing Blood is reduced by 0.2s and the cooldown of Blood Awe is reduced by 0.5s.

quote: Cunning and sinister Blood Demon Queen.

name: Saber

skills.name: Enemy's Bane
skills.description_text: Saber's attacks reduce enemies' Physical Defense by 3-8 for 5s on hit. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
skills.description_html: Saber's attacks reduce enemies' Physical Defense by 3-8 for 5s on hit. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

skills.name: Orbiting Swords
skills.description_text:
Saber shoots out 5 swords that orbit around him, dealing 80 (+30% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies on contact. After orbiting around Saber for a period of time, the swords will fly back to Saber.

Within the duration of this skill, when Saber deals damage with his Basic Attacks or skills, he will send an orbiting sword towards the target, dealing 210 (+60% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the main target and 50% of the damage to other targets it passes through and reducing the cooldown of Charge by 1s. It deals only 50% damage to minions.

It deals only 50% damage to minions.

skills.name: Charge
skills.description_text: Saber dashes in the target direction, dealing 75 (+50% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way while enhancing his next Basic Attack. Saber can dash to the target, and his enhanced Basic Attack deals 75 (+120% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slows the target by 60% for 1s.

skills.name: Triple Sweep
skills.description_text: Saber charges at the target enemy hero, knocking them airborne for 1.2s (unaffected by Resilience) and striking them 3 times over the duration. The first two strikes deal 120 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage each, while the third strike deals 240 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

quote: A swordsman in pursuit of invincibility, used by Laboratory 1718.

name: Balmond

skills.name: Bloodthirst
skills.description_text: Balmond recovers 5% Max HP after killing a Minion or Creep, and 20% Max HP after killing a hero.
skills.description_html: Balmond recovers 5% Max HP after killing a Minion or Creep, and 20% Max HP after killing a hero.

skills.name: Soul Lock
skills.description_text: Balmond charges in the target direction for a set distance or until he hits an enemy hero, dealing 150 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way. The enemy hero hit will be knocked back slightly and slowed by 60% for 2s.
skills.description_html: Balmond charges in the target direction for a set distance or until he hits an enemy hero, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies along the way. The enemy hero hit will be knocked back slightly and slowed by 60% for 2s.

skills.name: Cyclone Sweep
skills.description_text:
Balmond gains 15% Movement Speed that decays over time and spins with his axe for 3s, dealing 25 (+2% Extra Max HP) (+25% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage per hit to nearby enemies up to 14 times. Each subsequent hit on the same enemy will deal 8.5% increased damage (up to 68%).

The Physical Attack bonus portion of the damage can Crit.

skills.name: Lethal Counter
skills.description_text:
Balmond unleashes a huge strike in the target direction (this skill can only be interrupted by Suppression), dealing True Damage equal to 150 (+70% Total Physical Attack) plus 30% of the target's lost HP.

This skill only deals up to 1000 damage to non-hero units.

quote: The leader of the Orc Legion.

name: Miya

skills.name: Moon Blessing
skills.description_text:
Each time Miya hits a target with her Basic Attack, she gains 5% Attack Speed for 4s. Stacks up to 5 times.

After reaching full stacks, Miya summons a Moonlight Shadow with each Basic Attack that deals 30 (+20% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and inherits a portion of Attack Effects.
skills.description_html:
Each time Miya hits a target with her Basic Attack, she gains 5% Attack Speed for 4s. Stacks up to 5 times.

After reaching full stacks, Miya summons a Moonlight Shadow with each Basic Attack that deals 30 (+20% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and inherits a portion of Attack Effects.

skills.name: Moon Arrow
skills.description_text: Miya shoots two extra arrows with each Basic Attack, dealing 10 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target enemy and 30% damage to nearby targets. This effect lasts 4s. Each extra arrow inherits a portion of Attack Effects.
skills.description_html: Miya shoots two extra arrows with each Basic Attack, dealing 10<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the target enemy and 30% damage to nearby targets. This effect lasts 4s. Each extra arrow inherits a portion of Attack Effects.

skills.name: Arrow of Eclipse
skills.description_text: Miya launches an empowered arrow on the target area, dealing 270 (+45% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies within and immobilizing them for 1.2s. The arrow then splits into 6 scattering minor arrows, each dealing 40 (+20% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit and slowing them by 30% for 2s.

skills.name: Hidden Moonlight
skills.description_text:
Miya removes all debuffs on her and conceals herself, gaining 35% extra Movement Speed. This state lasts 2s or until she launches an attack.

Miya gains full stacks of Moon Blessing upon leaving the state.
